English Sentences: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai salotanne sa7aa koiro medhdhiis.

English Sentences: And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode sa7ai giigiichchibeennanne aibinne bainna mela; ciimmaa bollan xumai de7ees; Xoossaa Ayyaanai haattaappe bollaara maayi uttiis.

English Sentences: And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: hegaappe guyyiyan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Poo7oi hano" yaagiis; yaagin poo7oi haniis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7oi lo77o gididoogaa Xoossai be7iis; be7idi poo7uwaa xumaappe shaakkiis.

English Sentences: And God saw the light, that it was good: and God divided the light from the darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai poo7uwaa "Gallassa" giidi sunttiis; xumaa "Qamma" giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And God called the light Day, and the darkness he called Night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai qammiisinne wonttiis; hegeenne koiro gallassa.

English Sentences: And the evening and the morning were the first day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Bollaara de7iya haattaa garssaara de7iya haattaappe shaakkiya salo gufanttoi hano" yaagiis; yaagin haniis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let there be a firmament in the midst of the waters, and let it divide the waters from the waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai salo gufanttuwaa giigissidi, salo gufanttuwaappe bollaara de7iya haattaa garssaara de7iya haattaappe shaakkiis.

English Sentences: And God made the firmament, and divided the waters which were under the firmament from the waters which were above the firmament: and it was so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai he gufanttuwaa "Saluwaa" giidi sunttiis. Sa7ai qammiisinne wonttiis; hegeenne naa77antto gallassa.

English Sentences: And God called the firmament Heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Saluwaappe garssaara de7iya haattai issisan eello; eellin mela sohoi qoncco" yaagiis; yaagin haniis.

English Sentences: And the evening and the morning were the second day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai he mela sohuwaa "Biittaa" giidi sunttiis; qassi issisan eellida haattaa "Abbaa" giidi sunttiis. Yaatidi Xoossai hegee lo77o gididoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let the waters under the heaven be gathered together unto one place, and let the dry land appear: and it was so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin Xoossai, "Biittai mittaa maataa mokko; zeretta aifeera de7iya kattaanne zeretta aifeera de7iya teeriya mittaa mokko" yaagiis; yaagin haniis.

English Sentences: And God called the dry land Earth; and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas: and God saw that it was good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittai mittaa maataa a qommuwan qommuwan mokkiis. Mokkin Xoossai hegee lo77o gididoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding seed, and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed is in itself, upon the earth: and it was so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai qammiisinne wonttiis; hegeenne heezzantto gallassa.

English Sentences: And the earth brought forth grass, and herb yielding seed after his kind, and the tree yielding fruit, whose seed was in itself, after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Gallassaa qammaappe shaakkanau poo7oti salo gufantton hanona; eti gallassaa, wodiyaanne laittaa erissanau malaata gidona;

English Sentences: And the evening and the morning were the third day.
Wolaitta Sentences: sa7aa bollan poo7issana mala eti salo gufantton poo7ona" yaagiis; yaagin haniis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let there be lights in the firmament of the heaven to divide the day from the night; and let them be for signs, and for seasons, and for days, and years:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai naa77u gita poo7ota, gitatiyaagee gallassaa haaranaadaaninne guuxxiyaagee qammaa haaranaadan medhdhiis; xoolinttetakka i medhdhiis.

English Sentences: And let them be for lights in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth: and it was so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai eti ha sa7aa bollan poo7issana mala, gallassaanne qammaa haarana malanne poo7uwaa xumaappe shaakkana mala, salo gufantton eta wottiis.

English Sentences: And God made two great lights; the greater light to rule the day, and the lesser light to rule the night: he made the stars also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Xoossai hegee lo77o gididoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And God set them in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai qammiisinne wonttiis; hegeenne oiddantto gallassa.

English Sentences: And to rule over the day and over the night, and to divide the light from the darkness: and God saw that it was good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Paxa de7iya dumma dumma meretati haattan darona; kafoikka sa7aappe bollaaranne salo gufanttuwaappe garssaara paallo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the evening and the morning were the fourth day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Xoossai abban de7iya gita do7ata, haatta giddon woxxi qaaxxiya meretata ubbaanne qefiyaara de7iya kafuwaa ubbaa a qommuwan qommuwan medhdhiis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let the waters bring forth abundantly the moving creature that hath life, and fowl that may fly above the earth in the open firmament of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Medhdhidi Xoossai hegee lo77o gididoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And God created great whales, and every living creature that moveth, which the waters brought forth abundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai eta, "Yelettite; corattite; abbaa haattaa kumite; kafoikka biittaa bollan coratto" yaagidi anjjiis.

English Sentences: And God blessed them, saying, Be fruitful, and multiply, and fill the waters in the seas, and let fowl multiply in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai qammiisinne wonttiis; hegeenne ichchashantto gallassa.

English Sentences: And the evening and the morning were the fifth day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis; "Paxa de7iya meretati bantta qommuwan qommuwan: meheti, biittaara gooshettiya meretatinne do7ati bantta qommuwan qommuwan biittaa bollan kiyona" yaagiis; yaagin haniis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let the earth bring forth the living creature after his kind, cattle, and creeping thing, and beast of the earth after his kind: and it was so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai do7ata eta qommuwan qommuwan, mehetakka eta qommuwan qommuwaaninne, biittaara gooshettiya meretatakka ubbaa eta qommuwan qommuwan medhdhiis. Medhdhidi Xoossai hegee lo77o gididoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And God made the beast of the earth after his kind, and cattle after their kind, and every thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind: and God saw that it was good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin Xoossai, "Asa nu leemisuwan nuna milatissidi ane medhdhoos; medhdhin eti abbaa moliyaa, saluwaa kafuwaa, biittaa bolli woxxi qaaxxiya mereta ubbaa haarona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And God said, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness: and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over the cattle, and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan Xoossai asaa ba leemisuwan medhdhiis; i a Xoossaa leemisuwan medhdhiis; i eta attumaasanne maccaasa medhdhiis.

English Sentences: So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai eta hagaadan yaagidi anjjiis; "Yelettite; corattite; ha sa7aa kumitenne haarite; abbaa moliyaa, saluwaa kafuwaanne biittaa bolli woxxi qaaxxiya, paxa de7iya mereta ubbaa haarite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And God blessed them, and God said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth, and subdue it: and have dominion over the fish of the sea, and over the fowl of the air, and over every living thing that moveth upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin Xoossai, "Be7ite! Taani ha biitta ubbaa bollan zeretta aifeera de7iya katta ubbaanne zeretta aifeera de7iya teeriya mitta ubbaa intteyyo immaas; etinne intteyyo quma gidana.

English Sentences: And God said, Behold, I have given you every herb bearing seed, which is upon the face of all the earth, and every tree, in the which is the fruit of a tree yielding seed; to you it shall be for meat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka ha sa7an de7iya mehenne do7a ubbaayyo, saluwaa kafo ubbaayyo, biittaara gooshettiya mereta ubbaayyoonne shemppoora paxa de7iya mereta ubbaayyo miyoobaa gidanaadan, irxxa mittaanne maataa immaas" yaagiis; yaagin haniis.

English Sentences: And to every beast of the earth, and to every fowl of the air, and to every thing that creepeth upon the earth, wherein there is life, I have given every green herb for meat: and it was so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba medhdhido ubbabaakka xeelliis; xeellidi daro lo77o gididoogaa be7iis. Sa7ai qammiisinne wonttiis; hegeenne usuppuntto gallassa.

English Sentences: And God saw every thing that he had made, and, behold, it was very good. And the evening and the morning were the sixth day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Salotinne sa7ai etan de7iyaabai ubbabai hagaadan oosetti polettiis.

English Sentences: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished, and all the host of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba oottido oosuwaa usuppuntta gallassi polidi, ba oottido ooso ubbaappe laappuntta gallassi shemppiis.

English Sentences: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Xoossai laappuntta gallassaa anjjiisinne geeshsha oottiis; aissi giikko, Xoossai ba oottiyo oosuwaa wurssidi shemppidoi he gallassaana.

English Sentences: And God blessed the seventh day, and sanctified it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Salotinne sa7ai merettidoogee hagaadaana. GODAI Xoossai sa7aanne salota medhdhido wode,

English Sentences: These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created, in the day that the LORD God made the earth and the heavens,
Wolaitta Sentences: sa7aa bollan mittinne maati mokkibeenna; carshshinne caaribeenna; aissi giikko, GODAI Xoossai ira bukissiichchibeenna; qassi biittaa oottiya asinne baawa.

English Sentences: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth, and every herb of the field before it grew: for the LORD God had not caused it to rain upon the earth, and there was not a man to till the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne sa7aappe haattai pude kiyidi, biittaa ubbaa irxxissees.

English Sentences: But there went up a mist from the earth, and watered the whole face of the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAI Xoossai biittaa baanaappe issi asa medhdhiis; medhdhidi a siiriyan de7o shemppuwaa shemppi gelissiis; yaatin bitanee paxa de7iya asa gidiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground, and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai awai mokkiyoosaa baggaara Edene giyoosan gannatiyaa kase tokkiis; yan ba medhdhido bitaniyaa wottiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God planted a garden eastward in Eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai xeellanau lo77iya, maanaukka mal77iya ubba qommo mittaa biittaappe mokissiis.

English Sentences: And out of the ground made the LORD God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight, and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden, and the tree of knowledge of good and evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gannatiyaa gidduwan de7o mittaanne lo77uwaanne iitaa erissiya mittaa wottiis.

English Sentences: And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted, and became into four heads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gannatiyaa ushshiya shaafaa haattai Edeneppe goggees. Edeneppe kiyidoogaappe guyyiyan, oiddu shaafa kiyi shaahettees.

English Sentences: The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold;
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro shaafaa sunttai Pishoona; Pishooni worqqai de7iyo Hawiila giyo biitta ubbaa bollan goggees.

English Sentences: And the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and the onyx stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittaa worqqai geeshsha worqqa; qassi al77o shittoinne keehi lo77iya shuchchai yan de7ees.

English Sentences: And the name of the second river is Gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto shaafaa sunttai Giyoona; Giyooni Toophphiyaa biitta ubbaa bollan goggees.

English Sentences: And the name of the third river is Hiddekel: that is it which goeth toward the east of Assyria. And the fourth river is Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto shaafaa sunttai Xegiroosa; Xegiroosi Asooreppe arshsho baggaara goggees. Qassi oiddantto shaafai Efiraaxiisa.

English Sentences: And the LORD God took the man, and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee Edene Gannatiyaa oottana malanne naagana mala, GODAI Xoossai a efiidi wottiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God commanded the man, saying, Of every tree of the garden thou mayest freely eat:
Wolaitta Sentences: Wottidi GODAI Xoossai bitaniyaa, "Gannatiyaa mittaa teeraa ubbaappe neeni maana giikko ma;

English Sentences: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin lo77uwaanne iitaa erissiya mittaa teeraappe mooppa; aissi giikko, neeni appe miido gallassi tumu haiqqana" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Xoossai, "Bitanee barkka de7iyoogee lo77o gidenna; taani ayyo injjetiyaabaanne a maaddiyaabaa kessana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And out of the ground the LORD God formed every beast of the field, and every fowl of the air; and brought them unto Adam to see what he would call them: and whatsoever Adam called every living creature, that was the name thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai kase meheta ubbaa, do7ata ubbaanne saluwaa kafota ubbaa biittaappe medhdhiis; qassi bitanee eta woigi sunttiyaakkonne siyanau akko ehiis; ehin bitanee paxa de7iya meretata ubbaa sunttido sunttai eta suntta gididi attiis.

English Sentences: And Adam gave names to all cattle, and to the fowl of the air, and to every beast of the field; but for Adam there was not found an help meet for him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan bitanee meheta ubbaa, saluwaa kafotanne bazzo do7ata ubbaa sunttiis; shin Addaamessi injjetiyaabinne a maaddiyaabi beettibeenna.

English Sentences: And the LORD God caused a deep sleep to fall upon Adam, and he slept: and he took one of his ribs, and closed up the flesh instead thereof;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau GODAI Xoossai bitaniyaa xiskkuwaa kairissiis; i xiskkuwaa kairidaashin, a miyyiyaa meqettaappe issuwaa ekkidi, he sohuwaa ashuwaa kunttiis.

English Sentences: And the rib, which the LORD God had taken from man, made he a woman, and brought her unto the man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kunttidi GODAI Xoossai bitaniyaappe ekkido meqettaa macca asa kessiis; yaatidi o bitaniyaakko ehiis.

English Sentences: And Adam said, This is now bone of my bones, and flesh of my flesh: she shall be called Woman, because she was taken out of Man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehin bitanee; "Hayyashsho! Ha meqettiyaa ta meqettaappe, ha ashiyaakka ta ashuwaappe ekettidaaro; akka attuma asaappe ekettido gishshau, macca asa geetettu" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau asi ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo aggi bayidi, ba machcheera issippe de7ees; eti naa77ai issi asho gidoosona.

English Sentences: And they were both naked, the man and his wife, and were not ashamed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitaneenne a keettaayyiyaanne naa77aikka kallo xiire de7oosona; shin issoi issuwau yeellatokkona.

English Sentences: Now the serpent was more subtil than any beast of the field which the LORD God had made. And he said unto the woman, Yea, hath God said, Ye shall not eat of every tree of the garden?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHooshshai GODAI Xoossai medhdhido do7a ubbaappe aadhdhida genanchcha. Issi gallassi shooshshai he maccaasiyo, "Xoossai tumu inttena, Gannatiyan de7iya mitta teeraa ubbaappekka mooppite giidee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the woman said unto the serpent, We may eat of the fruit of the trees of the garden:
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin maccaasiyaa shooshshaayyo zaarada, "CHii, Xoossai hagaadan gibeenna; nuuni gannatiyan de7iya mittatu teeraa maanau danddayoos;

English Sentences: But of the fruit of the tree which is in the midst of the garden, God hath said, Ye shall not eat of it, neither shall ye touch it, lest ye die.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Xoossai nuna, Gannatiyaassi gidduwan de7iya mitta teeraa mooppite; bochchoppite; hinkkoode intte haiqqana giis" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the serpent said unto the woman, Ye shall not surely die:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHooshshai maccaasiyo, "CHii, intte ainnekka haiqqekketa;

English Sentences: For God doth know that in the day ye eat thereof, then your eyes shall be opened, and ye shall be as gods, knowing good and evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaa giidoogee, he mittaa teeraa intte miikko, intte aifee dooyettin, lo77uwaanne iitaa Xoossaadan intte eranaagaa i eriyo gishshaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the woman saw that the tree was good for food, and that it was pleasant to the eyes, and a tree to be desired to make one wise, she took of the fruit thereof, and did eat, and gave also unto her husband with her; and he did eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa he mittaa teerai maanau mal77iyaagaa, xeellanau lo77iyaagaa, qassi asi aadhdhida eratettaa demmanau amoyiyaagaa gidiyoogaa be7aasu; be7ada he mittaa teeraappe ekkada maasu; qassi banaara de7iya ba azinaayyookka hegaappe immin, ikka miis.

English Sentences: And the eyes of them both were opened, and they knew that they were naked; and they sewed fig leaves together, and made themselves aprons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miyoorin eta naa77aa aifeekka dooyetti aggiis; dooyettin eti banttau kallo xiire de7iyoogaa eridosona; eridi ettaa giyo mittaa haittaa sikkidi, banttayyo menttuwan gixxidosona.

English Sentences: And they heard the voice of the LORD God walking in the garden in the cool of the day: and Adam and his wife hid themselves from the presence of the LORD God amongst the trees of the garden.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai omarido wode, gannatiyaa gidduwan GODAI Xoossai hemettishin, a giirettaa bitaneenne a keettaayyiyaa siyidosona; siyidi eti gannatiyaa mittaa giddon GODAA Xoossaappe qosettidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD God called unto Adam, and said unto him, Where art thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI Xoossai bitaniyaa xeesidi, "Addaamee, awan de7ai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, I heard thy voice in the garden, and I was afraid, because I was naked; and I hid myself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bitanee, "Gannatiyaa giddon ne giirettaa siyada, taani kallo de7iyo gishshau, yayyada qosettaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Who told thee that thou wast naked? Hast thou eaten of the tree, whereof I commanded thee that thou shouldest not eat?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai a, "Neeni kallo de7aasa giidi neeyyo odidai oonee? Taani nena, Mooppa gaada azazido mittaa teeraappe maadiiyye?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the man said, The woman whom thou gavest to be with me, she gave me of the tree, and I did eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin i, "Tanaara de7anaadan neeni immido maccaasiyaa he mittaa teeraappe tau immin maas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God said unto the woman, What is this that thou hast done? And the woman said, The serpent beguiled me, and I did eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan maccaasiyo, "Neeni hegaa aissi oottadii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Yaagin maccaasiyaa, "Tana shooshshai cimmin maas" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the LORD God said unto the serpent, Because thou hast done this, thou art cursed above all cattle, and above every beast of the field; upon thy belly shalt thou go, and dust shalt thou eat all the days of thy life:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan shooshshaa, "Neeni hagaa oottido gishshau, mehe ubbaanne do7a ubbaa garssan ne xalaalai qanggettidaagaa! Neeni ne uluwan biittaara gooshettana; ne de7o laitta ubbankka baanaa laaccana.

English Sentences: And I will put enmity between thee and the woman, and between thy seed and her seed; it shall bruise thy head, and thou shalt bruise his heel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nenanne maccaasiyoo, ne zerettaanne i zerettaa morkke kessana; i ne huuphiyaa qoxxana; neenikka a qirbbiyaa dukkana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Unto the woman he said, I will greatly multiply thy sorrow and thy conception; in sorrow thou shalt bring forth children; and thy desire shall be to thy husband, and he shall rule over thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyookka GODAI Xoossai, "Ne abbe ixetaa aginan neeni daro tuggatana; qassi neeni wolqqaama leessuwan naata yelana. Gidikkonne neeni ne azinaara de7anau amottana; i nena haarana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And unto Adam he said, Because thou hast hearkened unto the voice of thy wife, and hast eaten of the tree, of which I commanded thee, saying, Thou shalt not eat of it: cursed is the ground for thy sake; in sorrow shalt thou eat of it all the days of thy life;
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitaniyaakka GODAI Xoossai hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni ne keettaayee oduwaa siyido gishshaunne taani nena, He mittaa teeraa mooppa gaada azazido mittaa aifiyaappe neeni miido gishshau, biittai ne gaasuwan qanggettidaagaa gido! Neeni ne de7o laitta ubban gita daafuran biittaa oottada maana.

English Sentences: Thorns also and thistles shall it bring forth to thee; and thou shalt eat the herb of the field;
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittai neeyyo agunttanne kinddiichchuwaa mokkana; neeni bazzon mokkidabaa maana.

English Sentences: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto the ground; for out of it wast thou taken: for dust thou art, and unto dust shalt thou return.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni biittau simmana gakkanaassi, daafuran ne som77oi cawattin oottido ne qumaa maana; aissi giikko, neeni biittaappe ekettadasa; neeni baana; neeni baanau simmana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Adam called his wife's name Eve; because she was the mother of all living.
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaami ba keettaayyiyo Hewaano giidi sunttiis; aissi giikko, a paxa de7iya asa ubbau aayo.

English Sentences: Unto Adam also and to his wife did the LORD God make coats of skins, and clothed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai Addaameyyoonne a keettaayeeyyo itiyaa giigissidi eta maizziis.

English Sentences: And the LORD God said, Behold, the man is become as one of us, to know good and evil: and now, lest he put forth his hand, and take also of the tree of life, and eat, and live for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Xoossai, "Simmi asi nuuppe issuwaadan lo77uwaanne iitaa eriyaabaa gidiis.

English Sentences: Therefore the LORD God sent him forth from the garden of Eden, to till the ground from whence he was taken.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba kushiyaa yeddidi, de7o mittaappe ekkidi, qassi meenna malanne merinau paxa de7enna mala teqettanau koshshees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So he drove out the man; and he placed at the east of the garden of Eden Cherubims, and a flaming sword which turned every way, to keep the way of the tree of life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, i ba ekettido biittaa oottana mala, GODAI Xoossai Edene Gannatiyaappe a kessiis.

English Sentences: And Adam knew Eve his wife; and she conceived, and bare Cain, and said, I have gotten a man from the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: A kessirggidi, de7o mittaakko efiya ogiyaa naagana mala, kiruubeta giyo kiitanchchatanne aadhdhi aadhdhi wodhdhiya tama laco bisuwaa Edene Gannatiyaappe arshsho baggaara wottiis.

English Sentences: And she again bare his brother Abel. And Abel was a keeper of sheep, but Cain was a tiller of the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaami ba keettaayee Hewaaniira aqiis; a abbe ixettada attuma na7a yelaasu; "GODAI tana maaddin, attuma na7a demmaas" gaada a Qaayeela sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And in process of time it came to pass, that Cain brought of the fruit of the ground an offering unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi a ishaa Aabeelakka yelaasu. Aabeeli dorssa heemmees; qassi Qaayeeli biittaa oottees.

English Sentences: And Abel, he also brought of the firstlings of his flock and of the fat thereof. And the LORD had respect unto Abel and to his offering:
Wolaitta Sentences: Unddenna wodiyaappe guyyiyan, Qaayeeli ba gaden mokkida kattaappe GODAAYYO yarshshuwaa yarshshiis;

English Sentences: But unto Cain and to his offering he had not respect. And Cain was very wroth, and his countenance fell.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Aabeeli ba dorssa wudiyaa giddon baira yelettida maratuppe ekkidi shukkidi, eta ashuwaappe modhdhiyaasaa yarshshiis. GODAI Aabeelanne a yarshshuwaa ekkiis;

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Cain, Why art thou wroth? and why is thy countenance fallen?
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Qaayeelanne a yarshshuwaa ekkibeenna. Hegaa gishshau, Qaayeeli keehi yiillotiis; ba som77uwaakka xumissiis.

English Sentences: If thou doest well, shalt thou not be accepted? and if thou doest not well, sin lieth at the door. And unto thee shall be his desire, and thou shalt rule over him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin GODAI Qaayeela, "Aissi yiillotai? Ne som77oikka aissi xumidee?

English Sentences: And Cain talked with Abel his brother: and it came to pass, when they were in the field, that Cain rose up against Abel his brother, and slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni lo77obaa oottiyaabaa gidiyaakko, ne som77oi pashkkennee? SHin neeni lo77obaa oottana xayikko, nagarai do7adan ne penggen zuggees; i nena haarana koyees; shin neeni a xoonana bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Cain, Where is Abel thy brother? And he said, I know not: Am I my brother's keeper?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Qaayeeli ba ishaa Aabeela, "Ane dembbaa boos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, What hast thou done? the voice of thy brother's blood crieth unto me from the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi eti dembban de7ishin, Qaayeeli ba ishaa Aabeela bolli denddinne wori aggiis.

English Sentences: And now art thou cursed from the earth, which hath opened her mouth to receive thy brother's blood from thy hand;
Wolaitta Sentences: Worin GODAI Qaayeela, "Ne ishai Aabeeli awaanee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Qaayeeli zaaridi, "Taani erikke; ta ishaa naagiyaagee taneeyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When thou tillest the ground, it shall not henceforth yield unto thee her strength; a fugitive and a vagabond shalt thou be in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI Qaayeela, "Hagaa aissi oottadii? Be7a; ne ishaa suuttai biittaappe taakko waassees.

English Sentences: And Cain said unto the LORD, My punishment is greater than I can bear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kushiyaappe ne ishaa suuttaa ekkidi, mittanau hanggida biittaappe ha77i neeni qanggettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Behold, thou hast driven me out this day from the face of the earth; and from thy face shall I be hid; and I shall be a fugitive and a vagabond in the earth; and it shall come to pass, that every one that findeth me shall slay me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni oottinkka biittai neeyyo aifenna; betedan neeni sa7aa bollan toilattana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto him, Therefore whosoever slayeth Cain, vengeance shall be taken on him sevenfold. And the LORD set a mark upon Cain, lest any finding him should kill him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaayeeli GODAA, "Poora! Neeni tana qaxxayiyo qixaatee taani mulekka danddayennaagaa.

English Sentences: And Cain went out from the presence of the LORD, and dwelt in the land of Nod, on the east of Eden.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko neeni tana hachchi ha biittaappe yedettaasa; taani ne sinttappe qosettana; betedan taani sa7aa bollan toilattana; tana demmai ooninne worana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Cain knew his wife; and she conceived, and bare Enoch: and he builded a city, and called the name of the city, after the name of his son, Enoch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI a, "Nena ooninne worenna; worikko, ne haluwaa taani laappun kushiyaa kessana" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, demmai ooninne a worennaadan GODAI a bolli malaataa wottiis.

English Sentences: And unto Enoch was born Irad: and Irad begat Mehujael: and Mehujael begat Methusael: and Methusael begat Lamech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wottin Qaayeeli GODAA sinttappe kiyidi, Edene baggaappe arshshoora de7iya Nooda giyo biittan de7iis.

English Sentences: And Lamech took unto him two wives: the name of the one was Adah, and the name of the other Zillah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaayeeli ba keettaayeera aqiis; a abbe ixettada, Heenooka yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Adah bare Jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaayeeli katamaa he wode keexxidi, he katamaa ba na7aa sunttan "Heenooka" giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And his brother's name was Jubal: he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heenooki Iraada yeliis; Iraadi Mahuyaa7eela yeliis; Mahuyaa7eeli Matushaa7eela yeliis; Matushaa7eeli Laameeka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Zillah, she also bare Tubalcain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of Tubalcain was Naamah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laameeki Aadonne Xiilo giyo naa77u maccaasata dautta ekkiis.

English Sentences: And Lamech said unto his wives, Adah and Zillah, Hear my voice; ye wives of Lamech, hearken unto my speech: for I have slain a man to my wounding, and a young man to my hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aada Yaabaala yelaasu; Yaabaali mehiyaa haariya, dunkkaaniyan de7iya asatu aawaa.

English Sentences: If Cain shall be avenged sevenfold, truly Lamech seventy and sevenfold.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ishaa sunttai Yuubaala; Yuubaali qassi diittaa diixxiyaanne pulaale punniya asatu ubbaa aawaa;

English Sentences: And Adam knew his wife again; and she bare a son, and called his name Seth: For God, said she, hath appointed me another seed instead of Abel, whom Cain slew.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiila qassi Tubaaliqaina giyo na7aa yelaasu; Tubaaliqaini nahaasiyaappenne birataappe dumma dumma miishshata qoxxiyaagaa. Tubaaliqaina michchiyaa Naa7imo.

English Sentences: And to Seth, to him also there was born a son; and he called his name Enos: then began men to call upon the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Laameeki ba keettaayeta, "Aadee, Xiilee, siyite; ta keettaayetoo, ane taani yootiyoogaa ezggite. Issi bitanee tana dechchido gishshau, taani a woraas; ee, taani he tana mazunxxissida wodallaa woraas.

English Sentences: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaayeela haluwaa kessanau laappun kushe koshshikko, Laameeka haluwaa kessanau laappun tammanne laappun kushe koshshees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaami ba keettaayeera haranttuwaa aqin, hara na7aa yelaasu. Yelada, "Qaayeeli worido Aabeela gishshaa Xoossai tau hara na7aa immiis" gaada, a Seeta gaada sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Seetikka attuma na7aa yeliis; yelidi a "Heenoosa" giidi sunttiis. Asai GODAA sunttaa xeesidi goinniyoogaa he wode doommiis.

English Sentences: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaame yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettiis. Xoossai asa medhdhido gallassi bana milatissidi medhdhiis.

English Sentences: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: I attumaasanne maccaasa ootti medhdhidi, eta anjjiis. Eta medhdhidi Asa giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaami 130 laittaa de7idi , bana milatiya attuma na7aa yeliis; yelidi a "Seeta" giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaami Seeta yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 800 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaami muleera 930 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:
Wolaitta Sentences: Seeti 105 laittaa de7idi, Heenoosa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Seeti Heenoosa yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 807 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seeti muleera 912 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heenoosi 90 laittaa de7idi, Qainaana yeliis;

English Sentences: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heenoosi Qainaana yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 815 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heenoosi muleera 905 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qainaani 70 laittaa de7idi, Malaali7eela yeliis;

English Sentences: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qainaani Malaali7eela yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 840 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qainaani muleera 910 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:
Wolaitta Sentences: Malaali7eeli 65 laittaa de7idi, Yaareeda yeliis;

English Sentences: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Malaali7eeli Yaareeda yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 830 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Malaali7eeli muleera 895 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaareedi 162 laittaa de7idi, Heenooka yeliis;

English Sentences: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaareedi Heenooka yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 800 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaareedi muleera 962 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heenooki 65 laittaa de7idi, Maatusaala yeliis;

English Sentences: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maatusaala yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, Heenooki 300 laittaa Xoossaara hemettiiddi de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heenooki muleera 365 laittaa de7iis;

English Sentences: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: i Xoossaara hemettiiddi xayi bayiis; aissi giikko, Xoossai a ekki efiis.

English Sentences: And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maatusaali 187 laittaa de7idi, Laameeka yeliis;

English Sentences: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maatusaali Laameeka yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 782 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maatusaali muleera 969 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laameeki 182 laittaa de7idi, attuma na7a yeliis.

English Sentences: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelidi, "Ha na7ai GODAI qanggido biittaa bollan nuna nu kushiyaa oosuwaa daafuraappe shemppissana" giidi Noha sunttiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when men began to multiply on the face of the earth, and daughters were born unto them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Laameeki Noha yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 595 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: That the sons of God saw the daughters of men that they were fair; and they took them wives of all which they chose.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laameeki muleera 777 laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said, My spirit shall not always strive with man, for that he also is flesh: yet his days shall be an hundred and twenty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee 500 laittaa de7idi, Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeeta yeliis.

English Sentences: There were giants in the earth in those days; and also after that, when the sons of God came in unto the daughters of men, and they bare children to them, the same became mighty men which were of old, men of renown.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai sa7aa bollan darido wode, etau macca naati yelettidosona;

English Sentences: And God saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth, and that every imagination of the thoughts of his heart was only evil continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossaa naata" geetettiya meretati ha asaa macca naati puulanchcha gidiyoogaa be7idosona; be7idi etappe bantta dooridoogeeta machchidosona.

English Sentences: And it repented the LORD that he had made man on the earth, and it grieved him at his heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, "Ta Ayyaanai asan merinau de7enna; aissi giikko, asi haiqqiyaagaa; a laittaikka issi xeetanne laatama gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said, I will destroy man whom I have created from the face of the earth; both man, and beast, and the creeping thing, and the fowls of the air; for it repenteth me that I have made them.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodenne hegaappe guyyiyan Xoossaa naati asaa macca naata ekkin, naati yelettido wode, wogga adussa asati sa7aa bollan de7idosona. Etinne beni wode olau minonne erettida asa.

English Sentences: But Noah found grace in the eyes of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI he wode sa7aa bollan de7iya asaa iitatettai daridoogaanne eti wozanan qoppiyoobai ubbai ubba wodekka iita xalaala gididoogaa be7iis;

English Sentences: These are the generations of Noah: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.
Wolaitta Sentences: be7idi GODAI asaa ha sa7aa bollan medhdhidoogau azzaniis; ba wozanan keehippe seelettiis.

English Sentences: And Noah begat three sons, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau GODAI, "Taani medhdhido asaa ha sa7aa bollappe muleera quccana; asaa, mehiyaa, do7aa, biittaara gooshettiya meretatanne saluwaa kafota xaissana; aissi giikko, taani eta medhdhidoogau azzanaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The earth also was corrupt before God, and the earth was filled with violence.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Nohee GODAA sinttan nashettiis.

English Sentences: And God looked upon the earth, and, behold, it was corrupt; for all flesh had corrupted his way upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee hanidobai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettiis. Nohee xillo asa; i ba wodiyan de7ida asaa giddon suure asa; Nohee Xoossaara hemettiis.

English Sentences: And God said unto Noah, The end of all flesh is come before me; for the earth is filled with violence through them; and, behold, I will destroy them with the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeeta giyo heezzu attuma naata yeliis.

English Sentences: Make thee an ark of gopher wood; rooms shalt thou make in the ark, and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode biittai sa7ai Xoossaa sinttan tuniis; sa7ai ubbai makkalan kumiis.

English Sentences: And this is the fashion which thou shalt make it of: The length of the ark shall be three hundred cubits, the breadth of it fifty cubits, and the height of it thirty cubits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ha sa7aa xeelliis; xeellidi sa7ai tunidoogaa be7iis; aissi giikko, sa7an de7iya asai ubbai ba ogiyaa tunissi wottiis.

English Sentences: A window shalt thou make to the ark, and in a cubit shalt thou finish it above; and the door of the ark shalt thou set in the side thereof; with lower, second, and third stories shalt thou make it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai Noha hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Taani asa ubbaa xaissana hanais; eta gaasuwan sa7ai makkalan kumido gishshau, taani tumuppe asaakka sa7aakka xaissana.

English Sentences: And, behold, I, even I, do bring a flood of waters upon the earth, to destroy all flesh, wherein is the breath of life, from under heaven; and every thing that is in the earth shall die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, mino mittaappe neeyyo markkabiyaa keexxa; he markkabiyaa giddon cora qol77ota kessa; yaatada sooranne kareera shidan meesha.

English Sentences: But with thee will I establish my covenant; and thou shalt come into the ark, thou, and thy sons, and thy wife, and thy sons' wives with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Markkabiyaa hagaadan yaatada keexxa; zananaa heezzu xeetu wara, gomppaa ishatamu wara, geesaa hasttamu wara ootta;

English Sentences: And of every living thing of all flesh, two of every sort shalt thou bring into the ark, to keep them alive with thee; they shall be male and female.
Wolaitta Sentences: markkabiyaassi kaaraa medhdha; kaaraappenne godaappe gidduwan issi wara gidiyaasaa kallo agga baya; penggiyaa markkabiyaassi miyyessaara kessa; markkabiyaa heezzu pooqe kessada keexxa.

English Sentences: Of fowls after their kind, and of cattle after their kind, of every creeping thing of the earth after his kind, two of every sort shall come unto thee, to keep them alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani saloppe garssan de7o shemppoora de7iya mereta ubbaa xaissanau, ha sa7aa bollan bashshaa haattaa yeddana; yeddin ha sa7an de7iyaabai ubbai xayana.

English Sentences: And take thou unto thee of all food that is eaten, and thou shalt gather it to thee; and it shall be for food for thee, and for them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ta maachchaa nenaara maacettana. Neeni ne keettaayyiyo, ne attuma naatanne ne attuma naatu maccaasata nenaara ekkada markkabiyaa giddo gelana.

English Sentences: Thus did Noah; according to all that God commanded him, so did he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti nenaara paxa attana mala, paxa de7iya mereta ubbaappe qommuwan qommuwan attumaagaanne maccaagaa naa77aa naa77aa oottada, markkabiyaa giddo gelissaasa.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Noah, Come thou and all thy house into the ark; for thee have I seen righteous before me in this generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dumma dumma qommo kafuwaappe, dumma dumma qommo mehiyaappenne biittaara gooshettiya dumma dumma qommo meretatuppe ubbaappe naa77aa naa77aa gididi, paxa attana mala neekko yaana.

English Sentences: Of every clean beast thou shalt take to thee by sevens, the male and his female: and of beasts that are not clean by two, the male and his female.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi neeninne nenaara de7iyaageeti maanau, dumma dumma qommo miyo kattaa efaada, markkabiyaa giddon qola" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Of fowls also of the air by sevens, the male and the female; to keep seed alive upon the face of all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Nohee ubbabaakka Xoossai azazidoogaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: For yet seven days, and I will cause it to rain upon the earth forty days and forty nights; and every living substance that I have made will I destroy from off the face of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hegaappe guyyiyan Noha hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni ne so asaa ubbaara markkabiyaa giddo gela; aissi giikko, taani ha wodiyaa yeletaa giddon neeni xillo gididoogaa be7aas.

English Sentences: And Noah did according unto all that the LORD commanded him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni geeshsha gidida mehenne do7a ubbaappe a qommuwaappe qommuwaappe attumaagaanne maccaagaa laappunaa laappunaa, geeshsha gidenna mehenne do7a ubbaappe a qommuwaappe qommuwaappe issi attumaagaanne issi maccaagaa,

English Sentences: And Noah was six hundred years old when the flood of waters was upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi saluwaa kafuwaappe a qommuwaappe qommuwaappe attumaagaanne maccaagaa laappunaa laappunaa oottada, sa7aa ubbaa bollan dumma dumma zerettai paxa attana mala nenaara ekkada gela.

English Sentences: And Noah went in, and his sons, and his wife, and his sons' wives with him, into the ark, because of the waters of the flood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, laappun gallassaappe guyyiyan, taani oitamu gallassaanne oitamu qammaa ha sa7aa bollan iraa bukissana; yaatada taani medhdhido mereta ubbaa sa7aa bollappe quccana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Of clean beasts, and of beasts that are not clean, and of fowls, and of every thing that creepeth upon the earth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Nohee GODAI a azazido ubbabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: There went in two and two unto Noah into the ark, the male and the female, as God had commanded Noah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bashshaa haattai ha sa7aa bolli yiido wode, Nohe laittai usuppun xeeta.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after seven days, that the waters of the flood were upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee, a attuma naati, a keettaayyiyaanne a naatu maccaasati bashshaa haattaappe attanau markkabiyaa giddo gelidosona.

English Sentences: In the six hundredth year of Noah's life, in the second month, the seventeenth day of the month, the same day were all the fountains of the great deep broken up, and the windows of heaven were opened.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha mehiyaappenne do7aappe, geeshsha gidenna mehiyaappenne do7aappe, kafuwaappenne biittaara gooshettiyaageetu ubbaappe

English Sentences: And the rain was upon the earth forty days and forty nights.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Noha azazidoogaadankka attumaageenne maccaagee naa77aa naa77aa gididi, Nohekko markkabiyaa giddo gelidosona.

English Sentences: In the selfsame day entered Noah, and Shem, and Ham, and Japheth, the sons of Noah, and Noah's wife, and the three wives of his sons with them, into the ark;
Wolaitta Sentences: Gelin laappun gallassaappe guyyiyan, bashshaa haattai ha sa7aa bollan yiis.

English Sentences: They, and every beast after his kind, and all the cattle after their kind, and every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind, and every fowl after his kind, every bird of every sort.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee usuppun xeetu laittaa de7in, naa77antta aginan, tammanne laappuntta gallassan, he gallassankka biittaa giddon de7iya gita ciimmaa pultto ubbai xuuqqi bayiis; saluwan de7iya haattaa maskkootetikka dooyetti wodhdhidosona;

English Sentences: And they went in unto Noah into the ark, two and two of all flesh, wherein is the breath of life.
Wolaitta Sentences: dooyettin irai ha sa7aa bollan oitamu gallassaanne oitamu qammaa bukkiis.

English Sentences: And they that went in, went in male and female of all flesh, as God had commanded him: and the LORD shut him in.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassankka Noheenne a attuma naati, Seemi, Kaaminne Yaafeeti, Nohe keettaayyiyaanne a naatu heezzaa maccaasati issippe markkabiyaa giddo gelidosona.

English Sentences: And the flood was forty days upon the earth; and the waters increased, and bare up the ark, and it was lift up above the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etinne do7a ubbaappe ba qommuwan qommuwan, mehe ubbaappekka ba qommuwan qommuwan, biittaara gooshettiyaageetu ubbaappe ba qommuwan qommuwan, kafo ubbaappe ba qommuwan qommuwan, etaara issippe gelidosona;

English Sentences: And the waters prevailed, and were increased greatly upon the earth; and the ark went upon the face of the waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: de7o shemppoora de7iyaageeti ubbai naa77aa naa77aa gididi, Nohekko markkabiyan gelidosona;

English Sentences: And the waters prevailed exceedingly upon the earth; and all the high hills, that were under the whole heaven, were covered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Noha azazidoogaadan, mereta ubbaappe attumanne macca gididi, markkabiyaa giddo gelidosona; gelin Nohee giddon de7ishin, GODAI markkabiyaa penggiyaa gorddiis.

English Sentences: Fifteen cubits upward did the waters prevail; and the mountains were covered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bashshaa haattai oitamu gallassaa sa7aa bollan bukkiiddi gam77iis; haattai daridi, markkabiyaa biittaappe pude denttiis.

English Sentences: And all flesh died that moved upon the earth, both of fowl, and of cattle, and of beast, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth, and every man:
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattai biittaa bollan keehippe darin, markkabee haattaa bollan toohettiis.

English Sentences: All in whose nostrils was the breath of life, of all that was in the dry land, died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloppe garssaara de7iya xoqqa dereti ubbai mitettana gakkanaashin, haattai ha sa7aa bollan keehi wolqqaappe dariis.

English Sentences: And every living substance was destroyed which was upon the face of the ground, both man, and cattle, and the creeping things, and the fowl of the heaven; and they were destroyed from the earth: and Noah only remained alive, and they that were with him in the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattai deretu xeeraappe aadhdhidi, tammanne ichchashu wara gakkanaashin tookkiis.

English Sentences: And the waters prevailed upon the earth an hundred and fifty days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin sa7aa bollan paxa qaaxxiya meretati ubbai: kafoi, mehee, do7ai, sa7aa bollan sham77i giya mereta ubbainne asai ubbai haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And God remembered Noah, and every living thing, and all the cattle that was with him in the ark: and God made a wind to pass over the earth, and the waters asswaged;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, mela biittaa bollan de7iya, ba siireera de7o shemppuwaa shemppiya ubbaikka haiqqiis.

English Sentences: The fountains also of the deep and the windows of heaven were stopped, and the rain from heaven was restrained;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7an paxa de7iyaabai ubbai: asai, meheenne do7ai, biittaara gooshettiya meretatinne saluwaa kafoti ubbaikka sa7aappe qucettidosona. Qucettin Nohe xalaalainne aara markkabe giddon de7iyaageeti attidosona.

English Sentences: And the waters returned from off the earth continually: and after the end of the hundred and fifty days the waters were abated.
Wolaitta Sentences: He haattai xeetanne ishatamu gallassa gakkanaassi sa7aa bollan gam77iis.

English Sentences: And the ark rested in the seventh month, on the seventeenth day of the month, upon the mountains of Ararat.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai Noha, aara markkabiyaa giddon de7iya do7a ubbaanne mehe ubbaa qoppiis; qoppidi sa7aa bollan carkkuwaa carkkissiis; carkkissin he haattai wodhdhi wodhdhi biis.

English Sentences: And the waters decreased continually until the tenth month: in the tenth month, on the first day of the month, were the tops of the mountains seen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi biittaa giddon de7iya ciimmaa pulttoinne saluwan de7iya haattaa maskkooteti gorddettidosona; iraikka saluwan teqettiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the end of forty days, that Noah opened the window of the ark which he had made:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin haattai wodhdhi wodhdhi biis. He xeetanne ishatamantta gallassaappe guyyiyan, haattai wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And he sent forth a raven, which went forth to and fro, until the waters were dried up from off the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattai wodhdhin markkabee laappuntta aginan, tammanne laappuntta gallassan Araaraate giyo deretu bolli shemppiis.

English Sentences: Also he sent forth a dove from him, to see if the waters were abated from off the face of the ground;
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattai tammantta aginai gakkanaassikka wodhdhi wodhdhi biis; tammantta aginaayyo koiro gallassi deretuyyo xeerai beettiis.

English Sentences: But the dove found no rest for the sole of her foot, and she returned unto him into the ark, for the waters were on the face of the whole earth: then he put forth his hand, and took her, and pulled her in unto him into the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oitamu gallassaappe guyyiyan, Nohee ba keexxido markkabiyaa maskkootiyaa dooyiis;

English Sentences: And he stayed yet other seven days; and again he sent forth the dove out of the ark;
Wolaitta Sentences: dooyidi issi quuruwaa kare yeddiis; yeddin quuroi haattai biittaa bollappe melana gakkanaassi, yaanne haanne paalliiddi gam77iis.

English Sentences: And the dove came in to him in the evening; and, lo, in her mouth was an olive leaf pluckt off: so Noah knew that the waters were abated from off the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Nohee haattai biittaa bollappe wodhdhi wuridaakkonne be7anau issi haraphphiyo kare yeddiis;

English Sentences: And he stayed yet other seven days; and sent forth the dove; which returned not again unto him any more.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin he haraphphiyaa haattai biittaa ubbaa bollan ha77ikka de7iyo gishshau, shemppiyoosaa demmabeikku. Hegaa gishshau simmada, markkabiyaa giddon de7iya Nohekko yaasu; yin i ba kushiyaa yeddidi, baakko markkabiyaa giddo ekkiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the six hundredth and first year, in the first month, the first day of the month, the waters were dried up from off the earth: and Noah removed the covering of the ark, and looked, and, behold, the face of the ground was dry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hara laappun gallassaa takkidi, haraphphiyo zaarettidikka markkabiyaa giddoppe kessidi yeddiis.

English Sentences: And in the second month, on the seven and twentieth day of the month, was the earth dried.
Wolaitta Sentences: He haraphphiyaa sa7ai omariyo wode akko simmada yaasu; yaidda wogaraa aacaappe duuttido irxxa haittaa ba doonan saxxa ekkada yaasu. Hegaa gishshau, haattai biittaa bollappe wodhdhidoogaa Nohee eriis.

English Sentences: And God spake unto Noah, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Nohee hara laappun gallassaa takkidi, he haraphphiyo zaarettidi yeddiis; shin he haraphphiyaa akko simmada yabeikku.

English Sentences: Go forth of the ark, thou, and thy wife, and thy sons, and thy sons' wives with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee usuppun xeetanne isiini laittaa de7in, koiro aginan koiro gallassi, haattai biittaa bollappe xi77iis; Nohee markkabiyaa qum77uwaa qaari xeellidi, biittai xi77idoogaa be7iis.

English Sentences: Bring forth with thee every living thing that is with thee, of all flesh, both of fowl, and of cattle, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth; that they may breed abundantly in the earth, and be fruitful, and multiply upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto aginan laatamanne laappuntta gallassan, biittai muleera meliis.

English Sentences: And Noah went forth, and his sons, and his wife, and his sons' wives with him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai he wode Noha hagaadan yaagidi azaziis;

English Sentences: Every beast, every creeping thing, and every fowl, and whatsoever creepeth upon the earth, after their kinds, went forth out of the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni ne keettaayyiyo, ne attuma naatanne ne naatu maccaasata ekkada markkabiyaa giddoppe kiya.

English Sentences: And Noah builded an altar unto the LORD; and took of every clean beast, and of every clean fowl, and offered burnt offerings on the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yelettidi, daridi corattana mala, paxa de7iya mereta ubbaappe nenaara de7iyaageeta: kafota, meheta, do7atanne biittaara gooshettiya ubbaa nenaara kessa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD smelled a sweet savour; and the LORD said in his heart, I will not again curse the ground any more for man's sake; for the imagination of man's heart is evil from his youth; neither will I again smite any more every thing living, as I have done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Nohee ba attuma naatuura, ba keettaayeeranne ba naatu maccaasatuura markkabiyaa giddoppe kiyiis.

English Sentences: While the earth remaineth, seedtime and harvest, and cold and heat, and summer and winter, and day and night shall not cease.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiyin mehenne do7a ubbai, biittaara gooshettiya mereta ubbai, kafo ubbainne sa7aa bollan woxxi qaaxxiyaabai ubbai ba qommuwan qommuwan markkabiyaa giddoppe kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And God blessed Noah and his sons, and said unto them, Be fruitful, and multiply, and replenish the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiyidoogaappe guyyiyan, Nohee GODAAYYO yarshshiyoosaa gimbbiis; gimbbidi geeshsha mehiyaanne do7aa ubbaappenne geeshsha kafo ubbaappe ekkidi, yarshshiyoosan xuuggidi yarshshiis.

English Sentences: And the fear of you and the dread of you shall be upon every beast of the earth, and upon every fowl of the air, upon all that moveth upon the earth, and upon all the fishes of the sea; into your hand are they delivered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin GODAI yarshshuwaa peenuwaa sawiyaagaa singgidi, ba wozanan hagaadan yaagiis; "Naatettaasappe doommin, asi wozanan qoppiyoobai ubbai iita gidikkokka, taani asa gishshau gaada naa77antto mulekka ha sa7aa qanggikke. Qassi taani ha77i oottidoogaadan paxa de7iya mereta ubbaa naa77antto mulekka xaissikke.

English Sentences: Every moving thing that liveth shall be meat for you; even as the green herb have I given you all things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7ai de7ido peesha ubban, zeriyo wodeenne cakkiyo wodee, meegoinne hombbee, boneenne balggoi, gallassainne qammai ubbatookka de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But flesh with the life thereof, which is the blood thereof, shall ye not eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Nohanne a attuma naata hagaadan yaagidi anjjiis; "Yelettite; corattite; sa7a ubbaa kumite.

English Sentences: And surely your blood of your lives will I require; at the hand of every beast will I require it, and at the hand of man; at the hand of every man's brother will I require the life of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa do7ati ubbai, saluwaa kafoti ubbai, biittan woxxi qaaxxiyaabai ubbainne abban de7iya moleti ubbai intteyyo yayyonanne dagammona. Eti intteyyo aadhdhidi imettidosona;

English Sentences: Whoso sheddeth man's blood, by man shall his blood be shed: for in the image of God made he man.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani mokkiya dumma dumma kattata intteyyo immidoogaadankka, paxa de7iya woxxi qaaxxiya mereta ubbai intteyyo quma gidana.

English Sentences: And you, be ye fruitful, and multiply; bring forth abundantly in the earth, and multiply therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin biron shemppoora de7iya suuttai a giddon de7iyo ashuwaa mooppite.

English Sentences: And God spake unto Noah, and to his sons with him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte shemppuwaara de7iya intte suuttaa do7a ubbaappe tumu achchana; qassi asa ubbaappekka, a mala asaa suuttaa achchana.

English Sentences: And I, behold, I establish my covenant with you, and with your seed after you;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai asaa bana Xoossaa milatissidi medhdhido gishshau, asa suutta gussiya oona gidikkonne, a suuttaikka asa kushen gukkana.

English Sentences: And with every living creature that is with you, of the fowl, of the cattle, and of every beast of the earth with you; from all that go out of the ark, to every beast of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte yelettite; corattite; sa7an darite; an corattite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I will establish my covenant with you; neither shall all flesh be cut off any more by the waters of a flood; neither shall there any more be a flood to destroy the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai Nohanne aara de7iya a attuma naata hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: And God said, This is the token of the covenant which I make between me and you and every living creature that is with you, for perpetual generations:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi ha77i, taani ta maachchaa inttenaara,

English Sentences: I do set my bow in the cloud, and it shall be for a token of a covenant between me and the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: intteppe guyyiyan intte zerettaaranne paxa nenaara de7iya mereta ubbaara maacettais; ee, taani ta maachchaa kafuwaara, mehiyaara, sa7aa do7a ubbaaranne, markkabiyaappe inttenaara kiyida, paxa de7iya mereta ubbaara maacettais.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when I bring a cloud over the earth, that the bow shall be seen in the cloud:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttenaara ta maachchaa maacettais; hagaappe sinttan paxa de7iyaabai ubbai bashshaa haattan mulekka xayenna; ha sa7aa bashshiya haatti hagaappe sinttan mulekka de7enna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I will remember my covenant, which is between me and you and every living creature of all flesh; and the waters shall no more become a flood to destroy all flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Xoossai, "Taani taappenne intteppe, inttenaara de7iya paxa meretatu ubbaappe gidduwan yaana yeleta ubbaara maacettiyo maachchaa malaatai hagaa;

English Sentences: And the bow shall be in the cloud; and I will look upon it, that I may remember the everlasting covenant between God and every living creature of all flesh that is upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ta zuullaa shaaran essaas; i taappenne ha sa7aappe gidduwan de7iya maachchau malaata gidana.

English Sentences: And God said unto Noah, This is the token of the covenant, which I have established between me and all flesh that is upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani sa7aappe bollan shaaraa ehiido wodenne shaaran zuullai beettido wode,

English Sentences: And the sons of Noah, that went forth of the ark, were Shem, and Ham, and Japheth: and Ham is the father of Canaan.
Wolaitta Sentences: taappenne intteppe paxa de7iya dumma dumma qommo mereta ubbaappe gidduwan maacettido ta maachchaa hassayana; paxa de7iyaabaa ubbaa xaissanau hagaappe sinttan mulekka bashshaa haatti yeenna.

English Sentences: These are the three sons of Noah: and of them was the whole earth overspread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zuullai shaaran beettido wode audenne, taani a be7ana; be7ada taappe Xoossaappenne ha sa7aa bollan paxa de7iya dumma dumma qommo mereta ubbaappe gidduwan maacettido merinaa maachchaa taani hassayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Noah began to be an husbandman, and he planted a vineyard:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Xoossai Noha, "Taani taappenne ha sa7aa bollan paxa de7iyaabaa ubbaappe gidduwan maacettido maachchaa malaatai hagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he drank of the wine, and was drunken; and he was uncovered within his tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Markkabiyaappe kiyida Nohe attuma naati Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeeta; Kaami Kanaane aawaa.

English Sentences: And Ham, the father of Canaan, saw the nakedness of his father, and told his two brethren without.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti heezzaikka Nohe naata; sa7an ubban de7iya asai etappe yelettiis.

English Sentences: And Shem and Japheth took a garment, and laid it upon both their shoulders, and went backward, and covered the nakedness of their father; and their faces were backward, and they saw not their father's nakedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee goshshanchcha; i woiniyaa turaa tokettaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And Noah awoke from his wine, and knew what his younger son had done unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi i he woiniyaa eessaa uyidi mattottiis; mattottidi ba dunkkaaniyaa giddon kallo xiire zin77iis.

English Sentences: And he said, Cursed be Canaan; a servant of servants shall he be unto his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kanaane aawaa Kaami ba aawaa kalluwaa be7iis; be7idi, kare kiyidi, ba naa77u ishanttuyyo yootiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Blessed be the LORD God of Shem; and Canaan shall be his servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Seeminne Yaafeeti afala issuwaa ekkidi, naa77aikka bantta hashiyaara hashiyaara gatti oiqqidi, guyyegutti hemetti gelidi, bantta aawaa kalluwaa kammidosona; eti bantta aawaa kalluwaa be7enna mala bantta som77uwaa wora zaaridosona.

English Sentences: God shall enlarge Japheth, and he shall dwell in the tents of Shem; and Canaan shall be his servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee mattoi aadhdhin beegottidi, a na7ai ubbaappe kaaloi a oottidobaa eriis.

English Sentences: And Noah lived after the flood three hundred and fifty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eridi a, "Kanaani qanggettidaagaa gido! I ba ishanttuyyo wurssetta aille gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the days of Noah were nine hundred and fifty years: and he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Nohee, "GODAI, Seema Xoossai galatetto! Kanaani Seema aille gido;

English Sentences: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Yaafeeta biittaa aasso. Yaafeeta zareti Seema zaretu giddon de7ona; Kanaani Yaafeeta aille gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bashshaa haattaappe guyyiyan, Nohee heezzu xeetanne ishatamu laittaa de7iis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohee muleera uddufun xeetanne ishatamu laittaa de7idi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nohe naatu, Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeeta yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa; bashshaa haattaappe guyyiyan, etau attuma naati yelettidosona.

English Sentences: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaafeeta attuma naati: Goomera, Maagooga, Maadaaya, Yaawaana, Tubaala, Meshekanne Tiiraasa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goomera attuma naati: Ashkkanaaza, Riifaatanne Togarmma.

English Sentences: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtechah: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaawaana attuma naati: Eliisha, Tarsseesa, Kitiimanne Rooda.

English Sentences: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageetuppe abbaa doonan de7iya asai ubbai ba biittan biittan, ba qaalan qaalan, ba yaran yaraaninne, ba kawotettan kawotettan shaahettidosona.

English Sentences: He was a mighty hunter before the Lord : wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the Lord .
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaama attuma naati: Kuusha, Mixiraima, Puuxanne Kanaana.

English Sentences: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kuusha attuma naati: Saaba, Hawiila, Saabita, Raa7imanne Sabttaka. Raa7ima attuma naati: Saabanne Dadaana.

English Sentences: Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kuushi Naamiruuda yeliis; Naamiruudi ha sa7an koiro wolqqaama olanchcha gidiis;

English Sentences: And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sinttankka i wolqqaama shankkanchcha gidiis; "Naamiruudadan GODAA sinttan wolqqaama shankkanchcha gida" giyoogee hegaa gishshassa.

English Sentences: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
Wolaitta Sentences: A kawotettaayyo koiro katamati Sanaa7oore biittan de7iya Baabiloone, Ereeka, Akkaadanne Kalnna.

English Sentences: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim.
Wolaitta Sentences: I he biittaappe Asoore biidi, Nanawe, Rahobootanne Kaalaha keexxiis;

English Sentences: And Canaan begat Sidon his first born, and Heth,
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Nanaweppenne Kaalahappe gidduwan de7iya Reseena giyo gita katamaakka keexxiis.

English Sentences: And the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgasite,
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Mixiraimi Ludeta, Anaameta, Lahaabeta, Nafttuuheta,

English Sentences: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Patiroosata, Kaasiluuhetanne Pilisxxeema zareta yelida Kafttooreta yeliis.

English Sentences: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite: and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Kanaanee ba baira na7aa Sidoonanne Heeta yeliis;

English Sentences: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and Gomorrah, and Admah, and Zeboiim, even unto Lasha.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Kanaanee Yaabuusata, Amooreta, Gerggeeseta,

English Sentences: These are the sons of Ham, after their families, after their tongues, in their countries, and in their nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Hiiweta, Arqqeta, Siinata,

English Sentences: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Ariwaadeta, Xamaaretanne Hamaatata yeliis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kanaane zareti laalettin,

English Sentences: The children of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kanaane biittaa zawai Sidoonappe doommidi, Garaaraaranne Gaazaara kanttidi, Sadoomanne Gamoora, Adaamanne Xaboima biidi, Lashaa7an zawatees.

English Sentences: And the children of Aram; Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Mash.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaama attuma naati bantta yaran yaran, bantta qaalan qaalan, bantta biittan biittaaninne bantta kawotettan kawotettan xaafettidaageeti hageeta.

English Sentences: And Arphaxad begat Salah; and Salah begat Eber.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seemau naati yelettidosona; i Yaafeetayyo baira ishaanne Eboora naatu ubbaayyo maizza aawaa.

English Sentences: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother's name was Joktan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seema attuma naati: Elaama, Asoora, Arifaakisaada, Luudanne Araama.

English Sentences: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Araama attuma naati: Uuxa, Huula, Geteeranne Mesheka.

English Sentences: And Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Arifaakisaadi SHelaaha yeliis. SHelaahi Eboora yeliis.

English Sentences: And Obal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eboorau naa77u attuma naati yelettidosona. Issuwaa sunttai Peeleega; aissi giikko, sa7an de7iya asai a wodiyan shaahettiis; a ishaa sunttai Yoqixaana.

English Sentences: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were the sons of Joktan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoqixaani naata yeliis. Etinne: Almmodaada, SHeleefa, Haxarmmaaweta, Yeraaha,

English Sentences: And their dwelling was from Mesha, as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadoraama, Uzaala, Diiqila,

English Sentences: These are the sons of Shem, after their families, after their tongues, in their lands, after their nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oobaala, Abimaa7eela, Saaba,

English Sentences: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ofiira, Hawiilanne Yobaaba. Hageeti ubbaikka Yoqixaana attuma naata.

English Sentences: And the whole earth was of one language, and of one speech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti de7ido heerai Meeshappe biidi arshsho baggaara de7iya deree dariyo biittan Safaara gakkees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as they journeyed from the east, that they found a plain in the land of Shinar; and they dwelt there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seema attuma naati bantta yaran yaran, bantta qaalan qaalan, bantta biittan biittaaninne bantta kawotettan kawotettan xaafettidaageeti hageeta.

English Sentences: And they said one to another, Go to, let us make brick, and burn them thoroughly. And they had brick for stone, and slime had they for morter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti bantta yaran yaraaninne bantta kawotettan kawotettan xaafettida Nohe attuma naatu zareta. Bashshaa haattaappe simmin, kawotettati hageetuppe sa7a ubbau laalettidosona.

English Sentences: And they said, Go to, let us build us a city and a tower, whose top may reach unto heaven; and let us make us a name, lest we be scattered abroad upon the face of the whole earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa bollan de7iya asi ubbi koiro issi doonaanne issi qaalaa haasayees.

English Sentences: And the Lord came down to see the city and the tower, which the children of men builded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asati arshsho baggi simmidi biido wode, Sanaa7oore giyo biittan dembba issuwaa demmidi yan, uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD said, Behold, the people is one, and they have all one language; and this they begin to do: and now nothing will be restrained from them, which they have imagined to do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti issoi issuwaa, "Haayite; xuubiyaa medhdhidi, taman xuuggoos" yaagidosona. Yaagidi eti shuchchaa gishshaa xuubiyaa, urqqaa gishshaa shidaa ekkidosona;

English Sentences: Go to, let us go down, and there confound their language, that they may not understand one another's speech.
Wolaitta Sentences: ekkidi, "Haayite; nu sunttaa xeesissanaunne qassi nuuni ha sa7aa ubbaa bollan laalettennan attanau issi gita katamaanne xeerai saluwaa gakkiyo issi pooqiyaa nuuyyo keexxoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So the LORD scattered them abroad from thence upon the face of all the earth: and they left off to build the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI asati keexxido gita katamaanne pooqiyaa be7anau duge wodhdhiis;

English Sentences: Therefore is the name of it called Babel; because the LORD did there confound the language of all the earth: and from thence did the LORD scatter them abroad upon the face of all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: wodhdhidi GODAI hagaadan yaagiis; "Hekko eti issi asa; qassi eti ubbaikka issi qaalan haasayoosona; eti ha77i hagaa oottanau doommiichchaappe guyyiyan, eti banttayyo oottanau qoppiyooban etau danddayettennabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: These are the generations of Shem: Shem was an hundred years old, and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood:
Wolaitta Sentences: Haayite; duge wodhdhidi eti issoi haasayiyo qaalaa issoi erenna mala, eta qaalaa dummayoos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Shem lived after he begat Arphaxad five hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi GODAI eta hegaappe sa7a ubbaa bollan laalin, eti he gita katamaa keexxiyoogaa aggi bayidosona.

English Sentences: And Arphaxad lived five and thirty years, and begat Salah:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI sa7aa asaa qaalaa yan dummayido gishshau, he katamai Baabiloona geetettiis. GODAI eta hegaappe sa7a ubbaa bollan laaliis.

English Sentences: And Arphaxad lived after he begat Salah four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seema yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Bashshaa haattaappe guyyiyan, naa77u laitta gidin, Seema laittai xeetaa gidido wode, Seemi Arifaakisaada yeliis.

English Sentences: And Salah lived thirty years, and begat Eber:
Wolaitta Sentences: Seemi Arifaakisaada yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, ichchashu xeetu laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Salah lived after he begat Eber four hundred and three years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arifaakisaadi 35 laittaa de7idi, SHelaaha yeliis;

English Sentences: And Eber lived four and thirty years, and begat Peleg:
Wolaitta Sentences: Arifaakisaadi SHelaaha yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 403 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Eber lived after he begat Peleg four hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHelaahi 30 laittaa de7idi, Eboora yeliis;

English Sentences: And Peleg lived thirty years, and begat Reu:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHelaahi Eboora yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 403 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Peleg lived after he begat Reu two hundred and nine years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eboori 34 laittaa de7idi, Peeleega yeliis;

English Sentences: And Reu lived two and thirty years, and begat Serug:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eboori Peeleega yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 430 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Reu lived after he begat Serug two hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Peeleegi 30 laittaa de7idi, Raa7a yeliis;

English Sentences: And Serug lived thirty years, and begat Nahor:
Wolaitta Sentences: Peeleegi Raa7a yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 209 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raa7u 32 laitta de7idi, Saruuga yeliis;

English Sentences: And Nahor lived nine and twenty years, and begat Terah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Raa7u Saruuga yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 207 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Nahor lived after he begat Terah an hundred and nineteen years, and begat sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saruugi 30 laittaa de7idi, Naakoora yeliis;

English Sentences: And Terah lived seventy years, and begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saruugi Naakoora yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 200 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: Now these are the generations of Terah: Terah begat Abram, Nahor, and Haran; and Haran begat Lot.
