Wolaitta Sentences: Naakoori 29 laittaa de7idi, Taara yeliis;

English Sentences: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity, in Ur of the Chaldees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naakoori Taara yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, 119 laittaa de7iis; hara attuma naatakka macca naatakka yeliis.

English Sentences: And Abram and Nahor took them wives: the name of Abram's wife was Sarai; and the name of Nahor's wife, Milcah, the daughter of Haran, the father of Milcah, and the father of Iscah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taari 70 laittaa de7idi, Abraama, Naakooranne Haaraana yeliis.

English Sentences: But Sarai was barren; she had no child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taara yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Taari Abraama, Naakooranne Haaraana yeliis; yelin Haaraani Looxa yeliis.

English Sentences: And Terah took Abram his son, and Lot the son of Haran his son's son, and Sarai his daughter in law, his son Abram's wife; and they went forth with them from Ur of the Chaldees, to go into the land of Canaan; and they came unto Haran, and dwelt there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haaraani ba aawai Taari paxa de7ishin, ba yelettido Kaladaawetu biittan, Uura giyo gita kataman haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the days of Terah were two hundred and five years: and Terah died in Haran.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraaminne Naakoorinne naa77aikka machchidosona; Abraama keettaayee sunttai Saarayo; qassi Naakoora keettaayee sunttai Milkko; Milkka Haaraana na7iyo; Haaraani Milkkissinne Yiskkaanisi aawaa.

English Sentences: Now the LORD had said unto Abram, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and from thy father's house, unto a land that I will shew thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Saaraya maine; iyyo na7i baawa.

English Sentences: And I will make of thee a great nation, and I will bless thee, and make thy name great; and thou shalt be a blessing:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taari ba na7aa Abraama, ba na7aa Haaraana na7aa Looxanne, ba na7aa Abraama keettaayyiyo Saarayo ekkidi kiyin, eti issippe Kanaane biitti baanau Uuri giyo Kaladaawetu katamaappe denddidosona; shin eti Kaaraane giyo katamaa gakkanaashin biidi, yan utti bayidosona.

English Sentences: And I will bless them that bless thee, and curse him that curseth thee: and in thee shall all families of the earth be blessed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taari naa77u xeetanne ichchashu laittaa de7idi, Kaaraanen haiqqiis.

English Sentences: So Abram departed, as the LORD had spoken unto him; and Lot went with him: and Abram was seventy and five years old when he departed out of Haran.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Abraama yaagiis; "Neeni ne biittaappe, ne dabbotuppenne ne aawaa keettaa asaappe shaahettada, taani nena bessiyo biitti ba.

English Sentences: And Abram took Sarai his wife, and Lot his brother's son, and all their substance that they had gathered, and the souls that they had gotten in Haran; and they went forth to go into the land of Canaan; and into the land of Canaan they came.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena gita kawotetta oottana; qassi taani nena anjjana; taani ne sunttaa gitayana; yaatin neeni anjjo gidana;

English Sentences: And Abram passed through the land unto the place of Sichem, unto the plain of Moreh. And the Canaanite was then in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani nena anjjiyaageeta anjjana; qassi nena qanggiyaageeta taani qanggana; ha sa7aa bollan de7iya asai ubbai ne baggaara anjjettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD appeared unto Abram, and said, Unto thy seed will I give this land: and there builded he an altar unto the LORD, who appeared unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abraami GODAI ayyo odidoogaadan denddidi biis; Looxeekka aara biis; Abraami Kaaraaneppe biido wode, ayyo laittai laappun tammanne ichchasha.

English Sentences: And he removed from thence unto a mountain on the east of Bethel, and pitched his tent, having Bethel on the west, and Hai on the east: and there he builded an altar unto the LORD, and called upon the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami ba keettaayyiyo Saarayo, ba ishaa na7aa Looxa, yan shiishshido bantta aquwaa ubbaanne, Kaaraanen eti demmido ashkkarata ekkidi, Kanaane biitti baanau denddiis; biidi eti Kanaane biitti gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And Abram journeyed, going on still toward the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gakkin Abraami he biittan Sekeemi giyoosan de7iya Moore giyo gita wolaa gakkanaassi hemettidi biis. He wode Kanaane asati he biittan de7oosona.

English Sentences: And there was a famine in the land: and Abram went down into Egypt to sojourn there; for the famine was grievous in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI Abraamayyo qonccidi a, "Ha biittaa taani ne zerettaayyo immana" yaagiis. Yaagin i baayyo qonccida GODAAYYO he sohuwan yarshshiyoosaa keexxidi goinniis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he was come near to enter into Egypt, that he said unto Sarai his wife, Behold now, I know that thou art a fair woman to look upon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe denddidi, Beeteeleppe arshsho baggaara de7iya deretiyaasaa biidi, hegan Beeteele arggo baggi aggidi, qassi Aaye arshsho baggi aggidi, gidduwan ba dunkkaaniyaa toliis; hegan GODAAYYO yarshshiyoosaa keexxidi, GODAA sunttaa xeesiis.

English Sentences: Therefore it shall come to pass, when the Egyptians shall see thee, that they shall say, This is his wife: and they will kill me, but they will save thee alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Abraami yaappe denddidi biidi Neegeeba bazzuwaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: Say, I pray thee, thou art my sister: that it may be well with me for thy sake; and my soul shall live because of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode he biittai koshatiis; koshai suullido gishshau, Abraami amarida wodiyaa de7anau duge Gibxxe wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, when Abram was come into Egypt, the Egyptians beheld the woman that she was very fair.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe gelana hanishin, Abraami ba keettaayyiyo Saarayo hagaadan yaagiis; "Siya; neeni keehippe meraa lo77o maccaasa gidiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: The princes also of Pharaoh saw her, and commended her before Pharaoh: and the woman was taken into Pharaoh's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe asati nena be7iyo wode eti, Hanna a keettaayyiyo yaagana; yaagidi eti tana worana; shin nena paxa aggi bayana.

English Sentences: And he entreated Abram well for her sake: and he had sheep, and oxen, and he asses, and menservants, and maidservants, and she asses, and camels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi eti taayyo ne gaasuwan kehana malanne, qassi taani haiqqennan ne gaasuwan attana mala neeni, Taani a michchiyo yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD plagued Pharaoh and his house with great plagues because of Sarai Abram's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami Gibxxe biittaa gelido wode, Gibxxe asati he maccaasiyaa daro meraa lo77o maccaasa gidiyoogaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: And Pharaoh called Abram, and said, What is this that thou hast done unto me? why didst thou not tell me that she was thy wife?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Gibxxe kawuwaassi oottiya halaqatikka o be7ido wode, kawuwaa sinttan o nashshidosona; yaatidi o kawuwaa keettaa efiidosona.

English Sentences: Why saidst thou, She is my sister? so I might have taken her to me to wife: now therefore behold thy wife, take her, and go thy way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin i gaasuwan kawoi Abraama lo77o aifiyan xeelliis; xeellidi Abraamayyo dorssatanne boorata, attuma haretanne macca hareta, attuma ashkkaratanne macca ashkkarata, gaameelatakka immiis.

English Sentences: And Pharaoh commanded his men concerning him: and they sent him away, and his wife, and all that he had.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI Abraama keettaayee Saarayi gaasuwan Gibxxe kawuwaa bollinne a so asaa bolli hanttaara harggiyaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Abram went up out of Egypt, he, and his wife, and all that he had, and Lot with him, into the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin kawoi Abraama xeesidi, "Neeni hagaa aissi ta bolli oottadii? A ne keettaayyiyo gididoogaa aissi taayyo odabeikkii?

English Sentences: And Abram was very rich in cattle, in silver, and in gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni o, A ta michchiyo gaada taayyo aissi yootadii? Taani o ta machcho oottanau ekkidoi hegaa gishshassa. Simmi ha77i ne keettaayyiyo hanno be7a; o ekkada ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went on his journeys from the south even to Bethel, unto the place where his tent had been at the beginning, between Bethel and Hai;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi ba asata azazin, eti Abraama a keettaayeeranne ayyo de7iya ubbabaara kessidi yeddidosona.

English Sentences: Unto the place of the altar, which he had made there at the first: and there Abram called on the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Abraami ba keettaayeeranne, baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaara Gibxxeppe Neegeeba bazzuwaa biis; Looxeekka aara biis.

English Sentences: And Lot also, which went with Abram, had flocks, and herds, and tents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami he wode mehiyan, biraaninne worqqan daro duretiis.

English Sentences: And the land was not able to bear them, that they might dwell together: for their substance was great, so that they could not dwell together.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Neegeebappe denddidi Beeteele gakkanaassi biis; he sohoinne Beeteeleppenne Aayippe gidduwan i koiro ba dunkkaaniyaa tolido sohuwaanne

English Sentences: And there was a strife between the herdmen of Abram's cattle and the herdmen of Lot's cattle: and the Canaanite and the Perizzite dwelled then in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: yarshshiyoosaa i koiro keexxido sohuwaa. Yan Abraami GODAA sunttaa xeesiis.

English Sentences: And Abram said unto Lot, Let there be no strife, I pray thee, between me and thee, and between my herdmen and thy herdmen; for we be brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraamaara yuuyiya Looxeyyookka miizzai, dorssaa wudeenne dunkkaanee de7ees.

English Sentences: Is not the whole land before thee? separate thyself, I pray thee, from me: if thou wilt take the left hand, then I will go to the right; or if thou depart to the right hand, then I will go to the left.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti issippe de7anau etau biittai gidibeenna; etau daro mehee de7iyo gishshau, eti issippe de7anau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: And Lot lifted up his eyes, and beheld all the plain of Jordan, that it was well watered every where, before the LORD destroyed Sodom and Gomorrah, even as the garden of the LORD, like the land of Egypt, as thou comest unto Zoar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gaasuwan Abraama wudiyaa heemmiyaageetu giddooninne Looxe wudiyaa heemmiyaageetu giddon ooshshai kiyiis. He wode Kanaanetinne Parzzeti he biittan de7oosona.

English Sentences: Then Lot chose him all the plain of Jordan; and Lot journeyed east: and they separated themselves the one from the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin Abraami Looxa, "Nuuni ishantta gidiyo gishshau, ta giddooninne ne giddon, ta wudiyaa heemmiyaageetu giddooninne ne wudiyaa heemmiyaageetu giddon ooshsha kessoppa.

English Sentences: Abram dwelled in the land of Canaan, and Lot dwelled in the cities of the plain, and pitched his tent toward Sodom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biitta ubbai ne sinttan de7ennee? Ane nuuni shaahettoos; neeni haddirssa baggi biikko, taani ushachcha baggi baana; neeni ushachcha baggi biikko, taani haddirssa baggi baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But the men of Sodom were wicked and sinners before the LORD exceedingly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Looxee yuuyi aadhdhi xeellidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa wombbai ubbai biidi Zoo7aara gakkanaassi, GODAA gannatiyaa woikko Gibxxe biittaa mala daro haattai de7iyoogaa gidiyoogaa be7iis. Hegeenne GODAI Sadoomanne Gamoora geetettiya katamata xaissanaappe kase.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Abram, after that Lot was separated from him, Lift up now thine eyes, and look from the place where thou art northward, and southward, and eastward, and westward:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Looxee baayyo Yorddaanoosa wombbaa ubbaa dooridi, arshsho baggi biis; yaatin eti issoi issuwaappe shaahettidosona.

English Sentences: For all the land which thou seest, to thee will I give it, and to thy seed for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami Kanaane biittan de7i bayiis; shin Looxee wombban de7iya gita katamatu gidduwan uttidi, Sadooma katamaa matan ba dunkkaaniyaa toliis.

English Sentences: And I will make thy seed as the dust of the earth: so that if a man can number the dust of the earth, then shall thy seed also be numbered.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Sadooma asati iitanne GODAA bolli pala nagaraa oottiyaageeta.

English Sentences: Arise, walk through the land in the length of it and in the breadth of it; for I will give it unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Looxee Abraamappe shaahettidoogaappe guyyiyan, GODAI Abraama hagaadan yaagiis; "Xoqqu gaada neeni de7iyoosaappe arshsho bagginne arggo baggi, qassi huuphessa bagginne tohossa baggi xeella.

English Sentences: Then Abram removed his tent, and came and dwelt in the plain of Mamre, which is in Hebron, and built there an altar unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha neeni xeelliyo biitta ubbaa taani neeyyoonne ne zariyaayyo merinau immana;

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the days of Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer king of Elam, and Tidal king of nations;
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ne zariyaa sa7aa shafiyaadan darissana; ooninne sa7aa shafiyaa qoodana danddayikko, ne zareekka qoodettana.

English Sentences: That these made war with Bera king of Sodom, and with Birsha king of Gomorrah, Shinab king of Admah, and Shemeber king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela, which is Zoar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dendda; denddada biittaa gomppan pudenne dugenne hininne haanne hemettada be7a; aissi giikko, taani ha biittaa neeyyo immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: All these were joined together in the vale_of_Siddim, which is the salt_sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abraami ba dunkkaaniyaa shoddidi, Kebroona kataman de7iya Mamire wolatu gitatu matan de7anau biis. Hegan GODAAYYO yarshshiyo sohuwaa keexxiis.

English Sentences: Twelve years they served Chedorlaomer, and in the thirteenth year they rebelled.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Sanaa7oore Kawoi Amiraafeeli, Ellaasaara Kawoi Ariyooki, Elaama Kawoi Kadorllaa7oomerinne Goima Kawoi Tidi7aali oiddai,

English Sentences: And in the fourteenth year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the Rephaims in Ashteroth_Karnaim, and the Zuzims in Ham, and the Emims in Shaveh_Kiriathaim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sadooma Kawuwaa Beera7aara, Gamoora Kawuwaa Birshshaara, Adaama Kawuwaa SHin77aabaara, Xaboima Kawuwaa SHemebeeraaranne Xoo7aaro geetettiya Belaa7a Kawuweera olau salppidosona.

English Sentences: And the Horites in their mount_Seir, unto Elparan, which is by the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ichchashu kawoti gaittidi issi wolqqa gididi, Maxine Abbaa giyo Siiddima Wombban shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And they returned, and came to Enmishpat, which is Kadesh, and smote all the country of the Amalekites, and also the Amorites, that dwelt in Hazezontamar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kase tammanne naa77u laittaa Kadorllaa7oomerayyo haarettidosona; shin tammanne heezzantta laittan ayyo makkalidosona.

English Sentences: And there went out the king of Sodom, and the king of Gomorrah, and the king of Admah, and the king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela (the same is Zoar;) and they joined battle with them in the vale of Siddim;
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne oiddantta laittan Kadorllaa7oomerinne aara zuppetida kawoti bantta olanchchata ekkidi biidi, Asttaarooti Qarnnaiman de7iya Raafaayeta, Haaman de7iya Zuuzetanne SHaawe-Qiriyaataiman de7iya Eemeta olidi xoonidosona.

English Sentences: With Chedorlaomer the king of Elam, and with Tidal king of nations, and Amraphel king of Shinar, and Arioch king of Ellasar; four kings with five.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoonidi Hoora biittaa asatakka Se7iira Deriyan olidi, bazzuwaa matan de7iya Elpparaana giyoosaa gakkanaassi yedettidosona.

English Sentences: And the vale of Siddim was full of slimepits; and the kings of Sodom and Gomorrah fled, and fell there; and they that remained fled to the mountain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyye simmidi, Ain-Mishppaaxa yiidosona. Ha77i he sohoi Qaadeesa geetettees. Eti Amaaleeqatu biittaa ubbaanne qassi Haxaaxooni Taamaara giyoosan de7iya Amooreta olidi xoonidosona.

English Sentences: And they took all the goods of Sodom and Gomorrah, and all their victuals, and went their way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin, Sadooma kawoi, Gamoora kawoi, Addaama kawoi, Xaboima kawoinne Xoo7aaro geetettiya Belaa7a kawoi denddidosona; denddidi Siiddima Wombban salppidosona.

English Sentences: And they took Lot, Abram's brother's son, who dwelt in Sodom, and his goods, and departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbai Elaama kawuwaara, Goima kawuwaara, Sanaa7oore kawuwaaranne Ellaasaara kawuwaara ha ichchashu kawoti oiddu kawotuura olettidosona.

English Sentences: And there came one that had escaped, and told Abram the Hebrew; for he dwelt in the plain of Mamre the Amorite, brother of Eshcol, and brother of Aner: and these were confederate with Abram.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siiddima Wombban he wode, shidaadan oiqqiyaabai kumido ollai bessiis; Sadooma kawoinne Gamoora kawoi bantta olanchchatuura olaappe baqatishin, etappe amaridaageeti he ollatun kunddidosona; shin attidaageeti deriyau baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And when Abram heard that his brother was taken captive, he armed his trained servants, born in his own house, three hundred and eighteen, and pursued them unto Dan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddu kawoti Sadoomanne Gamoora katamatu aquwaa ubbaanne eta quma ubbaa bonqqidi ekki biidosona.

English Sentences: And he divided himself against them, he and his servants, by night, and smote them, and pursued them unto Hobah, which is on the left hand of Damascus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraama ishaa na7ai Looxee Sadooman de7iyo gishshau, akka a aquwaakka ekki biidosona.

English Sentences: And he brought back all the goods, and also brought again his brother Lot, and his goods, and the women also, and the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, issi bitanee baqati kessi ekkidi yiis; yiidi Ibraawiyaa Abraamassi hagaa yootiis. Abraami he wode, Eshkkolanne Aneera ishaa Amooriyaa Mamire wolaa matan de7ees. Eti ubbaikka olaa zaaranau Abraamaara maachchaa maacetti uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the king of Sodom went out to meet him after his return from the slaughter of Chedorlaomer, and of the kings that were with him, at the valley of Shaveh, which is the king's dale.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami ba dabboi omoodettidoogaa siyido wode, olaa eriya ba son yelettida heezzu xeetanne tammanne hosppun asaa denttiis; he oiddu kawota kaalliiddi Daani giyo katamaa gakkanaassi biis.

English Sentences: And Melchizedek king of Salem brought forth bread and wine: and he was the priest of the most high God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi gakkidi, qamman ba asaa citan citan shaakkidi, ba morkketuura olettidi eta xooniis. Xoonidi Damasqqoppe huuphessa baggaara de7iya Hooba giyoosaa gakkanaassi yedettiis.

English Sentences: And he blessed him, and said, Blessed be Abram of the most high God, possessor of heaven and earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aquwaa ubbaa, qassi ba dabbuwaa Looxanne a aquwaa, maccaasaanne hara asaa wotti ekkiis.

English Sentences: And blessed be the most high God, which hath delivered thine enemies into thy hand. And he gave him tithes of all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami Kadorllaa7oomeranne aara zuppetida kawota xoonidi simmidoogaappe guyyiyan, Sadooma kawoi, Kawotu Wombbaa giyo SHaaweeha Wombban a mokkanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And the king of Sodom said unto Abram, Give me the persons, and take the goods to thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, Saleema Kawoi Malkki-Xedeqi oittaanne woine eessaa ekkidi yiis; i Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa qeesiyaa.

English Sentences: And Abram said to the king of Sodom, I have lift up mine hand unto the LORD, the most high God, the possessor of heaven and earth,
Wolaitta Sentences: I Abraama hagaadan yaagidi anjjiis; "Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai, saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhidaagee Abraama anjjo;

English Sentences: That I will not take from a thread even to a shoelatchet, and that I will not take any thing that is thine, lest thou shouldest say, I have made Abram rich:
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai, ne morkketa ne kushiyan aatti immidaagee galatetto" yaagiis. Yaagin Abraami ubbabaappe asirataa kessidi, Malkki-Xedeqayyo immiis.

English Sentences: Save only that which the young men have eaten, and the portion of the men which went with me, Aner, Eshcol, and Mamre; let them take their portion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sadooma kawoi Abraama, "Asaa tau immada, aquwaa neeyyo ekka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: After these things the word of the LORD came unto Abram in a vision, saying, Fear not, Abram: I am thy shield, and thy exceeding great reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Abraami Sadooma kawuwaa, "Taani GODAASSI, Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaassi, saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhidaagaassi, ta kushiyaa denttada caaqqaichchaas.

English Sentences: And Abram said, LORD God, what wilt thou give me, seeing I go childless, and the steward of my house is this Eliezer of Damascus?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asai miidobaappenne tanaara biida Aneera, Eshkkolanne Mamire gakkiyaabaappe attin, neeni, Abraama taani dureyaas mulekka geennaadan,

English Sentences: And Abram said, Behold, to me thou hast given no seed: and, lo, one born in my house is mine heir.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani nebaappe harai atto qunccuute woikko caamma qachchiyoobaanne ekkikke. Eti banttana gakkiyaabaa ekkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, the word of the LORD came unto him, saying, This shall not be thine heir; but he that shall come forth out of thine own bowels shall be thine heir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA qaalai ajjuutan Abraamakko yiidi, "Abraamaa, yayyoppa! Taani neeyyo gonddalle; ne woitoi keehi gita" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he brought him forth abroad, and said, Look now toward heaven, and tell the stars, if thou be able to number them: and he said unto him, So shall thy seed be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abraami, "Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, taayyo mulekka na7i bainna gishshau, neeni immiyo woitoi taayyo aissee? Damasqqoi El77eezari tana laattana shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he believed in the LORD; and he counted it to him for righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Abraami, "Neeni taayyo ainne na7a immabaakka; hegaa gishshau ta son de7iya ashkkarai tana laattiyaagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, I am the LORD that brought thee out of Ur of the Chaldees, to give thee this land to inherit it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA qaalai akko yiidi, "Ha ashkkarai nena laattenna; shin ne gulbbataappe kiyiyaagee nena laattana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, LORD God, whereby shall I know that I shall inherit it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagi simmidi kare a kessidi, "Saluwaa pude xeella; neeni xoolintteta qoodanau danddayikko qooda; ne zerettaikka hagaa keena gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Take me an heifer of three years old, and a she goat of three years old, and a ram of three years old, and a turtledove, and a young pigeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami GODAA ammaniis; GODAI hegaa ayyo xillotettadan qoodiis.

English Sentences: And he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI qassikka a, "Taani neeni ha biittaa laattana mala neeyyo immanau Uri giyo Kaladaawetu katamaappe nena kessa ehiida GODAATTENNEE" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the fowls came down upon the carcases, Abram drove them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Abraami a, "Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, taani ha biittaa laattanaagaa aibin eroo?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon Abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI a, "Heezzu laitta ussa, heezzu laitta deeshsha, heezzu laitta dorssanne naa77u qommo haraphpheta taassi ekkada ya" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto Abram, Know of a surety that thy seed shall be a stranger in a land that is not theirs, and shall serve them; and they shall afflict them four hundred years;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin i hageeta ubbaa ayyo ekki efiis; efiidi eta phalqqidi naa77u kessiis; naa77aa kessidoogaa issuwaa issuwaa ginan wottiis; shin kafota naa77u kessi phalqqibeenna.

English Sentences: And also that nation, whom they shall serve, will I judge: and afterward shall they come out with great substance.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode ankkoti he ashuwaa bolli wodhdhidosona; shin Abraami eta yedettiis.

English Sentences: And thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace; thou shalt be buried in a good old age.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai wulliyo wode Abraama wolqqaama xiskkoi oiqqiis; oiqqin daganttiya sakkana xumai a bolli wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: But in the fourth generation they shall come hither again: for the iniquity of the Amorites is not yet full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin GODAI a, "Ne zerettai hara biittan bete gididi de7anaagaa neeni tumuppe era; eti ailletidi oiddu xeetu laittaa naaqettana.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, when the sun went down, and it was dark, behold a smoking furnace, and a burning lamp that passed between those pieces.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ailleyidi eta haariya kawotettaa taani qaxxayana; hegaappe guyyiyan, eti daro aquwaara he biittaappe kiyana.

English Sentences: In the same day the LORD made a covenant with Abram, saying, Unto thy seed have I given this land, from the river of Egypt unto the great river, the river Euphrates:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nena gidikko, neeni ne maizza aawatukko sarotettan baana; neeni keehi cimada haiqqananne moogettana.

English Sentences: The Kenites, and the Kenizzites, and the Kadmonites,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin oiddantto yeletan ne zerettai ha biitti simmana; aissi giikko, Amooretu nagarai biron likkiyaa gakkiichchibeenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the Hittites, and the Perizzites, and the Rephaims,
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai wullin sa7ai xumiis; xumin coociyaa cuwainne tamaa lacoi akeekennan kiyi beettidi, he naa77u kessi phalqqidoogeetuppe gidduwaara kanttiis.

English Sentences: And the Amorites, and the Canaanites, and the Girgashites, and the Jebusites.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi GODAI Abraamaara hagaadan yaagidi maachchaa maacettiis; "Gibxxe SHaafaappe doommidi Efiraaxiisa giyo gita shaafaa gakkanaassi, ha biittaa taani ne zerettaassi immaas;

English Sentences: Now Sarai Abram's wife bare him no children: and she had an handmaid, an Egyptian, whose name was Hagar.
Wolaitta Sentences: ha biittai Qeenatu, Qeniizetu, Qadimoonetu,

English Sentences: And Sarai said unto Abram, Behold now, the LORD hath restrained me from bearing: I pray thee, go in unto my maid; it may be that I may obtain children by her. And Abram hearkened to the voice of Sarai.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiitetu, Parzzetu, Raafaayetu,

English Sentences: And Sarai Abram's wife took Hagar her maid the Egyptian, after Abram had dwelt ten years in the land of Canaan, and gave her to her husband Abram to be his wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amooretu, Kanaanetu, Gerggeesetunne Yaabuusatu biittaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went in unto Hagar, and she conceived: and when she saw that she had conceived, her mistress was despised in her eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraama keettaayyiyaa Saaraya ayyo ha77inne na7a yelabeikku; shin iyyo Gibxxeppe yiida Aggaaro giyo issi ailliyaa de7ausu.

English Sentences: And Sarai said unto Abram, My wrong be upon thee: I have given my maid into thy bosom; and when she saw that she had conceived, I was despised in her eyes: the LORD judge between me and thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Saaraya Abraama xeesada, "Be7a, GODAI tau yelo diggiis. Neeni baada, ta ailleera zin77a; ooni erii, taani i baggaara na7aayo gidanaakkonne" yaagaasu. Yaagin Abraami Saarayi qaalaa siyidi maayiis.

English Sentences: But Abram said unto Sarai, Behold, thy maid is in thy hand; do to her as it pleaseth thee. And when Sarai dealt hardly with her, she fled from her face.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraami Kanaane biittan tammu laitta uttidoogaappe guyyiyan, Abraama keettaayyiyaa Saaraya Gibxxeppe ehiido ba ailliyo Aggaaro, ba keettaawaa Abraamassi machcho immaasu.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD found her by a fountain of water in the wilderness, by the fountain in the way to Shur.
Wolaitta Sentences: Immin Aggaaro ekkiis; ekkin a shahaaraasu. A baayyo shahaarai attidoogaa erido wode, ba godiyo karuwaa doomma bayaasu.

English Sentences: And he said, Hagar, Sarai's maid, whence camest thou? and whither wilt thou go? And she said, I flee from the face of my mistress Sarai.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Saaraya Abraama, "Tana ha naaquwaa naaqissiyaagee nena; taani ta ailliyo neeyyo immin, a ha77i baayyo shahaarai attidoogaa erada, tana karausu. Nebaanne tabaa GODAI pirddo" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD said unto her, Return to thy mistress, and submit thyself under her hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abraami Saarayo, "Hanno be7a; ne ailliyaa ne kushiyaana; neeni o ne lo77aa ootta" yaagiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Saaraya Aggaaro naaqqin, a kiyada ippe baqataasu.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD said unto her, I will multiply thy seed exceedingly, that it shall not be numbered for multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baqatin GODAA kiitanchchai pulttuwaa matan bazzon Aggaaro demmiis; he pulttoi SHura giyo biitti efiya ogiyaa mataana.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD said unto her, Behold, thou art with child, and shalt bear a son, and shalt call his name Ishmael; because the LORD hath heard thy affliction.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Aggaaro, "Bii Saarayi aillee Aggaaree, auppe yaadii? Qassi au bai?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin a, "Taani ta godee Saarayippe baqatais" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he will be a wild man; his hand will be against every man, and every man's hand against him; and he shall dwell in the presence of all his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA kiitanchchai iyyo, "Neeni ne godeekko guyye simmada ba; baada iyyo haaretta" yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: And she called the name of the LORD that spake unto her, Thou God seest me: for she said, Have I also here looked after him that seeth me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAA kiitanchchai o, "Ne zariyaa qoodanau danddayettennaagaa keesaa taani corayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore the well was called Beerlahairoi; behold, it is between Kadesh and Bered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAA kiitanchchai o, "Ha77i neeni shahaara; neeni attuma na7a yelana; yelada a Isimaa7eela gaada sunttana; aissi giikko, GODAI ne waasuwaa siyiis.

English Sentences: And Hagar bare Abram a son: and Abram called his son's name, which Hagar bare, Ishmael.
Wolaitta Sentences: I bazzon yeda de7iya hare mala asa gidana; asa ubbaara i eqettana; qassi asai ubbaikka aara eqettana; i ba ishanttu ubbaara ixo gididi de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abram was fourscore and six years old, when Hagar bare Ishmael to Abram.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Aggaara, "Taani tana be7iyaagaa be7ada paxa attanee?" yaagaasu; yaagada a baayyo haasayida GODAA, "Neeni tana be7iya Xoossaa" yaagada sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the LORD appeared to Abram, and said unto him, I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau he pulttuwaa ollai, "Tana Be7iya De7o Xoossaa Pulttuwaa" geetettiis; he ollai hanno gakkanaassi Qaadeesappenne Baareedappe gidduwan de7ees.

English Sentences: And I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggaara Abraamayyo attuma na7a yelaasu; Abraami Aggaara yelido na7aa Isimaa7eela giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Abram fell on his face: and God talked with him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggaara Isimaa7eela Abraamayyo yelido wode, Abraama laittai hosppun tammanne usuppuna.

English Sentences: As for me, behold, my covenant is with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abraama laittai uddufun tammanne uddufunaa gidiyo wode, GODAI ayyo qonccidi a, "Taani Ubbaa Danddayiya Xoossaa; neeni ta sinttan hemetta; suure gida.

English Sentences: Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be Abraham; for a father of many nations have I made thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani taappenne neeppe gidduwan ta maachchaa wottais; taani nena keehi corayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I will make thee exceeding fruitful, and I will make nations of thee, and kings shall come out of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abraami ba som77uwan duge gufanniis; gufannin Xoossai ayyo hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: And I will establish my covenant between me and thee and thy seed after thee in their generations for an everlasting covenant, to be a God unto thee, and to thy seed after thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi, taani nenaara maacettiyo maachchai hagaa; neeni daro kawotettaayyo aawa gidana.

English Sentences: And I will give unto thee, and to thy seed after thee, the land wherein thou art a stranger, all the land of Canaan, for an everlasting possession; and I will be their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe doommidi ne sunttai Abraama geetettenna; shin ne sunttai Abrahaama gidana. Aissi giikko, taani nena daro kawotettaayyo aawa oottaas.

English Sentences: And God said unto Abraham, Thou shalt keep my covenant therefore, thou, and thy seed after thee in their generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena keehi yeletissana; taani neeppe kawotettata medhdhana; kawotikka neeppe kiyana.

English Sentences: This is my covenant, which ye shall keep, between me and you and thy seed after thee; Every man child among you shall be circumcised.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani taappenne neeppe, neeppe guyyiyan ne zerettaappenne gidduwan, yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi ta maachchaa maacettais; ha maachchai taani neeyyoonne neeppe guyyiyan ne zerettaayyo Xoossaa gidana mala merinaa maachcha.

English Sentences: And ye shall circumcise the flesh of your foreskin; and it shall be a token of the covenant betwixt me and you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i neeni bete gidada de7iyo Kanaane biittai ubbai neeyyoonne neeppe guyyiyan ne zerettaayyo merinaassi laata gidana mala taani immana; qassi taani eta Xoossaa gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he that is eight days old shall be circumcised among you, every man child in your generations, he that is born in the house, or bought with money of any stranger, which is not of thy seed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Xoossai Abrahaama, "Nena gidikko, neeni ta maachchaa naaga; neenikka neeppe guyyiyan ne zerettaikka, yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi naagite.

English Sentences: He that is born in thy house, and he that is bought with thy money, must needs be circumcised: and my covenant shall be in your flesh for an everlasting covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taappenne neeppenne, neeppe guyyiyan ne zerettaappe gidduwan intte naagana ta maachchai hagaa; intte gidduwan de7iya attuma ubbai qaxxaretto.

English Sentences: And the uncircumcised man child whose flesh of his foreskin is not circumcised, that soul shall be cut off from his people; he hath broken my covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte attumatettaa shoohuwaa qaxxaretteeta; hegee taappenne intteppe gidduwan de7iya maachchaayyo malaata gidana.

English Sentences: And God said unto Abraham, As for Sarai thy wife, thou shalt not call her name Sarai, but Sarah shall her name be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte giddon sinttappe yelettana attuma naati ubbai yelettido hosppuntta gallassan qaxxarettana koshshees. Ne son yelettidaageeta gidin, woikko allagaappe miishshan shamettida ailleta gidin, ne zeretta gidennaageetakka attumaageeta qaxxaranau koshshees.

English Sentences: And I will bless her, and give thee a son also of her: yea, I will bless her, and she shall be a mother of nations; kings of people shall be of her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne son yelettidaageetikka ne miishshan shamettidaageetikka qaxxarettona. Hagee intte ashuwan de7iya ta maachchai merinaa maachcha gidana.

English Sentences: Then Abraham fell upon his face, and laughed, and said in his heart, Shall a child be born unto him that is an hundred years old? and shall Sarah, that is ninety years old, bear?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaxxarettiichchibeenna, ba shoohuwaara de7iya attuma asai ubbai ba asaappe duuxxana; aissi giikko, i ta maachchaa kanttiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham said unto God, O that Ishmael might live before thee!
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Xoossai Abrahaama, "Simmi, ne keettaayee Saarayi sunttaa Saarayo gooppa; hagaappe sinttau i sunttai Saaro.

English Sentences: And God said, Sarah thy wife shall bear thee a son indeed; and thou shalt call his name Isaac: and I will establish my covenant with him for an everlasting covenant, and with his seed after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani o anjjana; taani ippe neeyyo attuma na7a tumu immana. O taani anjjana; a kawotettatuyyo aayo gidana; asaa kawoti ippe yaana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as for Ishmael, I have heard thee: Behold, I have blessed him, and will make him fruitful, and will multiply him exceedingly; twelve princes shall he beget, and I will make him a great nation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abrahaami ba som77uwan gufanniis; i miiccidi ba wozanan, "Xeetu laitta asi tumu na7a yelanee? Qassi uddufun tammu gidido Saara na7a yelanee?" yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: But my covenant will I establish with Isaac, which Sarah shall bear unto thee at this set time in the next year.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagi qoppidi Abrahaami Xoossaa, "Isimaa7eeli tana laattiyaagaa gidanau danddayennee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he left off talking with him, and God went up from Abraham.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai, "CHii, ne keettaayyiyaa Saara neeyyo attuma na7a tumuppe yelana; yelettin neeni Yisaaqa gaada a sunttana. Appe guyyiyan, a zerettaassi merinaa maachcha gidana mala, taani aara ta maachchaa maacettana.

English Sentences: And Abraham took Ishmael his son, and all that were born in his house, and all that were bought with his money, every male among the men of Abraham's house; and circumcised the flesh of their foreskin in the selfsame day, as God had said unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Isimaa7eelabaa gidikkonne, neeni oichchidoogaa taani siyaas; taani akka anjjana; taani a yeletissananne a zerettaa keehi corayana; i tammanne naa77u daannata yelana; taani a zerettaa gita kawotetta oottana.

English Sentences: And Abraham was ninety years old and nine, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ta maachchaa laitti hannoode Saara neeyyo yeliyo Yisaaqaara maacettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Ishmael his son was thirteen years old, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Abrahaamaara haasayidi wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan, Abrahaamappe shaahettidi pude biis.

English Sentences: In the selfsame day was Abraham circumcised, and Ishmael his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassankka Abrahaami ba na7aa Isimaa7eela, ba son yelettida ubbaa, ba miishshan shammidoogeeta ubbaa, ba son de7iya attuma asa ubbaa, Xoossai ayyo odidoogaadan eta attumatettaa shoohuwaa qaxxariis.

English Sentences: And all the men of his house, born in the house, and bought with money of the stranger, were circumcised with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami ba attumatettaa shoohuwaa qaxxarettiyo wode, uddufun tammanne uddufun laitta asa;

English Sentences: And the LORD appeared unto him in the plains of Mamre: and he sat in the tent door in the heat of the day;
Wolaitta Sentences: a na7ai Isimaa7eeli ba attumatettaa shoohuwaa qaxxarettiyo wode, tammanne heezzu laitta na7a.

English Sentences: And he lift up his eyes and looked, and, lo, three men stood by him: and when he saw them, he ran to meet them from the tent door, and bowed himself toward the ground,
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaaminne a na7ai Isimaa7eeli naa77aikka he gallassi qaxxarettidosona.

English Sentences: And said, My LORD, if now I have found favour in thy sight, pass not away, I pray thee, from thy servant:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaama son de7iya attuma asai ubbai, a son yelettidaageetinne miishshan shammidoogeeti ubbai aara qaxxarettidosona.

English Sentences: Let a little water, I pray you, be fetched, and wash your feet, and rest yourselves under the tree:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami Mamire wolatu gitatu garssan ba dunkkaaniyaa penggen seeta gallassan uttidaashin, GODAI ayyo qoncciis.

English Sentences: And I will fetch a morsel of bread, and comfort ye your hearts; after that ye shall pass on: for therefore are ye come to your servant. And they said, So do, as thou hast said.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami xoqqu giidi xeellidi heezzu asati a matan eqqidaageeta be7iis; be7idi etaara gaittanau ba dunkkaaniyaa penggeppe denddidi woxxiis; woxxi gakkidi, biittan hokkidi, eta sinttan ziggiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham hastened into the tent unto Sarah, and said, Make ready quickly three measures of fine meal, knead it, and make cakes upon the hearth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ziggi simmidi i, "Abeet ta godau, taani ne sinttan nashettidabaa gidikko, tana ne ashkkaraa aggada aadhdhoppa.

English Sentences: And Abraham ran unto the herd, and fetcht a calf tender and good, and gave it unto a young man; and he hasted to dress it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hai guutta haatti yo; yin intte tohoi meecettin, ha mittaa kuwan shemppi ekkite.

English Sentences: And he took butter, and milk, and the calf which he had dressed, and set it before them; and he stood by them under the tree, and they did eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ha77i taakko intte ashkkaraakko yiido gishshau, gazddidi intte biyoosaa baana mala, taani intteyyo miyoobaa ehais" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "Daro lo77o; neeni giyoogaadan ootta" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they said unto him, Where is Sarah thy wife? And he said, Behold, in the tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abrahaami dunkkaaniyaa giddo Saarikko eesoti biidi, "Eesotada liiqo xiilliyaappe heezzu kere gidiyaagaa ekka munaqqada oittaa uukka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, I will certainly return unto thee according to the time of life; and, lo, Sarah thy wife shall have a son. And Sarah heard it in the tent door, which was behind him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi, Abrahaami ba wudiyaakko woxxi biidi, lo77o anqqara maraa dooridi, issi ashkkarau immin, i eesuwan shukkidi giigissiis.

English Sentences: Now Abraham and Sarah were old and well stricken in age; and it ceased to be with Sarah after the manner of women.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Abrahaami meqqida maattaanne giigissido maraa ashuwaa imattatu sintti aattiis; eti miishin, i he mittaa garssan eta matan eqqiis.

English Sentences: Therefore Sarah laughed within herself, saying, After I am waxed old shall I have pleasure, my lord being old also?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a, "Ne keettaayyiyaa Saara awaanee?" yaagidi oichchidosona. Oichchin i, "Hinin dunkkaane giddon de7ausu" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Abraham, Wherefore did Sarah laugh, saying, Shall I of a surety bear a child, which am old?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI a, "Taani laitti hannoode tumu neekko simmana; he wode ne keettaayyiyaa Saara attuma na7a yelana" yaagiis. Saara he wode appe guyye baggaara de7iya dunkkaaniyaa penggen de7iyaara hegaa siyausu.

English Sentences: Is any thing too hard for the LORD? At the time appointed I will return unto thee, according to the time of life, and Sarah shall have a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaaminne Saara bantta laittaa keehi sugidi ceggiichchidosona. Saariyyo kushe qitai yiyoogaa aggirggiis.

English Sentences: Then Sarah denied, saying, I laughed not; for she was afraid. And he said, Nay; but thou didst laugh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Saara ba wozanan, "Taani ha77i cima wuraichchidoogaappe guyyiyaaninne ta godai ceeggidoogaappe guyyiyan, ha77i taayyo attuma asaara gaittiyoogee waani hananee?" yaagada miiccaasu.

English Sentences: And the men rose up from thence, and looked toward Sodom: and Abraham went with them to bring them on the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Abrahaama he wode, "Taani cimaichchidoogaappe guyyiyan, tumu na7a yelaneeyye? gaada, Saara aissi miiccadee?

English Sentences: And the LORD said, Shall I hide from Abraham that thing which I do;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU danddayettennabi tumu de7iiyye? Laitti hannoode taani neekko simmana; he wode Saara attuma na7a yelana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Seeing that Abraham shall surely become a great and mighty nation, and all the nations of the earth shall be blessed in him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saara keehi yayyido gishshau, "Taani miiccabeikke" yaagada lahottaasu. SHin i, "Ee, neeni tumu miiccadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For I know him, that he will command his children and his household after him, and they shall keep the way of the LORD, to do justice and judgment; that the LORD may bring upon Abraham that which he hath spoken of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan asati denddidi biidi, Sadooma katamaa duge zaari xeellidosona; Abrahaaminne eta moissiiddi etaara biis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said, Because the cry of Sodom and Gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI he wode, "Taani ta oottana haniyoobaa Abrahaamappe qosikke.

English Sentences: I will go down now, and see whether they have done altogether according to the cry of it, which is come unto me; and if not, I will know.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami tumuppe gitanne wolqqaama kawotetta gidana; ha sa7aa kawotettati ubbai a baggaara anjjettana.

English Sentences: And the men turned their faces from thence, and went toward Sodom: but Abraham stood yet before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, xillotettaanne pirddaa oottidi, GODAA ogiyaa naaganaadan ba naatanne baappe guyyiyan, ba so asaa i zorana mala, taani a dooraas; hegeenne GODAI Abrahaamayyo immana giidoogaa ubbaa polanaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham drew near, and said, Wilt thou also destroy the righteous with the wicked?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi GODAI Abrahaama, "Sadoomappenne Gamoorappe waassiyo waasoi keehi darido gishshaunne eta nagarai keehi deexxido gishshau, eti oottidobi taakko gakkida waasuwaa keesa iitakkonne be7anau ane taani duge wodhdhais;

English Sentences: Peradventure there be fifty righteous within the city: wilt thou also destroy and not spare the place for the fifty righteous that are therein?
Wolaitta Sentences: hegaa mala iita gidana xayikkonne erana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: That be far from thee to do after this manner, to slay the righteous with the wicked: and that the righteous should be as the wicked, that be far from thee: Shall not the Judge of all the earth do right?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, naa77u asati Sadoomakko simmidi biidosona; shin Abrahaami GODAA sinttan eqqidosankka de7ees.

English Sentences: And the LORD said, If I find in Sodom fifty righteous within the city, then I will spare all the place for their sakes.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Abrahaami akko shiiqidi yaagiis; "Tumu neeni xillota iitatuura xaissuutee?

English Sentences: And Abraham answered and said, Behold now, I have taken upon me to speak unto the LORD, which am but dust and ashes:
Wolaitta Sentences: He gita kataman ishatamu xilloti de7iyaakkokka, neeni xaissuutee? Neeni an de7iya ishatamu xillotu gishshau he katamaa ashshikkii?

English Sentences: Peradventure there shall lack five of the fifty righteous: wilt thou destroy all the city for lack of five? And he said, If I find there forty and five, I will not destroy it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee neeppe haakko; xillota iitatuura woriyoogeenne xillotanne iitata issi aifiyan xeelliyoogee neeppe haakko. Ha sa7aa ubbaa pirddiyaagee xillo pirddenneeyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he spake unto him yet again, and said, Peradventure there shall be forty found there. And he said, I will not do it for forty's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI, "He Sadooma kataman ishatamu xilloti de7ikko, he sohuwaa ubbaa eta gishshau taani ashshana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Oh let not the LORD be angry, and I will speak: Peradventure there shall thirty be found there. And he said, I will not do it, if I find thirty there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Abrahaami, "Taani biittanne bidintta gidaidda ta Godaara xalan haasayanau simmi doommaichchaas;

English Sentences: And he said, Behold now, I have taken upon me to speak unto the LORD: Peradventure there shall be twenty found there. And he said, I will not destroy it for twenty's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: ishatamu xillotuppe ichchashai paccikko, neeni he ichchashatu gishshau he katamaa ubbaa xaissuutee?" yaagiis. Yaagin GODAI, "Taani yan oitamanne ichchashu xillota demmikko, he katamaa xaissikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Oh let not the LORD be angry, and I will speak yet but this once: Peradventure ten shall be found there. And he said, I will not destroy it for ten's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami zaarettidikka, "Yan oitamaa xalaalai beettikko shin?" yaagiis. Yaagin i, "Taani he oitamatu gishshau, he katamaa xaissikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD went his way, as soon as he had left communing with Abraham: and Abraham returned unto his place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan i, "Hai Godai taayyo hanqqettoppo; taani gujjadakka haasayais. Yan hasttamaa xalaalai beettikko shin?" yaagiis. Yaagin GODAI, "Taani yan hasttamaa demmikko, he katamaa xaissikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there came two angels to Sodom at even; and Lot sat in the gate of Sodom: and Lot seeing them rose up to meet them; and he bowed himself with his face toward the ground;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami qassikka, "Taani Godaara xalan haasayanau doommaichchaas; yan laatamaa xalaalai beettikko shin?" yaagiis. Yaagin GODAI, "He laatamatu gishshau taani a xaissikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Behold now, my lords, turn in, I pray you, into your servant's house, and tarry all night, and wash your feet, and ye shall rise up early, and go on your ways. And they said, Nay; but we will abide in the street all night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Abrahaami, "Hai Godai taayyo hanqqettoppo; taani mexi issitoo haasayais; yan tammaa xalaalai beettikko shin?" yaagiis. Yaagin GODAI, "He tammatu gishshau taani he katamaa xaissikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he pressed upon them greatly; and they turned in unto him, and entered into his house; and he made them a feast, and did bake unleavened bread, and they did eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Abrahaamaara haasayaa wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan biis; Abrahaamikka ba soo simmiis.

English Sentences: But before they lay down, the men of the city, even the men of Sodom, compassed the house round, both old and young, all the people from every quarter:
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77u kiitanchchati omarssi Sadooma katamaa gakkidosona; he wode Looxee he katamaa penggen uttiis. Looxee eta be7innee etaara gaittanau eqqidi biis; biidi, ba som77uwaa sa7aa gattidi ziggiis;

English Sentences: And they called unto Lot, and said unto him, Where are the men which came in to thee this night? bring them out unto us, that we may know them.
Wolaitta Sentences: ziggidi, "Ta godaatoo, intte ashkkaraa soo simmerkketii; intte gediyaa meecettidi qammaa aqite; guuran denddidi intte biyoosaa beeta" yaagiis. Yaagin eti, "CHii; nuuni ha katamaa gutaran aqana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Lot went out at the door unto them, and shut the door after him,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i eta keehi shoobbido gishshau, aara biidi a soo gelidosona; gelin i etau qumaa kattidi, caalenna oittaa uukkidi aattin, eti miidosona.

English Sentences: And said, I pray you, brethren, do not so wickedly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zin77ennan de7ishin, Sadooma katamaa attuma asai ubbai, naatuppe cimaa gakkanaashin, issoinne attennan yiidi, keettaa yuuyi aadhdhi dooddidosona.

English Sentences: Behold now, I have two daughters which have not known man; let me, I pray you, bring them out unto you, and do ye to them as is good in your eyes: only unto these men do nothing; for therefore came they under the shadow of my roof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooddidi Looxa xeesidi yaagidosona; "Hachchi qammi ne soo yiida attuma asati awan de7iyoonaa? Nuuni etaara shaaramuxana mala eta nuukko kare kessa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they said, Stand back. And they said again, This one fellow came in to sojourn, and he will needs be a judge: now will we deal worse with thee, than with them. And they pressed sore upon the man, even Lot, and came near to break the door.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Looxee etaara gaittanau kare kiyiiddi, kariyaa guyye gorddiis;

English Sentences: But the men put forth their hand, and pulled Lot into the house to them, and shut to the door.
Wolaitta Sentences: gorddidi eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta ishatoo, ha iita oosuwaa oottoppite.

English Sentences: And they smote the men that were at the door of the house with blindness, both small and great: so that they wearied themselves to find the door.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi taayyo naa77u macca naati, attuma asi xaallibeenna geela7oti de7oosona; taani eta intteyyo kare kessais; intte eta inttena lo77aadan oottana danddayeeta. SHin ha asatu bolli ainne oottoppite; aissi giikko, eti ta keettaa gelidi ta kaaraa garssan de7oosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the men said unto Lot, Hast thou here any besides? son in law, and thy sons, and thy daughters, and whatsoever thou hast in the city, bring them out of this place:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asati a, "Nu sinttappe kichcha!" yaagidosona; qassikka eti, "Ha bitanee ha biittan bete gididi yiidi, ha77i nu bolli pirddanau kajjeelees! Ha77i nuuni nena etau qoppidoogaappe iitaa oottana baawee!" yaagidosona. Yaagidi eti Looxa guyye sugi yeggidi penggiyaa menttanau shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: For we will destroy this place, because the cry of them is waxen great before the face of the LORD; and the LORD hath sent us to destroy it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he naa77u asati bantta kushiyaa kare yeddidi, Looxa soo goochchi gelissidi penggiyaa gorddi bayidosona.

English Sentences: And Lot went out, and spake unto his sons in law, which married his daughters, and said, Up, get you out of this place; for the LORD will destroy this city. But he seemed as one that mocked unto his sons in law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti keettaa penggen de7iya asaa, guuttaappe gitaa gakkanaassi qooqissi aggidosona. Yaatin eti penggiyaa demmanau koyiiddi daafuridosona.

English Sentences: And when the morning arose, then the angels hastened Lot, saying, Arise, take thy wife, and thy two daughters, which are here; lest thou be consumed in the iniquity of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77u asati Looxa, "Neeyyo hagan ne macca naata giigissidaageeti, ne attuma naati woikko ne macca naati woikko nebaa gidiya asi oona gidikkonne ha kataman de7ii? De7ikko, eta hagaappe kessargga.

English Sentences: And while he lingered, the men laid hold upon his hand, and upon the hand of his wife, and upon the hand of his two daughters; the LORD being merciful unto him: and they brought him forth, and set him without the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, nuuni ha sohuwaa xaissana haneettees. Etappe waassiyo waasoi GODAA sinttan keehi darido gishshau, GODAI nuna ha katamaa xaissanau kiittiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when they had brought them forth abroad, that he said, Escape for thy life; look not behind thee, neither stay thou in all the plain; escape to the mountain, lest thou be consumed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Looxee kiyidi, ba macca naata giigissidaageetukko biidi eta, "Eesuwan denddidi hagaappe kiyiichchite; aissi giikko, GODAI ha katamaa xaissana hanees" yaagiis. SHin a macca naata giigissidaageeti i naacees giidi qoppidosona.

English Sentences: And Lot said unto them, Oh, not so, my LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai wonttanau bazzoi zo77iyo wode, he kiitanchchati Looxa, "Dendda! Ne keettaayyiyoonne hagan de7iya ne naa77u macca naata ekkada eesuwan kiya! Kiyana xayikko, ha katamai pirddettiyo wode neenikka xayaasa" yaagidi dirbbanttidosona.

English Sentences: Behold now, thy servant hath found grace in thy sight, and thou hast magnified thy mercy, which thou hast shewed unto me in saving my life; and I cannot escape to the mountain, lest some evil take me, and I die:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Looxee yooqu gin, he asati a kushiyaa, a keettaayee kushiyaanne a macca naatu naa77aa kushiyaa oiqqidi, he katamaappe eta kessidosona; aissi giikko, GODAI etayyo qarettiis.

English Sentences: Behold now, this city is near to flee unto, and it is a little one: Oh, let me escape thither, (is it not a little one?) and my soul shall live.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchati eta katamaappe kessidosaarakka, he kiitanchchatuppe issoi yaagiis; "Intte shemppuwaa ekkidi baqatite! Guyye xeelloppite! Qassi ha wombban awankka eqqoppite! Deriyaakko baqatite! Hankkoode intte xayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, See, I have accepted thee concerning this thing also, that I will not overthrow this city, for the which thou hast spoken.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Looxee etayyo yaagiis; "CHii! Hai ta godaatoo, yaagoppite.

English Sentences: Haste thee, escape thither; for I cannot do anything till thou be come thither. Therefore the name of the city was called Zoar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani intte ashkkarai intte sinttan nashettido gishshau, tana ashshanau taayyo daroppe kehideta. SHin taani deriyaakko baqatanau danddayikke; hagee bashshai gakkidi tana muukkananne taanikka haiqqana.

English Sentences: The sun was risen upon the earth when Lot entered into Zoar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xeellite; hagan issi katamai de7ees; i woxxanau matanne guutta katama. Taani yaa baqatoo? I qii guutta katama gidennee? Ta shemppoi yan attana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the LORD rained upon Sodom and upon Gomorrah brimstone and fire from the LORD out of heaven;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kiitanchchai, "Ee, taani ne oishaa siyana; taani neeni giyo katamaa xaissikke.

English Sentences: And he overthrew those cities, and all the plain, and all the inhabitants of the cities, and that which grew upon the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin yaa eesuwan baqata; aissi giikko, neeni yaa gakkanaashin, taani ainne oottanau danddayikke" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau he katamaa sunttai Xoo7aaro geetettiis.

English Sentences: But his wife looked back from behind him, and she became a pillar of salt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Looxee Xoo7aaro gakkido wode, biron xalqqee dolees.

English Sentences: And Abraham gat up early in the morning to the place where he stood before the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI he wode tamaanne eexxiya diniyaa Sadoomanne Gamoora bollan GODAA matappe saluwaappe bukissi bayiis.

English Sentences: And he looked toward Sodom and Gomorrah, and toward all the land of the plain, and beheld, and, lo, the smoke of the country went up as the smoke of a furnace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi GODAI he katamata, he wombbaa ubbaa, he katamatu giddon de7iya ubbaanne he biittan de7iya mittaa maataa xaissiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when God destroyed the cities of the plain, that God remembered Abraham, and sent Lot out of the midst of the overthrow, when he overthrew the cities in the which Lot dwelt.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Looxe keettaayyiyaa guyye xeellada maxine tuussa gidaasu.

English Sentences: And Lot went up out of Zoar, and dwelt in the mountain, and his two daughters with him; for he feared to dwell in Zoar: and he dwelt in a cave, he and his two daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi maallado guuran Abrahaami denddidi, GODAA sinttan kase i eqqido sohuwaa simmidi biis.

English Sentences: And the firstborn said unto the younger, Our father is old, and there is not a man in the earth to come in unto us after the manner of all the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: I Sadoomanne Gamoora he wombban de7iya biitta ubbaa duge xeelliis; xeelliyo wode cuwai coociyaa tamaa cuwaadan he biittaappe denddiyaagaa be7iis.

English Sentences: Come, let us make our father drink wine, and we will lie with him, that we may preserve seed of our father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai he wombbaa katamata xaissido wode, Abrahaama hassayiis; hassayidi Looxee de7ido katamata xaissiiddi Looxa bashshaappe kessiis.

English Sentences: And they made their father drink wine that night: and the firstborn went in, and lay with her father; and he perceived not when she lay down, nor when she arose.
Wolaitta Sentences: Looxee Xoo7aaron uttanau yayyido gishshau, ba macca naatu naa77aara deriyaa kiyiis; kiyidi gonggolo giddon ba naa77u macca naatuura uttiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the morrow, that the firstborn said unto the younger, Behold, I lay yesternight with my father: let us make him drink wine this night also; and go thou in, and lie with him, that we may preserve seed of our father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi baira na7iyaa kaaliyo, "Nu aawai cimiis; sa7a ubban de7iya wogaadan nunaara zin77anau ha biittan mulekka attuma asi baawa.

English Sentences: And they made their father drink wine that night also: and the younger arose, and lay with him; and he perceived not when she lay down, nor when she arose.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haaya; woiniyaa eessaa nu aawaa ushshidi, aara zin77idi, nu aawaappe nu zariyaa turaa ashshoos" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Thus were both the daughters of Lot with child by their father.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassa qammikka bantta aawaa woiniyaa eessaa ushshidosona; uyin bairiyaa gelada aara zin77aasu; a aara zin77iyo wodekka denddiyo wodekka i eribeenna.

English Sentences: And the first born bare a son, and called his name Moab: the same is the father of the Moabites unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi bairiyaa kaaliyo, "Siya; zino taani ta aawaara zin77aas; hachchi qammi qassi woiniyaa eessaa ushshin, neenikka gelada aara zin77a; yaatidi nuuni nu aawaappe nu zariyaa turaa ashshoos" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the younger, she also bare a son, and called his name Benammi: the same is the father of the children of Ammon unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin he gallassi qammi qassikka woiniyaa eessaa ushshidosona; uyin kaaliyaakka gelada aara zin77aasu; a aara zin77iyo wodekka denddiyo wodekka i eribeenna.

English Sentences: And Abraham journeyed from thence toward the south country, and dwelled between Kadesh and Shur, and sojourned in Gerar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Looxe macca naati naa77aikka bantta aawaayyo shahaaridosona.

English Sentences: And Abraham said of Sarah his wife, She is my sister: and Abimelech king of Gerar sent, and took Sarah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bairiyaa attuma na7aa yelaasu; a sunttaa Moo7aaba gaada sunttaasu; inne hachchi gakkanau Moo7aabatu aawaa.

English Sentences: But God came to Abimelech in a dream by night, and said to him, Behold, thou art but a dead man, for the woman which thou hast taken; for she is a man's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi kaaliyaakka attuma na7aa yelaasu; a sunttaa Ben77aama gaada sunttaasu; inne hachchi gakkanau Amoonatu aawaa.

English Sentences: But Abimelech had not come near her: and he said, LORD, wilt thou slay also a righteous nation?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami Mamireppe denddidi, Neegeeba giyo biitti biis; biidi Qaadeesanne SHura giyo katamatuppe gidduwan de7iis; Garaarankka amarida wodiyaa takkiis.

English Sentences: Said he not unto me, She is my sister? and she, even she herself said, He is my brother: in the integrity of my heart and innocency of my hands have I done this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yan Abrahaami ba keettaayyiyo Saaro, "A ta michchiyo" yaagiis. Yaagin Garaara Kawoi Abimeleki kiittidi Saaro efiis.

English Sentences: And God said unto him in a dream, Yea, I know that thou didst this in the integrity of thy heart; for I also withheld thee from sinning against me: therefore suffered I thee not to touch her.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai issi qammi aimuwan Abimelekakko yiidi, a hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni ehiido maccaasee gaasuwan haiqqaasa; aissi giikko, a azina machcho" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now therefore restore the man his wife; for he is a prophet, and he shall pray for thee, and thou shalt live: and if thou restore her not, know thou that thou shalt surely die, thou, and all that are thine.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Abimeleki ikko shiiqibeenna. Yaanidaagee, "Godau, neeni xillo kawotettaa xaissuutee?

English Sentences: Therefore Abimelech rose early in the morning, and called all his servants, and told all these things in their ears: and the men were sore afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: I, A ta michchiyo gibeenneeyye? Qassi a, I ta ishaa gabeikkee? Taani ta wozanaa suuretettaaninne ta kushiyaa geeshshatettan hagaa oottaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Abimelech called Abraham, and said unto him, What hast thou done unto us? and what have I offended thee, that thou hast brought on me and on my kingdom a great sin? thou hast done deeds unto me that ought not to be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai aimuwan a yaagiis; "Ee, neeni ne wozanaa geeshshatettan oottidoogaa taani eraas; hegaa gishshau, neeni o bochchenna malanne ta sinttan nagara oottenna mala nena taani teqqaas.

English Sentences: And Abimelech said unto Abraham, What sawest thou, that thou hast done this thing?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i ha bitaniyaa keettaayyiyo zaara; aissi giikko, i hananabaa yootiyaagaa; i neeyyo Xoossaa woossana; woossin neeni paxa attana. SHin o zaarana xayikko, neeninne neeyyo de7iyaabai ubbai haiqqiyoogaa tumuppe era" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham said, Because I thought, Surely the fear of God is not in this place; and they will slay me for my wife's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abimeleki wonttetta gallassi maallado ba kawotettaa halaqata ubbaa xeesiis; xeesidi ha yoho ubbaa etayyo yootin, eti keehi daro yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And yet indeed she is my sister; she is the daughter of my father, but not the daughter of my mother; and she became my wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Abimeleki Abrahaama xeesidi, "Neeni aibabaa nu bolli oottadii? Neeni ta bollinne ta kawotettaa bolli gita nagaraa ehaanau taani neeyyo aiba iitabaa oottidanaa? Neeni ta bolli oosettanau bessennabaa oottadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when God caused me to wander from my father's house, that I said unto her, This is thy kindness which thou shalt shew unto me; at every place whither we shall come, say of me, He is my brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Abimeleki Abrahaama, "Nena hagaa ootissidabi aibee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Abimelech took sheep, and oxen, and menservants, and womenservants, and gave them unto Abraham, and restored him Sarah his wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Abrahaami yaagiis; "Xoossau yayyiya issi asinne ha sohuwan baawa gaada qoppido gishshaassanne, Ta keettaayee gaasuwan eti tana worana gaada qoppido gishshassa.

English Sentences: And Abimelech said, Behold, my land is before thee: dwell where it pleaseth thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bolli a tumukka ta keettaayyiyo; ta aayee na7iyo gidennaagaappe attin, ta aawaa na7iyo; qassi a ta keettaayo gidaasu.

English Sentences: And unto Sarah he said, Behold, I have given thy brother a thousand pieces of silver: behold, he is to thee a covering of the eyes, unto all that are with thee, and with all other: thus she was reproved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai tana ta aawaa keettaappe kessido wode taani iyyo, Nuuni biido biittan ubban neeni taayyo oottana kehatettai hagaa; "I ta ishaa" gaada tabaa haasaya yaagaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Abraham prayed unto God: and God healed Abimelech, and his wife, and his maidservants; and they bare children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Abimeleki dorssaa, mehiyaa, macca ailletanne attuma ailleta ehiidi, Abrahaamayyo immiis; qassi a keettaayyiyo Saaro ayyo zaariis.

English Sentences: For the LORD had fast closed up all the wombs of the house of Abimelech, because of Sarah Abraham's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki, "Simmi ta biittai ne sinttaana; nena lo77asan de7a" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD visited Sarah as he had said, and the LORD did unto Sarah as he had spoken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saarokka, "Taani ne ishaayyo issi sha7u xaqara biraa immais; hagee simmi nenaara de7iya ubbaa sinttan neeni xillo gidiyoogaanne neeni shatimmidoogaa erissiyaagaa gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For Sarah conceived, and bare Abraham a son in his old age, at the set time of which God had spoken to him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Abrahaama keettaayee Saari gaasuwan Abimeleka keettaa asa ubbaa qanttaa mainissi wottido gishshau, Abrahaami Xoossaa woossin,

English Sentences: And Abraham called the name of his son that was born unto him, whom Sarah bare to him, Isaac.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abimeleki, a keettaayyiyaanne a macca ashkkarati na7a yelana mala Xoossai eta pattiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham circumcised his son Isaac being eight days old, as God had commanded him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba yootidoogaadan Saarikko yiis; yiidi Xoossai Saariyyo ba giidoogaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham was an hundred years old, when his son Isaac was born unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saara shahaarada, ceeggida Abrahaamayyo Xoossai giido wodee gakkin, attuma na7aa yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Sarah said, God hath made me to laugh, so that all that hear will laugh with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saara ayyo yelido ba na7aa sunttaa Abrahaami "Yisaaqa" yaagidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And she said, Who would have said unto Abraham, that Sarah should have given children suck? for I have born him a son in his old age.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami ba na7aa Yisaaqa Xoossai azazidoogaadan hosppuntta gallassan qaxxariis.

English Sentences: And the child grew, and was weaned: and Abraham made a great feast the same day that Isaac was weaned.
Wolaitta Sentences: A na7aa Yisaaqi ayyo yelettido wode, Abrahaama laittai xeeta.

English Sentences: And Sarah saw the son of Hagar the Egyptian, which she had born unto Abraham, mocking.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saara, "Xoossai taayyo miichchaa immiis; qassi hagaa siyiya ubbai tanaara miiccana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Wherefore she said unto Abraham, Cast out this bondwoman and her son: for the son of this bondwoman shall not be heir with my son, even with Isaac.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Saara, "Abrahaamayyo Saara na7a xanttana giidabi oonee? Gidikkonne taani ha77i ayyo i ceeggido wodiyan na7a yelaas" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the thing was very grievous in Abraham's sight because of his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta na7ai diccidi; xanttaa duuxxiis; Abrahaami Yisaaqi xanttaa duuxxido gallassi wolqqaama gibiraa kessiis.

English Sentences: And God said unto Abraham, Let it not be grievous in thy sight because of the lad, and because of thy bondwoman; in all that Sarah hath said unto thee, hearken unto her voice; for in Isaac shall thy seed be called.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Gibxxeppe yiida Aggaara Abrahaamayyo yelido na7ai qoosiyoogaa Saara be7aasu.

English Sentences: And also of the son of the bondwoman will I make a nation, because he is thy seed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ada Abrahaama, "Ha aillee na7ai ta na7aa Yisaaqaara mulekka laattenna gishshau, ailliyoonne i na7aa kessa yedda" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Abraham rose up early in the morning, and took bread, and a bottle of water, and gave it unto Hagar, putting it on her shoulder, and the child, and sent her away: and she departed, and wandered in the wilderness of Beersheba.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin ha yohoi ba na7aa bochchiyo gishshau, Abrahaami keehippe metootiis.

English Sentences: And the water was spent in the bottle, and she cast the child under one of the shrubs.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai Abrahaama, "Na7aayyoonne ne ailleeyyoo keehi metootoppa; Saara neeyyo yootiyoobaa ubbaa siya; aissi giikko, ne zerettai Yisaaqa baggaara xeesettana.

English Sentences: And she went, and sat her down over against him a good way off, as it were a bow shot: for she said, Let me not see the death of the child. And she sat over against him, and lift up her voice, and wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi aillee na7aa taani kawotetta kessana; aissi giikko, ikka ne zare" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And God heard the voice of the lad; and the angel of God called to Hagar out of heaven, and said unto her, What aileth thee, Hagar? fear not; for God hath heard the voice of the lad where he is.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maallado guuran Abrahaami denddiis; denddidi qumaanne lukkaamon haattaa ekkidi, Aggaaro hashiyan toossidi, i na7aakka iyyo immidi kessi yeddiis. A baada, Berssaabehi giyo bazzuwan toilattaasu.

English Sentences: Arise, lift up the lad, and hold him in thine hand; for I will make him a great nation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattaikka lukkaamuwan wurido wode a, "Na7ai haiqqishin, uttada be7ikke" yaagada, na7aa issi buuraa garssan wottada, naa77u xeetu wara gidiyaagaa keenaa baada utta bayaasu.

English Sentences: And God opened her eyes, and she saw a well of water; and she went, and filled the bottle with water, and gave the lad drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Matan uttada, ba qaalaa xoqqissada yeekkaasu.

English Sentences: And God was with the lad; and he grew, and dwelt in the wilderness, and became an archer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai na7aa waasuwaa siyiis; Xoossaa kiitanchchai Aggaaro saluwaappe xeesidi, "Aggaaree, waanadii? Xoossai na7ai zin77idosan waassiyoogaa siyido gishshau yayyoppa;

English Sentences: And he dwelt in the wilderness of Paran: and his mother took him a wife out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: dendda eqqa; na7aanne ne kushiyan dentta; aissi giikko, taani a gita kawotetta oottana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at that time, that Abimelech and Phichol the chief captain of his host spake unto Abraham, saying, God is with thee in all that thou doest:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai i aifiyaa dooyin, haatta ollaa be7aasu; baada lukkaamuwan haattaa kunttaasu; na7aakka ushshaasu.

English Sentences: Now therefore swear unto me here by God that thou wilt not deal falsely with me, nor with my son, nor with my son's son: but according to the kindness that I have done unto thee, thou shalt do unto me, and to the land wherein thou hast sojourned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7ai dicciyo wode, Xoossai aara gidiis; i bazzuwan de7idi, wonddafiyaa dukkiya asa gidiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham said, I will swear.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Paaraana giyo bazzuwan de7ishin, a aayyiyaa Gibxxeppe ayyo machcho demmaasu.

English Sentences: And Abraham reproved Abimelech because of a well of water, which Abimelech's servants had violently taken away.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, Abimeleki ba wottaaddaratu halaqaa Pikoolaara Abrahaamakko biidi, "Neeni oottiyo ubbaban Xoossai nenaara de7ees.

English Sentences: And Abimelech said, I wot not who hath done this thing: neither didst thou tell me, neither yet heard I of it, but to day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta bolli woikko ta naatu bolli woikko ta zerettaa bolli genebaa oottenna mala, ha77i hagan, Xoossaa sinttan taayyo caaqqa; taani neeyyo kehidoogaadan, neenikka taayyoonne neeni imattatettan de7iyo ha biittaayyo keha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham took sheep and oxen, and gave them unto Abimelech; and both of them made a covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abrahaami, "Taani caaqqais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham set seven ewe lambs of the flock by themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, Abrahaami Abimeleka ashkkarati ekkido haattaa ollaabaa Abimelekayyo maganniis.

English Sentences: And Abimelech said unto Abraham, What mean these seven ewe lambs which thou hast set by themselves?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Abimeleki, "Hegaa ooni oottidaakko taani erikke; neenikka qassi taayyo yootabaakka; taani hachchi gakkanau hegaa siyabeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, For these seven ewe lambs shalt thou take of my hand, that they may be a witness unto me, that I have digged this well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Abrahaami dorssaanne miizzata ehiidi, Abimelekayyo immin, eti naa77ai maachchaa maacettidosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore he called that place Beersheba; because there they sware both of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami laappun macca dorssa marata wudiyaappe shaakkiis;

English Sentences: Thus they made a covenant at Beersheba: then Abimelech rose up, and Phichol the chief captain of his host, and they returned into the land of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: shaakkin Abimeleki Abrahaama, "Ha neeni dumma shaakka wottido laappun macca dorssa marata aissi shaakkadii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham planted a grove in Beersheba, and called there on the name of the LORD, the everlasting God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Abrahaami, "Taani ha haattaa ollaa bookkidoogau markka gidana mala, ha laappun macca dorssa marata ta kushiyaappe ekka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham sojourned in the Philistines' land many days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan he naa77u asati maacettido gishshau, he sohoi Berssaabehi geetettiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after these things, that God did tempt Abraham, and said unto him, Abraham: and he said, Behold, here I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Berssaabehan maachchaa maacettidoogaappe guyyiyan, Abimelekinne a wotaaddaratu halaqaa Pikooli denddidi, Pilisxxeema biittaa simmidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Take now thy son, thine only son Isaac, whom thou lovest, and get thee into the land of Moriah; and offer him there for a burnt offering upon one of the mountains which I will tell thee of.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami Berssaabehan taamaariskki giyo mittaa tokkiis. Hegan GODAA, Merinaa Xoossaa, sunttaa xeesiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham rose up early in the morning, and saddled his ass, and took two of his young men with him, and Isaac his son, and clave the wood for the burnt offering, and rose up, and went unto the place of which God had told him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami Pilisxxeema biittan daro wodiyaa de7iis.

English Sentences: Then on the third day Abraham lifted up his eyes, and saw the place afar off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin, Xoossai Abrahaama paacciis; i a, "Abrahaamaa" yaagidi xeesiis. Xeesin i, "Yee" yaagidi koyiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham said unto his young men, Abide ye here with the ass; and I and the lad will go yonder and worship, and come again to you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koyin Xoossai, "Neeni siiqiyo ne mexi issi na7aa Yisaaqa ekkada, Mooriyaa giyo biitti ba; baada yan taani neeyyo yootiyo issi deriyaa bollan a xuuggiyo yarshsho oottada taayyo yarshsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abraham took the wood of the burnt offering, and laid it upon Isaac his son; and he took the fire in his hand, and a knife; and they went both of them together.
