English Sentences: And Jacob did so, and fulfilled her week: and he gave him Rachel his daughter to wife also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai wonttin xeelliyo wode, hekko Liyo! Yaanin Yaaqoobi Laabaana, "Hagee neeni ta bolli oottidoogee aibee? Taani neeyyo oottidoi Raaheeli gishshassa gidenneeyye? Tana aissi cimmadii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Laban gave to Rachel his daughter Bilhah his handmaid to be her maid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Laabaani a, "Nu biittan bairiyaa de7ishin, kaaliyo azinau immiyoogee woga gidenna.

English Sentences: And he went in also unto Rachel, and he loved also Rachel more than Leah, and served with him yet seven other years.
Wolaitta Sentences: He mishiratettaa saaminttaa wurssa; qassi kaalotiyaarokka nuuni neeyyo immana; hegaappe guyyiyan, hara laappun laittaa taayyo oottaasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the LORD saw that Leah was hated, he opened her womb: but Rachel was barren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi hegaadan hanidi he saaminttaa wurssiis; hegaappe guyyiyan, Laabaani ba na7iyo Raaheelo ayyo immiis.

English Sentences: And Leah conceived, and bare a son, and she called his name Reuben: for she said, Surely the LORD hath looked upon my affliction; now therefore my husband will love me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Laabaani ba ashkkariyo Baalo ba na7ee Raaheelissi danggiriixe gidanaadan immiis.

English Sentences: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and said, Because the LORD hath heard that I was hated, he hath therefore given me this son also: and she called his name Simeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Raaheelokka ekkiis. Raaheelo Liyippe aattidi siiqiis. Hara laappun laittaa Laabaanayyo oottiis.

English Sentences: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and said, Now this time will my husband be joined unto me, because I have born him three sons: therefore was his name called Levi.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Liya siiqettabeennaagaa be7idi, iyyo yeliyo uluwaa dooyiis; shin Raaheela maine.

English Sentences: And she conceived again, and bare a son: and she said, Now will I praise the LORD: therefore she called his name Judah; and left bearing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liya shahaarada attuma na7aa yelaasu. A sunttaanne Roobeela sunttaasu; aissi giikko a, "GODAI ta metuwaa be7iis; ha77i tumu tana ta azinai siiqana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And when Rachel saw that she bare Jacob no children, Rachel envied her sister; and said unto Jacob, Give me children, or else I die.
Wolaitta Sentences: A haranttuwaakka shahaarada attuma na7aa yelaasu. Yelada a, "GODAI taani siiqettabeennaagaa siyido gishshau, taayyo hagaakka gujjiis" yaagada, a Simoona sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And Jacob's anger was kindled against Rachel: and he said, Am I in God's stead, who hath withheld from thee the fruit of the womb?
Wolaitta Sentences: A haranttuwaakka shahaarada attuma na7aa yelaasu. Yelada a, "Taani ayyo heezzu attuma naata yelido gishshau, ta azinai ha77i tanaara waaxettana" yaagada, a Leewa sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And she said, Behold my maid Bilhah, go in unto her; and she shall bear upon my knees, that I may also have children by her.
Wolaitta Sentences: A haranttuwaakka shahaarada attuma na7aa yelaasu. Yelada a, "Hachchiigan taani GODAA galatana" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Yihudaa sunttaasu. Hegaappe guyyiyan yeluwaa essaasu.

English Sentences: And she gave him Bilhah her handmaid to wife: and Jacob went in unto her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheela Yaaqoobau naata yelabeennaagaa be7ido wode, ba michchiyo qanaataasu; hegaa gishshau Yaaqooba, "Tau naata imma; hegee xayikko, taani haiqqana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Bilhah conceived, and bare Jacob a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi Raaheelo hanqqettidi, "Tana neeyyo yelo diggida Xoossaa gaadiiyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Rachel said, God hath judged me, and hath also heard my voice, and hath given me a son: therefore called she his name Dan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin a, "Ta danggiriixiyo Baalo hinno be7a; a ta gishshaa yelana mala neeni o ekka; yaatobare i baggaara taanikka na7aayo gidana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Bilhah Rachel's maid conceived again, and bare Jacob a second son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba danggiriixiyo Baalo machcho ootti ekkana mala, ayyo immaasu; immin Yaaqoobi o ekkiis.

English Sentences: And Rachel said, With great wrestlings have I wrestled with my sister, and I have prevailed: and she called his name Naphtali.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baala shahaarada attuma na7aa Yaaqoobau yelaasu.

English Sentences: When Leah saw that she had left bearing, she took Zilpah her maid, and gave her Jacob to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Raaheela, "Xoossai taassi daannatiis; ta woosaakka siyidi, tau attuma na7a immiis" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Daana sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And Zilpah Leah's maid bare Jacob a son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheeli danggiriixiyaa Baala haranttuwaa shahaarada, Yaaqoobayyo naa77antto attuma na7aa yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Leah said, A troop cometh: and she called his name Gad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelin Raaheela, "Taani ta michcheera wolqqaama baaxiyaa baaxetada xoonaas" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Nifttaaleema sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And Zilpah Leah's maid bare Jacob a second son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liya baayyo yeloi eqqidoogaa be7ada, ba danggiriixiyo Zilppo efaada Yaaqoobi o machchana mala immaasu.

English Sentences: And Leah said, Happy am I, for the daughters will call me blessed: and she called his name Asher.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liyi danggiriixiyaa Zilppa attuma na7aa Yaaqoobau yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Reuben went in the days of wheat harvest, and found mandrakes in the field, and brought them unto his mother Leah. Then Rachel said to Leah, Give me, I pray thee, of thy son's mandrakes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liya, "Laa hagee aiba lo77o qaadee!" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau Gaada sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And she said unto her, Is it a small matter that thou hast taken my husband? and wouldest thou take away my son's mandrakes also? And Rachel said, Therefore he shall lie with thee to night for thy son's mandrakes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liyi danggiriixiyaa Zilppa Yaaqoobau naa77antto attuma na7aa yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Jacob came out of the field in the evening, and Leah went out to meet him, and said, Thou must come in unto me; for surely I have hired thee with my son's mandrakes. And he lay with her that night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelin Liya, "Taani ai keenaa ufaittiyaanaashsha! Maccaasai tana ufaittiyaaro gaana" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Aseera sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And God hearkened unto Leah, and she conceived, and bare Jacob the fifth son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gisttiyaa cakkiyo aginan Roobeeli gade biidi, inkkoyiyaa giyo timaatime milatiya teeraa demmidi, ba aayee Liyissi ehiis. Raaheela Liyo, "Ne na7aa inkkoyiyaappe taayyo imma" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Leah said, God hath given me my hire, because I have given my maiden to my husband: and she called his name Issachar.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Liya, "Ta azinaa neeni wotta ekkidoogee gidennan ixxin, qassi ta na7aa inkkoyiyaa ekkuutee?" yaagaasu. Yaagin Raaheela, "Yaanikko, ne na7aa inkkoyiyaa gishshau Yaaqoobi hachchi qammaa nenaara aqo" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Leah conceived again, and bare Jacob the sixth son.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassa omarssi Yaaqoobi bazzoppe yiido wode, Liya a mokkanau kiyada a, "Neeni tanaara aqana koshshees; aissi giikko, taani ta na7aa inkkoyiyan nena kerau ekkaichchaas" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau i he gallassa qammi iira aqiis.

English Sentences: And Leah said, God hath endued me with a good dowry; now will my husband dwell with me, because I have born him six sons: and she called his name Zebulun.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Liyi woosaa siyiis; siyin a shahaarada, ichchashantta attuma na7aa Yaaqoobau yelaasu.

English Sentences: And afterwards she bare a daughter, and called her name Dinah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelin Liya, "Taani ta danggiriixiyo ta azinaassi immido gishshau, Xoossai hegaa keraa taayyo qanxxiis" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Yisaakoora sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And God remembered Rachel, and God hearkened to her, and opened her womb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liya haranttuwaakka shahaarada, usuppuntta attuma na7aa Yaaqoobau yelaasu.

English Sentences: And she conceived, and bare a son; and said, God hath taken away my reproach:
Wolaitta Sentences: Liya, "Xoossai tau al77o imotaa immiis; taani ta azinaayyo usuppun naata yelido gishshau, ha77i i tana bonchchana" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Zaabiloona sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And she called his name Joseph; and said, The LORD shall add to me another son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan issi macca na7iyo yelaasu; yelada o Diino sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Rachel had born Joseph, that Jacob said unto Laban, Send me away, that I may go unto mine own place, and to my country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Raaheelo hassayiis; i woosaa siyidi i yeliyo uluwaa dooyiis.

English Sentences: Give me my wives and my children, for whom I have served thee, and let me go: for thou knowest my service which I have done thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: A shahaarada attuma na7aa yelaasu; yelada, "Xoossai ta yeellaa qucciis.

English Sentences: And Laban said unto him, I pray thee, if I have found favour in thine eyes, tarry: for I have learned by experience that the LORD hath blessed me for thy sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tau hara attuma na7akka gujjeerenneeshsha" yaagaasu. Hegaa gishshau a Yooseefa sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And he said, Appoint me thy wages, and I will give it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheela Yooseefa yelidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobi Laabaana, "Taani ta aawaa biitti simmana mala, tana moissa.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, Thou knowest how I have served thee, and how thy cattle was with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta gishshau neeyyo oottido ta maccaasatanne ta naata hamma; taani baana; aissi giikko, taani neeyyo ai keena ooso oottidaakko neeni eraasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For it was little which thou hadst before I came, and it is now increased unto a multitude; and the LORD hath blessed thee since my coming: and now when shall I provide for mine own house also?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Laabaani a, "Taani neeyyo issibaa odais; GODAI ne gaasuwan tana anjjidoogaa taani be7aas.

English Sentences: And he said, What shall I give thee? And Jacob said, Thou shalt not give me any thing: if thou wilt do this thing for me, I will again feed and keep thy flock.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne damoozaa tau oda; taani neeyyo a qanxxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: I will pass through all thy flock to day, removing from thence all the speckled and spotted cattle, and all the brown cattle among the sheep, and the spotted and speckled among the goats: and of such shall be my hire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi, "Taani neeyyo waata oottidaakko, ne meheekka waani yelettidaakko neeni eraasa.

English Sentences: So shall my righteousness answer for me in time to come, when it shall come for my hire before thy face: every one that is not speckled and spotted among the goats, and brown among the sheep, that shall be counted stolen with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yaanaappe kase neeyyo de7iya guuttai ha77i keehi dariis; GODAI nena taani aadhdhidosan ubban anjjiis. SHin ha77i, taani ta so asau oottanai audee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Laban said, Behold, I would it might be according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Laabaani, "Taani neeyyo ai immoo?" yaagidi a oichchiis. Oichchin Yaaqoobi, "Tau ainne immoppa; shin neeni taayyo issibaa oottikko, taani ne wudiyaa qassikka heemmananne naagana.

English Sentences: And he removed that day the he goats that were ringstraked and spotted, and all the she goats that were speckled and spotted, and every one that had some white in it, and all the brown among the sheep, and gave them into the hand of his sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hachchi ne wudiyaa ubbaa giddoora aadhdhana; hegan ne dorssaappe punccariyaa woikko gazzaa ubbaa, karetta dorssa mara ubbaanne deeshshaappe gazzaanne punccariyaa ubbaa taani shaakkana; eti ta damooza gidana.

English Sentences: And he set three days' journey betwixt himself and Jacob: and Jacob fed the rest of Laban's flocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau ta xillotettai neeni taayyo qanxxido damoozaa qoodanau sinttappe yiyo wode, taayyo markkattana; ta deeshshaappe gazza woikko punccare gidennabi woikko karetta gidenna ai dorssa marinne ta matan beettikko, wuuqettidabaadan qoodettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob took him rods of green poplar, and of the hazel and chestnut tree; and pilled white strakes in them, and made the white appear which was in the rods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Laabaani, "Maayaas; neeni giidoogaadan gidobai" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he set the rods which he had pilled before the flocks in the gutters in the watering troughs when the flocks came to drink, that they should conceive when they came to drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he gallassan Laabaani kalaade woikko gazza gidida attuma deeshshaa ubbaa, punccare woikko gazza gidida macca deeshshaa ubbaa, bootta gidida ubbaanne karetta dorssa mara ubbaa kessidi, ba attuma naata henttiis.

English Sentences: And the flocks conceived before the rods, and brought forth cattle ringstraked, speckled, and spotted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi he wudiyaara heezzu gallassa ogiyaa Yaaqoobappe haakkidi biis. SHin Yaaqoobi attida Laabaana wudiyaa heemmiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob did separate the lambs, and set the faces of the flocks toward the ringstraked, and all the brown in the flock of Laban; and he put his own flocks by themselves, and put them not unto Laban's cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi deeshsha loomiyaappe, gumariyaappenne xanqqarssaappe qayye gatimaa kessidi, poquwaa poqqi poqqidi, giddo bootta zawaa qaaridi gazzayiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, whensoever the stronger cattle did conceive, that Jacob laid the rods before the eyes of the cattle in the gutters, that they might conceive among the rods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wudee haattaa uyanau yiyo soho ubban, wonggiriyan, wudiyaa sinttan poqqido gatimata wottiis. Orggiyau eqqidaageeti haattaa uyanau yiidi,

English Sentences: But when the cattle were feeble, he put them not in: so the feebler were Laban's, and the stronger Jacob's.
Wolaitta Sentences: he gatimatu sinttan birasettidosona; birasettidi eti kalaade, punccarenne gazza marata yelidosona.

English Sentences: And the man increased exceedingly, and had much cattle, and maidservants, and menservants, and camels, and asses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelin Yaaqoobi marata wudiyaappe shaakkidi dumma wottiis; attida wudiyaa kalaadenne karetta gidiya Laabaana mehiyaa sintti zaariis. Yaatidi baayyo wudiyaa dummayiis; Laabaana mehetuura eta gattibeenna.

English Sentences: And he heard the words of Laban's sons, saying, Jacob hath taken away all that was our father's; and of that which was our father's hath he gotten all this glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gooba maccaageeti orggiyau eqqiyo wode audenne, eti he gatimatu matan birasettana mala, Yaaqoobi he gatimata haattaa wonggiriyan, mehetu sinttan wottees.

English Sentences: And Jacob beheld the countenance of Laban, and, behold, it was not toward him as before.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin meheti laafa gidikko, eta sinttan gatimata wottenna. Hegaa gishshau laafiya meheti Laabaanabaa gidin, goobiyaageeti Yaaqoobabaa gididosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Jacob, Return unto the land of thy fathers, and to thy kindred; and I will be with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan hanidi, Yaaqoobi keehi daro duretidi, daro wudiyaa, macca ashkkaratanne attuma ashkkarata, daro gaameelatanne hareta haariis.

English Sentences: And Jacob sent and called Rachel and Leah to the field unto his flock,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Laabaana naati bana, "Yaaqoobi nu aawaabaa ubbaa ekkiichchiis; ha aquwaa ubbaa nu aawaabaappe demmiis" giyoogaa siyiis.

English Sentences: And said unto them, I see your father's countenance, that it is not toward me as before; but the God of my father hath been with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Laabaana som77oi baayyo kaseegaa mala gidennaagaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And ye know that with all my power I have served your father.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode GODAI Yaaqooba, "Neeni ne aawatu biitti, ne dabbotukko guyye simma; taani nenaara gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And your father hath deceived me, and changed my wages ten times; but God suffered him not to hurt me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi Raaheelonne Liyo ba wudee de7iyoosaa dembbaa yaana mala kiittidi xeesissiis.

English Sentences: If he said thus, The speckled shall be thy wages; then all the cattle bare speckled: and if he said thus, The ringstraked shall be thy hire; then bare all the cattle ringstraked.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta, "Intte aawaa som77oi taayyo kaseegaa mala gidennaagaa taani be7ais; shin ta aawaa Xoossai tanaara de7ees.

English Sentences: Thus God hath taken away the cattle of your father, and given them to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta wolqqa ubban intte aawaayyo oottidoogaa intte ereeta;

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the time that the cattle conceived, that I lifted up mine eyes, and saw in a dream, and, behold, the rams which leaped upon the cattle were ringstraked, speckled, and grisled.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin intte aawai tana cimmidi, ta damoozaa tammutoo laammiis. Gidikkonne Xoossai tana i qohennaadan diggiis.

English Sentences: And the angel of God spake unto me in a dream, saying, Jacob: And I said, Here am I.
Wolaitta Sentences: I, Punccareti ne damooza gidana gin, wude ubbai punccariyaa yeliis; qassi i, Kalaadeti ne damooza gidana gin, wude ubbai kalaadiyaa yeliis.

English Sentences: And he said, Lift up now thine eyes, and see, all the rams which leap upon the cattle are ringstraked, speckled, and grisled: for I have seen all that Laban doeth unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hagaadan intte aawaa mehiyaa wotti ekkidi tau immiis.

English Sentences: I am the God of Bethel, where thou anointedst the pillar, and where thou vowedst a vow unto me: now arise, get thee out from this land, and return unto the land of thy kindred.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Meheti orggiyau eqqiyo aginan, taani issi aimo aimottaas; he aimuwan taani xeelliyo wode, wudiyaa birassiya deeshsha orggeti kalaade, punccarenne gazza.

English Sentences: And Rachel and Leah answered and said unto him, Is there yet any portion or inheritance for us in our father's house?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa kiitanchchai aimuwan tana, Yaaqoobaa yaagiis; yaagin taani, Yee yaagada koyaas.

English Sentences: Are we not counted of him strangers? for he hath sold us, and hath quite devoured also our money.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koyin tana i, Xoqqu gaada wudiyaa birassiya deeshsha orgge ubbaa kalaadiyaa, punccariyaanne gazzaa be7a; aissi giikko, Laabaani ne bolli oottiyoobaa ubbaa taani be7aas.

English Sentences: For all the riches which God hath taken from our father, that is ours, and our children's: now then, whatsoever God hath said unto thee, do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni essido shuchchaa tiyada, taayyo shiiqettido Beeteele Xoossai tana. Ha77i dendda! Denddada ha biittaappe kiya; kiyada guyye ne yeleta biitti simma yaagiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jacob rose up, and set his sons and his wives upon camels;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Raaheelanne Liya hagaadan yaagidi zaaridosona; "Nu aawaabaappe nuna gakkanabi aibee?

English Sentences: And he carried away all his cattle, and all his goods which he had gotten, the cattle of his getting, which he had gotten in Padanaram, for to go to Isaac his father in the land of Canaan.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuna allagadan xeellees gidennee? I nuna baizzi ekkiis; baizzidi ekkidobaakka mi xaissiis.

English Sentences: And Laban went to shear his sheep: and Rachel had stolen the images that were her father's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nu aawaappe wotti ekkido aqo ubbai tumukka nubaanne nu naatuba. Hegaa gishshau Xoossai neeyyo odidobaa ubbaa ootta" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Jacob stole away unawares to Laban the Syrian, in that he told him not that he fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi Kanaane biittan de7iya ba aawaa Yisaaqakko baanau denddiis; i ba naatanne ba keettaayeta gaameelaa togissiis;

English Sentences: So he fled with all that he had; and he rose up, and passed over the river, and set his face toward the mount Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: wude ubbaa baappe sinttaara laaggidi, Masphphexoomiyan de7iiddi i shiishshido aqo ubbaa ekkidi biis.

English Sentences: And it was told Laban on the third day that Jacob was fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani ba dorssatu ikisiyaa qanxxanau biichchidaashin, Raaheela ba aawaa so misileta wuuqqaasu.

English Sentences: And he took his brethren with him, and pursued after him seven days' journey; and they overtook him in the mount Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yaaqoobi Sooriyaa Laabaanayyo ba baqatiyoogaa odennan cimmiis.

English Sentences: And God came to Laban the Syrian in a dream by night, and said unto him, Take heed that thou speak not to Jacob either good or bad.
Wolaitta Sentences: I baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa ekkidi baqatiis; baqatidi Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa pinnidi, Gala7aade giyo gezziyaakko simmidi biis.

English Sentences: Then Laban overtook Jacob. Now Jacob had pitched his tent in the mount: and Laban with his brethren pitched in the mount of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantta gallassan, Laabaani Yaaqoobi baqati biichchidoogaa siyiis.

English Sentences: And Laban said to Jacob, What hast thou done, that thou hast stolen away unawares to me, and carried away my daughters, as captives taken with the sword?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba dabbota banaara ekkidi, laappun gallassa ogiyaa Yaaqooba geeduwaa kaalliiddi, Gala7aade gezziyan a gakkiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore didst thou flee away secretly, and steal away from me; and didst not tell me, that I might have sent thee away with mirth, and with songs, with tabret, and with harp?
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Xoossai qammi Sooriyaa Laabaanakko aimuwan yiidi a, "Neeni Yaaqooba bolli iita gidin, keha gidin, ainne haasayennaadan nena era!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And hast not suffered me to kiss my sons and my daughters? thou hast now done foolishly in so doing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani gakkiyo wode, Yaaqoobi Gala7aade gezziyan dunkkaanidi uttiis; qassi Laabaaninne a dabboti yan dunkkaanidosona.

English Sentences: It is in the power of my hand to do you hurt: but the God of your father spake unto me yesternight, saying, Take thou heed that thou speak not to Jacob either good or bad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Laabaani Yaaqooba, "Neeni hagaadan aissi oottadii? Neeni tana cimmada, ta macca naata olan omoodettidabaadan laaggada kessadasa.

English Sentences: And now, though thou wouldest needs be gone, because thou sore longedst after thy father's house, yet wherefore hast thou stolen my gods?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni aissi qosan taappe kessa ekkada, tana cimmadii? Taani nena ufaissaaninne yettan, karaabiyaaninne diittan moissana mala taayyo aissi odabeikkii?

English Sentences: And Jacob answered and said to Laban, Because I was afraid: for I said, Peradventure thou wouldest take by force thy daughters from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni harai atto, ta naatu naatanne ta macca naata taani yera ekkenna mala diggadasa. Neeni eeyyabaa oottadasa.

English Sentences: With whomsoever thou findest thy gods, let him not live: before our brethren discern thou what is thine with me, and take it to thee. For Jacob knew not that Rachel had stolen them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena genanau tau wolqqai de7ees; shin ne aawaa Xoossai zino qammi tana, Yaaqooba bolli iita gidin, keha gidin, ainne haasayennaadan nena era! yaagidi taayyo yootiis.

English Sentences: And Laban went into Jacob's tent, and into Leah's tent, and into the two maidservants' tents; but he found them not. Then went he out of Leah's tent, and entered into Rachel's tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i gidikkonne, neeni ne aawaa soo baanau keehi laamotido gishshau kiyadasa. SHin ta so misileta neeni aissi wuuqqadii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now Rachel had taken the images, and put them in the camel's furniture, and sat upon them. And Laban searched all the tent, but found them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Laabaana, "Neeni ne naata taappe wolqqan wotta ekkanaakkonne gaada qoppido gishshaunne yayyido gishshau, hagaadan oottaas.

English Sentences: And she said to her father, Let it not displease my lord that I cannot rise up before thee; for the custom of women is upon me. And he searched, but found not the images.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ne so misileta oiqqida asa oonanne neeni demmikko, he urai siifetto! Nebaa gididabi ta matan beettikko, nu dabbotu sinttan koya; koyada, nebaa gidikko ekka" yaagiis; aissi giikko, Yaaqoobi Raaheela he so misileta wuuqqidoogaa eribeenna.

English Sentences: And Jacob was wroth, and chode with Laban: and Jacob answered and said to Laban, What is my trespass? what is my sin, that thou hast so hotly pursued after me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Laabaani Yaaqooba dunkkaane giddo, Liyi dunkkaane giddonne naa77u kaadumatatu dunkkaane giddo geliis; shin ainne demmibeenna. Liyi dunkkaaniyaappe kiyidi, Raaheeli dunkkaaniyaa geliis.

English Sentences: Whereas thou hast searched all my stuff, what hast thou found of all thy household stuff? set it here before my brethren and thy brethren, that they may judge betwixt us both.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheela so misileta ekkada, gaameelaa kooraa garssan qosada, a bolli uttaasu. Laabaani dunkkaaniyan de7iyaabaa ubbaa patipannidi koyiis; shin ainne demmibeenna.

English Sentences: This twenty years have I been with thee; thy ewes and thy she goats have not cast their young, and the rams of thy flock have I not eaten.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheela ba aawaa, "Ta godau, tana hanqqettoppa; taani neeyyo eqqana danddayikke; taayyo kushe qitai yi uttiis" yaagaasu. I koyiis; shin so misileta demmibeenna.

English Sentences: That which was torn of beasts I brought not unto thee; I bare the loss of it; of my hand didst thou require it, whether stolen by day, or stolen by night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Laabaana hanqqettidi woqqasiis; Yaaqoobi Laabaana, "Taani ai mooridanaa? Hagaa neeni tana kaallanau, taani oottido nagari aibee?

English Sentences: Thus I was; in the day the drought consumed me, and the frost by night; and my sleep departed from mine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i neeni ta miishsha ubbaa patipannada koyadasa; ne so miishshappe ai demmadii? Eti nu naa77aa gidduwan pirddana mala, ta dabbotu sinttaaninne ne dabbotu sinttan hagan wotta.

English Sentences: Thus have I been twenty years in thy house; I served thee fourteen years for thy two daughters, and six years for thy cattle: and thou hast changed my wages ten times.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani nenaara laatamu laittaa kumettaa de7aas; ne dorssaikka ne deeshshaikka aucayibeenna; woikko ne wudiyaappe galssaa mabeikke.

English Sentences: Except the God of my father, the God of Abraham, and the fear of Isaac, had been with me, surely thou hadst sent me away now empty. God hath seen mine affliction and the labour of my hands, and rebuked thee yesternight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Do7ai menttidoogaanne neeyyo ehabeikke; shin hegaa tanan qoodaas. Gallassi wuuqettidabaa woikko qammi wuuqettidabaa tana qanxxissadasa.

English Sentences: And Laban answered and said unto Jacob, These daughters are my daughters, and these children are my children, and these cattle are my cattle, and all that thou seest is mine: and what can I do this day unto these my daughters, or unto their children which they have born?
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa suuloi, qamma kinchchoi tana qohiis; xiskkoi taappe xayiis.

English Sentences: Now therefore come thou, let us make a covenant, I and thou; and let it be for a witness between me and thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hagaadan ne son laatamu laittaa de7aas; tammanne oiddu laittaa ne naa77u macca naatu gishshaunne usuppun laittaa ne wudiyaa gishshau neeyyo oottaidda de7aas; shin neeni ta damoozaa tammutoo laammadasa.

English Sentences: And Jacob took a stone, and set it up for a pillar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta aawaa Xoossai, Abrahaama Xoossai, Yisaaqi Yayyidoogee tanaara gidibeennabaa gidiyaakko, siree bainnan neeni tana mela kushe kessa yeddadasa; shin Xoossai ta tuggaanne ta kushiyaa oosuwaa be7idi, zino qammi nena seeriis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob said unto his brethren, Gather stones; and they took stones, and made an heap: and they did eat there upon the heap.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Laabaani Yaaqooba, "Maccaasati ta macca naata; naatikka ta naata; wudeekka ta wudiyaa; neeni be7iyo ubbai taagaa. Hachchi ha macca naatu taageetu bollinne eti yelido naatu bolli ai oottanau danddayiyaanaa?

English Sentences: And Laban called it Jegarsahadutha: but Jacob called it Galeed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i haaya; neeninne taani maachchaa maacettoos; hegee neeppenne taappe gidduwan markka gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Laban said, This heap is a witness between me and thee this day. Therefore was the name of it called Galeed;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Yaaqoobi issi shuchchaa ekkidi tuussadan essiis.

English Sentences: And Mizpah; for he said, The LORD watch between me and thee, when we are absent one from another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Essidi i ba dabbota, "SHuchchaa shiishshite" yaagiis; yaagin eti shuchchaa shiishshidi keelidosona; he keelaa lanqqen miidosona.

English Sentences: If thou shalt afflict my daughters, or if thou shalt take other wives beside my daughters, no man is with us; see, God is witness betwixt me and thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani he keelaa, Yigaari-Sahaaduta giidi sunttiis; qassi Yaaqoobi a Gal77eeda giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Laban said to Jacob, Behold this heap, and behold this pillar, which I have cast betwixt me and thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani, "Ha keelai neeppenne taappe gidduwan hachchi markka" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau a sunttai Gal77eeda geetettiis.

English Sentences: This heap be witness, and this pillar be witness, that I will not pass over this heap to thee, and that thou shalt not pass over this heap and this pillar unto me, for harm.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i he shuchchaa tuussaa Mixiphpha giidi sunttiis; aissi giikko, Laabaani, "Nuuni issoi issuwaappe haakkidi de7iyo wode, GODAI ne gidduwaaninne ta gidduwan gididi naago.

English Sentences: The God of Abraham, and the God of Nahor, the God of their father, judge betwixt us. And Jacob sware by the fear of his father Isaac.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta macca naata naaqqikko, woikko neeni ta macca naatu bolli hara maccaasata ekkikko, nunaara ha77i ooninne bainnabaa gidikkonne ne gidduwaaninne ta gidduwan Xoossai markka gidiyoogaa hassaya" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Jacob offered sacrifice upon the mount, and called his brethren to eat bread: and they did eat bread, and tarried all night in the mount.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani qassikka Yaaqooba, "Keelettida shuchchai hageeho; qassi taani ne gidduwaaninne ta gidduwan essido shuchchaa tuussai hageeho.

English Sentences: And early in the morning Laban rose up, and kissed his sons and his daughters, and blessed them: and Laban departed, and returned unto his place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ha keelaappe nena genanau neekko kanttennaadan, neenikka tana genanau ha keelaappenne ha shuchchaa tuussaappe kanttennaadan, ha keelainne ha shuchchaa tuussai markka.

English Sentences: And Jacob went on his way, and the angels of God met him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaama Xoossai, Naakoora Xoossai, eta aawaa Xoossai, nu gidduwan i pirddo" yaagiis. Yaagin Yaaqoobi ba aawaa Yisaaqi Yayyidoogaa sunttan caaqqiis.

English Sentences: And when Jacob saw them, he said, This is God's host: and he called the name of that place Mahanaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi deriyaa bollan yarshshuwaa yarshshiis; ba dabbotakka qumaa maanau xeesiis. Eti miidi deriyaa bollan aqidosona.

English Sentences: And Jacob sent messengers before him to Esau his brother unto the land of Seir, the country of Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi guuran Laabaani denddidi, ba naatu naatanne ba macca naata yeriis; qassi eta anjjiis. Anjjidi, ba soo simmiis.

English Sentences: And he commanded them, saying, Thus shall ye speak unto my lord Esau; Thy servant Jacob saith thus, I have sojourned with Laban, and stayed there until now:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi denddidi ba ogiyaa biishin, Xoossaa kiitanchchati aara gaittidosona.

English Sentences: And I have oxen, and asses, flocks, and menservants, and womenservants: and I have sent to tell my lord, that I may find grace in thy sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi eta be7ido wode, "Hagee Xoossai aqiyoosaa" yaagidi, he sohuwaa Maahinaima giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And the messengers returned to Jacob, saying, We came to thy brother Esau, and also he cometh to meet thee, and four hundred men with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Se7iira giyoosan, Eedooma biittan de7iya ba ishaa Eesawakko kiitaa baappe sinttau kiittiis.

English Sentences: Then Jacob was greatly afraid and distressed: and he divided the people that was with him, and the flocks, and herds, and the camels, into two bands;
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Intte ta godaa Eesawayyo gaanabai hagaa; Ne ashkkarai Yaaqoobi, "Taani Laabaana matan de7aidda hanno gakkanaassi gam77aas.

English Sentences: And said, If Esau come to the one company, and smite it, then the other company which is left shall escape.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo miizzainne haree, dorssainne deeshshai, attuma ashkkaratinne macca ashkkarati de7oosona; ha77i taani ha kiitaa ta godaa sinttan nashettana mala kiittaas" yaagiis yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob said, O God of my father Abraham, and God of my father Isaac, the LORD which saidst unto me, Return unto thy country, and to thy kindred, and I will deal well with thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitettidaageeti Yaaqoobakko simmidi a, "Nuuni ne ishaa Eesawakko biida; ha77i i qassi nenaara gaittanau yees; aaranne oiddu xeetu asai de7ees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: I am not worthy of the least of all the mercies, and of all the truth, which thou hast shewed unto thy servant; for with my staff I passed over this Jordan; and now I am become two bands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi yayyidi batibatiis; banaara de7iya asaa naa77u citan shaakkiis; qassi ba dorssaa, deeshshaa, miizzaanne gaameelaa naa77u citan shaakkiis.

English Sentences: Deliver me, I pray thee, from the hand of my brother, from the hand of Esau: for I fear him, lest he will come and smite me, and the mother with the children.
Wolaitta Sentences: I, "Eesawi yiidi issi citaa oliyaabaa gidikko, attida citai kessi ekkikkonne" yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: And thou saidst, I will surely do thee good, and make thy seed as the sand of the sea, which cannot be numbered for multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yaaqoobi hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet GODAU, ta aawaa Abrahaama Xoossau, ta aawaa Yisaaqa Xoossau, tana, Ne biitti, ne dabbotukko simma; taani neeyyo lo77obaa oottana giidaagoo,

English Sentences: And he lodged there that same night; and took of that which came to his hand a present for Esau his brother;
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni ne ashkkaraayyo oottido kehatettaunne tumatettau ubbau taani bessennaagaa. Taani ha Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnido wode, taayyo issi xam77a xalaalai de7ees; shin ha77i taani naa77u cita gidaas.

English Sentences: Two hundred she goats, and twenty he goats, two hundred ewes, and twenty rams,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena woossais; ta ishaa Eesawa kushiyaappe tana ashsha; aissi giikko, i yiidi, tananne aayeta eta naatuura xaissanaakkonne gaada yayyaas.

English Sentences: Thirty milch camels with their colts, forty kine, and ten bulls, twenty she asses, and ten foals.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni tana, Taani neeyyo tumu lo77obaa oottana; taani ne zerettaanne qoodanau danddayettenna abbaa shafiyaa keena oottana giidoogaa qoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he delivered them into the hand of his servants, every drove by themselves; and said unto his servants, Pass over before me, and put a space betwixt drove and drove.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassa qammi i yan aqiis; bau de7iyaabaa ubbaappe ba ishaa Eesawayyo immiyoobaa qoridi kessiis;

English Sentences: And he commanded the foremost, saying, When Esau my brother meeteth thee, and asketh thee, saying, Whose art thou? and whither goest thou? and whose are these before thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: i kessidoogeeti naa77u xeetu macca deeshshatanne laatamu deeshsha orggeta, naa77u xeetu macca dorssatanne laatamu dorssa orggeta,

English Sentences: Then thou shalt say, They be thy servant Jacob's; it is a present sent unto my lord Esau: and, behold, also he is behind us.
Wolaitta Sentences: hasttamu xanttiya gaameelata eta maratuura, oitamu macca miizzata, tammu korima boorata, laatamu macca haretanne tammu attuma hareta.

English Sentences: And so commanded he the second, and the third, and all that followed the droves, saying, On this manner shall ye speak unto Esau, when ye find him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeta wudiyan wudiyan shaakkidi, ba ashkkaratu kushiyan wottidi, ba ashkkarata, "Taappe sinttau biidi, wudiyaa wudiyaappe haahuwan haahuwan laaggite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And say ye moreover, Behold, thy servant Jacob is behind us. For he said, I will appease him with the present that goeth before me, and afterward I will see his face; peradventure he will accept of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sinttan kaalettiyaagaa, "Ta ishai Eesawi nenaara gaittidi nena, Neeni oossee? Neeni awa bai? Ne sinttan de7iya mehe ubbai oossee? yaagidi oichchiyaabaa gidikko,

English Sentences: So went the present over before him: and himself lodged that night in the company.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni ayyo, Hageeti ne ashkkaraa Yaaqoobassa; eti ta godaa Eesawayyo immanau yeddidoogeeta; qassi ikka nuuppe guyyeera yees yaaga" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And he rose up that night, and took his two wives, and his two womenservants, and his eleven sons, and passed over the ford Jabbok.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i naa77antta heezzanttanne wudiyaa kaalliya harata ubbata hagaadan azaziis; "Intte Eesawaara gaittiyo wode, hannidenkka geeta;

English Sentences: And he took them, and sent them over the brook, and sent over that he had.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashkkaraa Yaaqoobi nuuppe guyyeera yees geennan aggoppite" yaagiis. Aissi giikko i, "Taani taappe sinttau immanau kiittidoban a doshissana; ooni erii, hegaappe guyyiyan taani aara gaittiyo wode, i tana mokki ekkanaakkonne" yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob was left alone; and there wrestled a man with him until the breaking of the day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau ba immiyoobaa baappe sinttau yeddiis. SHin i ba huuphen he gallassi qammi yan aqiis.

English Sentences: And when he saw that he prevailed not against him, he touched the hollow of his thigh; and the hollow of Jacob's thigh was out of joint, as he wrestled with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi qammi Yaaqoobi denddidi, ba naa77u keettaayeta, ba naa77u kaadumatatanne ba naata tammanne isiineta ekkidi, Yaabooqa giyo pinuwaa gakkiis;

English Sentences: And he said, Let me go, for the day breaketh. And he said, I will not let thee go, except thou bless me.
Wolaitta Sentences: i eta shaafaa pinttiis; bau de7iyaabaa ubbaakka pinttidi yeddiis;

English Sentences: And he said unto him, What is thy name? And he said, Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Yaaqoobi barkka attiis. He wode issi asi sa7ai wonttana gakkanaassi aara baaxetiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Thy name shall be called no more Jacob, but Israel: for as a prince hast thou power with God and with men, and hast prevailed.
Wolaitta Sentences: He asi a xoonanau danddayibeennaagaa be7ido wode, Yaaqoobayyo bulxxiyaa meqettaa bochchiis; bochchin a bulxxiyaa meqettai kiyi wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob asked him, and said, Tell me, I pray thee, thy name. And he said, Wherefore is it that thou dost ask after my name? And he blessed him there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin bitanee a, "Sa7ai wonttido gishshau, tana yedda" yaagiis. SHin Yaaqoobi a, "Neeni tana anjjennan taani nena yeddikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob called the name of the place Peniel: for I have seen God face to face, and my life is preserved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bitanee a, "Ne sunttai oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin i, "Yaaqooba" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And as he passed over Penuel the sun rose upon him, and he halted upon his thigh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bitanee a, "Hagaappe sinttau ne sunttai Israa7eela geetettoppe attin, Yaaqooba geetettoppo; aissi giikko, neeni Xoossaaranne asaara baaxetada xoonadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore the children of Israel eat not of the sinew which shrank, which is upon the hollow of the thigh, unto this day: because he touched the hollow of Jacob's thigh in the sinew that shrank.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi a, "Ne sunttai oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis. SHin bitanee, "Neeni ta sunttaa aissi oichchai?" yaagiis; yaagidi a anjjiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob lifted up his eyes, and looked, and, behold, Esau came, and with him four hundred men. And he divided the children unto Leah, and unto Rachel, and unto the two handmaids.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Yaaqoobi he sohuwaa PHinii7eela giidi sunttiis; aissi giikko i, "Taani Xoossaa baazzan xeellaas; gidikkonne taani paxa attaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he put the handmaids and their children foremost, and Leah and her children after, and Rachel and Joseph hindermost.
Wolaitta Sentences: I PHinii7eelappe denddiyo wode, a bolli xalqqee doliis. I ba bulxxiyaa meqettaa gishshau wobbees.

English Sentences: And he passed over before them, and bowed himself to the ground seven times, until he came near to his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba bulxxee ashuwaa matan boshettido gishshau, Israa7eela asai mehiyaa bulxxiyaa ashuwaa hachchi gakkanaassikka meenna.

English Sentences: And Esau ran to meet him, and embraced him, and fell on his neck, and kissed him: and they wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi xoqqu gi xeellidi, Eesawi ba oiddu xeetu asaara yiyaagaa be7iis. Hegaa gishshau naata Liyissi, Raaheelissinne naa77u kaadumatatussi shaakkiis.

English Sentences: And he lifted up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, Who are those with thee? And he said, The children which God hath graciously given thy servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaadumatatanne eta naata sinttan, Liyonne i naata eta geeduwan, Raaheelonne Yooseefa wurssettan wottiis.

English Sentences: Then the handmaidens came near, they and their children, and they bowed themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i ba huuphen sinttau aadhdhidi, ba ishaakko matiiddi, sa7aa gakki gakkidi laapputon ziggiis.

English Sentences: And Leah also with her children came near, and bowed themselves: and after came Joseph near and Rachel, and they bowed themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Eesawi aara gaittanau woxxidi, a qooriyaa qoommidi yeriis. Eti yeekkidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, What meanest thou by all this drove which I met? And he said, These are to find grace in the sight of my lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Eesawi xoqqu gi xeellidi, maccaasatanne naata be7iis; be7idi i, "Ha nenaara de7iyaageeti oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Yaaqoobi, "Eti Xoossai ne ashkkaraayyo kehatettan immido naata" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Esau said, I have enough, my brother; keep that thou hast unto thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kaadumatati bantta naatuura shiiqidi ziggidosona.

English Sentences: And Jacob said, Nay, I pray thee, if now I have found grace in thy sight, then receive my present at my hand: for therefore I have seen thy face, as though I had seen the face of God, and thou wast pleased with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Liyanne i naati yiidi ziggidosona; wurssettan Yooseefinne Raaheela yiidi ziggidosona.

English Sentences: Take, I pray thee, my blessing that is brought to thee; because God hath dealt graciously with me, and because I have enough. And he urged him, and he took it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawi, "Ha sinttan tanaara gaittida wudee ubbai qassi aibee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin i, "Ta godau, hegee taani ne sinttan nashettanaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Let us take our journey, and let us go, and I will go before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Eesawi, "Ta ishau, taayyo daroi de7ees; nebai neessa gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto him, My lord knoweth that the children are tender, and the flocks and herds with young are with me: and if men should overdrive them one day, all the flock will die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi, "CHii, ha77i taani ne sinttan nashettidabaa gidikko, ha taani immiyoogaa taappe ekka. Neeni tana mokka ekkido gishshau, taani ne som77uwaa be7iyoogee Xoossaa som77uwaa be7iyoogaa mala.

English Sentences: Let my lord, I pray thee, pass over before his servant: and I will lead on softly, according as the cattle that goeth before me and the children be able to endure, until I come unto my lord unto Seir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo ehiido ha imuwaa ekka; aissi giikko, Xoossai kehidi immin, taayyo bessiis" yaagiis. Yaaqoobi shoobiyaa tolido gishshau, Eesawi hegaa ekkiis.

English Sentences: And Esau said, Let me now leave with thee some of the folk that are with me. And he said, What needeth it? let me find grace in the sight of my lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Eesawi, "Ane hindda; nu ogiyaa boos; taani nenaara issippe baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Esau returned that day on his way unto Seir.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yaaqoobi a, "Ta godau, naati shugo gidiyoogaa eraasa; qassi taani bantta galo marata xanttiya dorssatanne miizzaa naagana koshshees; asai eta issi gallassaa tolidi laaggikko, mehe ubbai haiqqana.

English Sentences: And Jacob journeyed to Succoth, and built him an house, and made booths for his cattle: therefore the name of the place is called Succoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ta godau, ne ashkkaraappe sinttatada ba; taani Se7iiran ta godaa gakkanaassi, ta sinttan de7iya mehiyaa hemetaa keesaanne naatu hemetaa keesaa loddan kaallana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob came to Shalem, a city of Shechem, which is in the land of Canaan, when he came from Padanaram; and pitched his tent before the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eesawi a, "Yaanikko taani ta asaappe amaridaagaa neeyyo ashshais" yaagiis. SHin Yaaqoobi a, "Hegee aissee? Taani ta godaa sinttan nashettiyoogee tau gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he bought a parcel of a field, where he had spread his tent, at the hand of the children of Hamor, Shechem's father, for an hundred pieces of money.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Eesawi he gallassi ogiyan gelidi, Se7iira simmiis.

English Sentences: And he erected there an altar, and called it EleloheIsrael.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yaaqoobi Sukkota biis; yan baayyo keettaa keexxiis; ba mehetuyyoonne daaseta daasiis. Hegaa gishshau he sohuwaa Sukkota giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Dinah the daughter of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob, went out to see the daughters of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Masphphexoomiyaappe simmido wode, Kanaane biittan de7iya Sekeema giyo katamaa sarotettan gakkiis; i he katamaayyo baazzan uttiis.

English Sentences: And when Shechem the son of Hamor the Hivite, prince of the country, saw her, he took her, and lay with her, and defiled her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba dunkkaaniyaa tolido gadiyaa SHekeema aawaa Hamoora naatuppe xeetu xaqara biran shammiis.

English Sentences: And his soul clave unto Dinah the daughter of Jacob, and he loved the damsel, and spake kindly unto the damsel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yan yarshshiyoosaa keexxidi a, "Xoossaa, Israa7eela Xoossaa" giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Shechem spake unto his father Hamor, saying, Get me this damsel to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liya Yaaqoobayyo yelido na7iyaa Diina, he wode he biittaa maccaasata be7anau kiyaasu.

English Sentences: And Jacob heard that he had defiled Dinah his daughter: now his sons were with his cattle in the field: and Jacob held his peace until they were come.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittaa haariya Hiiwiyaa Hamoora na7aa SHekeemi o be7idi, o dafi efiidi mooriis.

English Sentences: And Hamor the father of Shechem went out unto Jacob to commune with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A wozanai Yaaqooba na7iyo Diino amottiis; i o siiqiis; siiqidi o lo77iyaabaa iyyo haasayiis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jacob came out of the field when they heard it: and the men were grieved, and they were very wroth, because he had wrought folly in Israel in lying with Jacob's daughter; which thing ought not to be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHekeemi ba aawaa Hamoora, "Taayyo ha na7iyo machcho oichcharkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Hamor communed with them, saying, The soul of my son Shechem longeth for your daughter: I pray you give her him to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi ba na7iyaa Diina moorettidoogaa siyiyo wode, a attuma naati bazzon mehiyaara de7oosona; hegaa gishshau eti gakkanaashin co77u giis.

English Sentences: And make ye marriages with us, and give your daughters unto us, and take our daughters unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, SHekeema aawaa Hamoori Yaaqoobaara haasayanau yiis.

English Sentences: And ye shall dwell with us: and the land shall be before you; dwell and trade ye therein, and get you possessions therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba attuma naati hegaa siyidosaara bazzoppe yiidosona; eti azzanidosonanne yiillotidosona; aissi giikko, SHekeemi Yaaqooba na7iyo dafi efiidi mooriyoogan, Israa7eela bolli pokkobaa, oottanau bessennabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: And Shechem said unto her father and unto her brethren, Let me find grace in your eyes, and what ye shall say unto me I will give.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Hamoori eta, "Ta na7ai SHekeemi intte na7eessi daro dagammiis; hayyanintta o assi machcho immerkketii!

English Sentences: Ask me never so much dowry and gift, and I will give according as ye shall say unto me: but give me the damsel to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nunaara ekettitenne gelettite; intte macca naata nuuyyo immite; nu macca naatanne intteyyo ekkite.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jacob answered Shechem and Hamor his father deceitfully, and said, because he had defiled Dinah their sister:
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte nu giddon uttana danddayeeta; biittai keehi aaho; an de7ite; zal77ite; an aquwaa demmite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said unto them, We cannot do this thing, to give our sister to one that is uncircumcised; for that were a reproach unto us:
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode SHekeemi Diini aawaanne i ishantta, "Taani intte sinttan nashettikko, intte caddiyoobaa aiba gidikkonne immana.

English Sentences: But in this will we consent unto you: If ye will be as we be, that every male of you be circumcised;
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte mishira na7eessi immiyoobaanne koyitaa intte koyido keenaa darissidi tana caddite; taani intte tana caddidobaa aibanne immana; shin taani machchanau na7iyo taayyo immerkketii!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then will we give our daughters unto you, and we will take your daughters to us, and we will dwell with you, and we will become one people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta michchiyo Diino SHekeemi tunissido gishshau, Yaaqooba attuma naati SHekeemayyoonne a aawaa Hamoorayyo worddobaa yootidosona;

English Sentences: But if ye will not hearken unto us, to be circumcised; then will we take our daughter, and we will be gone.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta hagaadan yaagidosona; "Nuuni hegaa malabaa oottana danddayokko; nuuni nu michchiyo qaxxarettibeenna asau immokko; hegee nuna kaushshiyaabaa.

English Sentences: And their words pleased Hamor, and Shechem Hamor's son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni intte issibaa oottikko intteyyo, Eeno gaana; hegee aibee giikko, intte biittaa attumaasai ubbai qaxxarettidi nunadan hanikko,

English Sentences: And the young man deferred not to do the thing, because he had delight in Jacob's daughter: and he was more honourable than all the house of his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: yaanikko nuuni nu macca naata intteyyo immanau Eeno gaana; intte macca naatakka nuuyyo ekkana. Nuuni intte giddon uttidi, inttenaara issi asa gidana.

English Sentences: And Hamor and Shechem his son came unto the gate of their city, and communed with the men of their city, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte qaxxarettanau maayennabaa gidikko, nuuni nu michchiyo ekkidi baana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: These men are peaceable with us; therefore let them dwell in the land, and trade therein; for the land, behold, it is large enough for them; let us take their daughters to us for wives, and let us give them our daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti giidobai Hamooraunne a na7aa SHekeemau lo77o milatiis.

English Sentences: Only herein will the men consent unto us for to dwell with us, to be one people, if every male among us be circumcised, as they are circumcised.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wodallai, ba aawaa keettan de7iya ubbaappe aadhdhi bonchchettidaagee, Yaaqooba na7en ufaittido gishshau, eti giidobaa oottanau takkibeenna.

English Sentences: Shall not their cattle and their substance and every beast of theirs be ours? only let us consent unto them, and they will dwell with us.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Hamoorinne a na7ai SHekeemi bantta katamaa gutaraa biidi, bantta katamaa asau hagaadan yaagidi yootidosona;

English Sentences: And unto Hamor and unto Shechem his son hearkened all that went out of the gate of his city; and every male was circumcised, all that went out of the gate of his city.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha asati nunaara siga; eti nu biittan de7onanne zal77ona; biittai keehi aaho. Eta macca naatanne nuuni ekkana; etinne nu macca naata ekkana.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the third day, when they were sore, that two of the sons of Jacob, Simeon and Levi, Dinah's brethren, took each man his sword, and came upon the city boldly, and slew all the males.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nunaara eti issi asadan de7anau nuuni issibaa maayettanau koshshees; hegeenne, eti qaxxarettidoogaadan nu attumaasai ubbai qaxxarettanaagaa.

English Sentences: And they slew Hamor and Shechem his son with the edge of the sword, and took Dinah out of Shechem's house, and went out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni hegaadan oottikko, eta miizzai, eta aqoinne eta hara mehe ubbai nubaa gidennee? Hegaa gishshau ane nuuni eti giyoogaa maayoos; etinne nu giddon de7ana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Jacob came upon the slain, and spoiled the city, because they had defiled their sister.
Wolaitta Sentences: Katamaa gutaraa shiiqida asati ubbai Hamoorayyoonne a na7aa SHekeemayyo, "Eeno" giidosona. Yaatin he katamaa attumaasati ubbai qaxxarettidosona.

English Sentences: They took their sheep, and their oxen, and their asses, and that which was in the city, and that which was in the field,
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto gallassi, eti ubbai bantta qaxxaraa masunttaa sahettishin, Yaaqooba attuma naatuppe naa77ai, Simooninne Leewi, Diini ishantti, bantta bisuwaa ekkidi, ooninne erennan katamaa gelidi, attumaasata ubbaa woridosona.

English Sentences: And all their wealth, and all their little ones, and their wives took they captive, and spoiled even all that was in the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hamooranne a na7aa SHekeema bisuwan woridi, bantta michchiyo Diino SHekeema keettaappe ekkidi efiidosona.

English Sentences: And Jacob said to Simeon and Levi, Ye have troubled me to make me to stink among the inhabitants of the land, among the Canaanites and the Perizzites: and I being few in number, they shall gather themselves together against me, and slay me; and I shall be destroyed, I and my house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba attuma naati he ahatu bolli gelidi, bantta michchiyo Diino tunissida katamaa bonqqidosona.

English Sentences: And they said, Should he deal with our sister as with an harlot?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta dorssaa wudiyaa, miizzaa wudiyaa, hariyaa, katama giddon de7iyaabaanne gaxan de7iyaabaa ubbaa ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And God said unto Jacob, Arise, go up to Bethel, and dwell there: and make there an altar unto God, that appeared unto thee when thou fleddest from the face of Esau thy brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta aquwaa ubbaa, eta naata ubbaanne maccaasata ubbaa omooddidosona; keettan de7idabaa ubbaa bonqqidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jacob said unto his household, and to all that were with him, Put away the strange gods that are among you, and be clean, and change your garments:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Simoonanne Leewa, "Intte ta bolli metuwaa ehiichchideta; ha biittan de7iya Kanaanetinne Parzzeti tana ixxana; nuuni qoodan guutta; eti issippe gididi ta bolli woraajjikko, taaninne ta so asai xayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And let us arise, and go up to Bethel; and I will make there an altar unto God, who answered me in the day of my distress, and was with me in the way which I went.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti, "Yaatin i nu michchiyo shaaramuxadan oottana bessii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they gave unto Jacob all the strange gods which were in their hand, and all their earrings which were in their ears; and Jacob hid them under the oak which was by Shechem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hegaappe guyyiyan Yaaqooba, "Dendda! Denddada pude Beeteele ba; baada yan de7a. Neeni ne ishaa Eesawappe baqatiyo wode neeyyo qonccida Xoossaayyo yan yarshshiyoosaa keexxa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they journeyed: and the terror of God was upon the cities that were round about them, and they did not pursue after the sons of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaaqoobi ba so asaanne banaara de7iyaageeta ubbaa, "Intte gidduwan de7iya allaga xoossatu misileta diggite; intte bollaa geeshshite; intte maayuwaanne laammite.

English Sentences: So Jacob came to Luz, which is in the land of Canaan, that is, Bethel, he and all the people that were with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane denddidi, pude Beeteele boos; ta metuwaa gallassi taayyo siyida, taani biidosan ubban tanaara gidida Xoossau, taani yan yarshshiyoosaa keexxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he built there an altar, and called the place Elbethel: because there God appeared unto him, when he fled from the face of his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau eti banttayyo de7iya allaga xoossatu misileta ubbaanne bantta haittan de7iya gutuchchaa ubbaa Yaaqobau immidosona; immin Yaaqoobi hegeeta Sekeeman de7iya wolaa garssan moogiis.

English Sentences: But Deborah Rebekah's nurse died, and she was buried beneath Bethel under an oak: and the name of it was called Allonbachuth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobinne a attuma naati denddidi biishin, issi urainne eta oiqqanau kaallibeenna; aissi giikko, eti biishin, eta yuushuwan de7iya katamaa asaa ubbaa bolli Xoossaa dagamai wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And God appeared unto Jacob again, when he came out of Padanaram, and blessed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobinne aara de7iya asai ubbai Kanaane biittan de7iya Beeteele giyo Looza gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And God said unto him, Thy name is Jacob: thy name shall not be called any more Jacob, but Israel shall be thy name: and he called his name Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gakkin yan i yarshshiyoosaa keexxiis; i he sohuwaa El-Beeteele giidi sunttiis; aissi giikko, i ba ishaappe baqatidi biyo wode, Xoossai ayyo qonccido sohoi hegaa.

English Sentences: And God said unto him, I am God Almighty: be fruitful and multiply; a nation and a company of nations shall be of thee, and kings shall come out of thy loins;
Wolaitta Sentences: dichchiya Deboora yan haiqqaasu; Beeteeleppe hirkkiira de7iya wolaa garssan a moogettaasu; hegaa gishshau he mittaa sunttai Yeehuwaa Wolaa geetettiis.

English Sentences: And the land which I gave Abraham and Isaac, to thee I will give it, and to thy seed after thee will I give the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Masphphexoomiyaappe simmidoogaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai ayyo zaaretti qonccidi, a anjjiis;

English Sentences: And God went up from him in the place where he talked with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai a, "Ne sunttai Yaaqooba; shin hagaappe sinttanau neeni mulekka Yaaqooba geetettakka; ne sunttai Israa7eela gidana" yaagidi i a Israa7eela sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob set up a pillar in the place where he talked with him, even a pillar of stone: and he poured a drink offering thereon, and he poured oil thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Xoossai Yaaqooba, "Taani Ubbaa Danddayiya Xoossaa; neeni yeletta; coratta; kawotettatinne kawotettaa asai neeppe kiyana; kawotikka ne gulbbataappe kiyana.

English Sentences: And Jacob called the name of the place where God spake with him, Bethel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Abrahaamaunne Yisaaqau immido biittaa, qassi neeyyo immais; neeppe guyyiyankka taani ha biittaa ne zerettaayyo immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they journeyed from Bethel; and there was but a little way to come to Ephrath: and Rachel travailed, and she had hard labour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai aara haasayido sohuwaappe pude kiyiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when she was in hard labour, that the midwife said unto her, Fear not; thou shalt have this son also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Xoossai banaara haasayido sohuwan shuchchaa essidi, a bolli ushshaa yarshshuwaa tigiis; zaitiyaakka a bolli tigiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, (for she died) that she called his name Benoni: but his father called him Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Xoossai banaara haasayido sohuwaa "Beeteele" giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Rachel died, and was buried in the way to Ephrath, which is Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaappe guyyiyan, Beeteeleppe denddidosona. Eti Efiraataa gakkanau guuttaa ashshidaashin, Raaheelo maaretai oiqqiis; maaretan a keehi waayettaasu.

English Sentences: And Jacob set a pillar upon her grave: that is the pillar of Rachel's grave unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maaretai o waayissido wode o yelissiyaara, "Yayyoppa; hageekka attuma na7aa" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Israel journeyed, and spread his tent beyond the tower of Edar.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a haiqqaidda, shemppoi kiyishin, ba na7aa Ben77ona sunttaasu; shin a aawai a Biniyaama sunttiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Israel dwelt in that land, that Reuben went and lay with Bilhah his father's concubine: and Israel heard it. Now the sons of Jacob were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Raaheela haiqqa bayaasu; haiqqada Beetaliheeme giyo Efiraata efiya ogiyaa doonan moogettaasu.

English Sentences: The sons of Leah; Reuben, Jacob's firstborn, and Simeon, and Levi, and Judah, and Issachar, and Zebulun:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi i duufuwan hawulttiyaa shuchchaa essiis; he hawulttee hachchi gakkanaassikka Raaheeli duufuwaa erissees.

English Sentences: The sons of Rachel; Joseph, and Benjamin:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli hegaappe denddidi, Edera gimbbiyaappe hefinttan ba dunkkaaniyaa tokkiis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Bilhah, Rachel's handmaid; Dan, and Naphtali:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli he biittan de7ishin, Roobeeli biidi, ba aawaassi yelida kaadumatee Baaliira zin77iis. Israa7eelinne ha yohuwaa siyiis. Yaaqooba attuma naati tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: And the sons of Zilpah, Leah's handmaid; Gad, and Asher: these are the sons of Jacob, which were born to him in Padanaram.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liyi naati Yaaqooba baira na7aa Roobeela, Simoona, Leewa, Yihudaa, Yisaakooranne Zaabiloona.

English Sentences: And Jacob came unto Isaac his father unto Mamre, unto the city of Arbah, which is Hebron, where Abraham and Isaac sojourned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheeli attuma naati Yooseefanne Biniyaama.

English Sentences: And the days of Isaac were an hundred and fourscore years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Raaheeli danggiriixee Baali attuma naati Daananne Nifttaaleema.

English Sentences: And Isaac gave up the ghost, and died, and was gathered unto his people, being old and full of days: and his sons Esau and Jacob buried him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liyi danggiriixee Zilppi attuma naati Gaadanne Aseera. Hageeti Masphphexoomiyan Yaaqoobayyo yelettida a attuma naata.

English Sentences: Now these are the generations of Esau, who is Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Kebroona giyo Qiriyaati-Arbba7a matan Mamiren de7iya, ba aawaa Yisaaqa soo yiis; he sohoi kase Abrahaaminne Yisaaqi de7ido soho.

English Sentences: Esau took his wives of the daughters of Canaan; Adah the daughter of Elon the Hittite, and Aholibamah the daughter of Anah the daughter of Zibeon the Hivite;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaaqi xeetanne hosppun tammu laittaa de7iis;

English Sentences: And Bashemath Ishmael's daughter, sister of Nebajoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: i daro wodiyaa de7idi, lo77o ceeggidi haiqqiis; haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis. A naati Eesawinne Yaaqoobi a moogidosona.

English Sentences: And Adah bare to Esau Eliphaz; and Bashemath bare Reuel;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma giyo Eesawa yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa.

English Sentences: And Aholibamah bare Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah: these are the sons of Esau, which were born unto him in the land of Canaan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawi Kanaane biittaa macca naatuppe bau machchota ekkiis; etinne Hiitiyaa Eloona na7iyo Aado, Hiiwiyaa Xibaa7oona na7ai Aani yelido Oholiibaamonne

English Sentences: And Esau took his wives, and his sons, and his daughters, and all the persons of his house, and his cattle, and all his beasts, and all his substance, which he had got in the land of Canaan; and went into the country from the face of his brother Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isimaa7eela na7iyo, Nabaayoota michchiyo Baasemaato.

English Sentences: For their riches were more than that they might dwell together; and the land wherein they were strangers could not bear them because of their cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aada Eesawayyo Elifaaza yelaasu; Baasemaatakka Ra7u7eela yelaasu;

English Sentences: Thus dwelt Esau in mount Seir: Esau is Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oholiibaama Ya7uusha, Yaa7ilaamanne Qoraaha yelaasu; Kanaane biittan Eesawayyo yelettida attuma naati hageeta.

English Sentences: And these are the generations of Esau the father of the Edomites in mount Seir:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawi ba keettaayeta, ba attuma naatanne macca naata, ba so asa ubbaa, ba miizzatanne ba mehe ubbaa Kanaane biittan i haaridobaa ubbaa ekkidi, ba ishaa Yaaqoobappe haakkiya biitti biis.

English Sentences: These are the names of Esau's sons; Eliphaz the son of Adah the wife of Esau, Reuel the son of Bashemath the wife of Esau.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta aqoi darido gishshau, eti issippe de7anau danddayibookkona; eta mehee darido gishshau, eti de7iyo biittai eta naa77aayyo gidanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: And the sons of Eliphaz were Teman, Omar, Zepho, and Gatam, and Kenaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin Eedooma giyo Eesawi Se7iira giyo gezziyan uttiis.

English Sentences: And Timna was concubine to Eliphaz Esau's son; and she bare to Eliphaz Amalek: these were the sons of Adah Esau's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Se7iira gezziyan de7ida Eedoomatu aawaa Eesawa yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa.

English Sentences: And these are the sons of Reuel; Nahath, and Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah: these were the sons of Bashemath Esau's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee Eesawa attuma naatu sunttaa; hegeetinne Eesawa keettaayee Aadi na7aa Elifaazanne Eesawa keettaayee Baasemaati na7aa Ra7u7eela.

English Sentences: And these were the sons of Aholibamah, the daughter of Anah the daughter of Zibeon, Esau's wife: and she bare to Esau Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elifaaza naati Temaana, Omaara, Xafa, Ga7itaamanne Qanaaza.

English Sentences: These were dukes of the sons of Esau: the sons of Eliphaz the firstborn son of Esau; duke Teman, duke Omar, duke Zepho, duke Kenaz,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Timinaa7a Eesawa na7aa Elifaazayyo kaadumata; a Elifaazayyo Amaaleeqa yelaasu. Hageeti Eesawa keettaayee Aadi na7aa naata.

English Sentences: Duke Korah, duke Gatam, and duke Amalek: these are the dukes that came of Eliphaz in the land of Edom; these were the sons of Adah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ra7u7eela attuma naati Nahaata, Zaraaha, SHammanne Miiza; hageeti Eesawa keettaayee Baasemaati na7aa naata.

English Sentences: And these are the sons of Reuel Esau's son; duke Nahath, duke Zerah, duke Shammah, duke Mizzah: these are the dukes that came of Reuel in the land of Edom; these are the sons of Bashemath Esau's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xibaa7oona na7ai Aani yelido Oholiibaama attuma naati hageeta; a Eesawayyo Ya7uusha, Yaa7ilaamanne Qoraaha yelaasu.

English Sentences: And these are the sons of Aholibamah Esau's wife; duke Jeush, duke Jaalam, duke Korah: these were the dukes that came of Aholibamah the daughter of Anah, Esau's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawa yeletaa halaqati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Eesawayyo baira na7aa Elifaaza attuma naati, halaqa gididaageeti Temaana, Omaara, Xafa, Qanaaza,

English Sentences: These are the sons of Esau, who is Edom, and these are their dukes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qoraaha, Ga7itaamanne Amaaleeqa; Eedooma biittan Elifaazi yelido halaqati hageeta; hageeti ubbai Aadi na7aa naata.

English Sentences: These are the sons of Seir the Horite, who inhabited the land; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawa na7aa Ra7u7eela attuma naati, halaqa gididaageeti Nahaata, Zaraaha, SHammanne Miiza; Eedooma biittan Ra7u7eeli yelido halaqati hageeta; eti Eesawa keettaayee Baasemaati na7aa naata.

English Sentences: And Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan: these are the dukes of the Horites, the children of Seir in the land of Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawa keettaayee Oholiibaami attuma naati, halaqa gididaageeti Ya7uusha, Yaa7ilaamanne Qoraaha; eti Aana na7ee, Eesawa keettaayee Oholiibaamippe yelettida halaqata.

English Sentences: And the children of Lotan were Hori and Hemam; and Lotan's sister was Timna.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma giyo Eesawa attuma naati hageeta; eta halaqatikka hageeta.

English Sentences: And the children of Shobal were these; Alvan, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shepho, and Onam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma biittan de7iya Hooriyaa Se7iira attuma naati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta; hegeetikka Loxaana, SHobaala, Xibaa7oona, Aana,

English Sentences: And these are the children of Zibeon; both Ajah, and Anah: this was that Anah that found the mules in the wilderness, as he fed the asses of Zibeon his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dishoona, Exeeranne Dishaana; hegeeti, Eedooma biittan de7iya Se7iira attuma naati, Hooretu halaqata.

English Sentences: And the children of Anah were these; Dishon, and Aholibamah the daughter of Anah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Loxaana attuma naati Hooranne Heemaama; Loxaana michchiyaa Timinaa7o.

English Sentences: And these are the children of Dishon; Hemdan, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHobaala attuma naati Aaliwaana, Maanahaata, Eebaala, SHefanne Oonaama.

English Sentences: The children of Ezer are these; Bilhan, and Zaavan, and Akan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xibaa7oona attuma naati Aayanne Aana; hagee Aani bazzon ba aawaa Xibaa7oona hareta heemmiiddi haattaa bilbbuwaa demmidaagaa.

English Sentences: The children of Dishan are these; Uz, and Aran.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aana na7ai Dishoona; na7iyaa qassi Oholiibaamo.

English Sentences: These are the dukes that came of the Horites; duke Lotan, duke Shobal, duke Zibeon, duke Anah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Dishoona attuma naati Hemddaana, Eshibaana, Yitiraananne Karaana.

English Sentences: Duke Dishon, duke Ezer, duke Dishan: these are the dukes that came of Hori, among their dukes in the land of Seir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Exeera attuma naati Bilihaana, Za7iwaananne Aqaana.

English Sentences: And these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom, before there reigned any king over the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dishaana attuma naati Uuxanne Araana.

English Sentences: And Bela the son of Beor reigned in Edom: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hooretu halaqati hageeta; Loxaana, SHobaala, Xibaa7oona, Aana,

English Sentences: And Bela died, and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dishoona, Exeeranne Dishaana. Hageeti Se7iira biittan bantta yaran yaran shaahettida Hooretu halaqata.

English Sentences: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelan kawoi kawotanaappe kase Eedooma biittan kawotida kawoti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta.

English Sentences: And Husham died, and Hadad the son of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba7oora na7ai Belaa7i Eedooman kawotiis; a katamaa sunttai Dinaaba geetettees.

English Sentences: And Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Belaa7i haiqqin, Booxirappe yiida Zaraaha na7ai Yobaabi kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Samlah died, and Saul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yobaabi haiqqin, Temaana biittaappe yiida Hushaami kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Saul died, and Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hushaami haiqqin, Badaada na7ai Hadaadi, Midiyaama asata Moo7aaba biittan xoonidaagee kawotiis; a katamaa sunttai Awiita geetettiis.

English Sentences: And Baalhanan the son of Achbor died, and Hadar reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pau; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi haiqqin, Maasireeqappe yiida Saamili kawotiis.

English Sentences: And these are the names of the dukes that came of Esau, according to their families, after their places, by their names; duke Timnah, duke Alvah, duke Jetheth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Saamili haiqqin, shaafaa matan de7iya Rahobootappe yiida SHaa7uuli kawotiis.

English Sentences: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaa7uuli haiqqin, Akiboora na7ai Ba7aalihanaani kawotiis.

English Sentences: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
Wolaitta Sentences: Akiboora na7aa Ba7aalihanaani haiqqin, Hadaari kawotiis; a katamaa sunttai Paa7u geetettees; a keettaayyiyaa Mezaahaaba na7iyaa Maaxireeda yelido Mahexaabi7eelo geetettausu.

English Sentences: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram: these be the dukes of Edom, according to their habitations in the land of their possession: he is Esau the father of the Edomites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawa yeletaa halaqati bantta yaran yaran, bantta sohuwan sohuwaaninne bantta sunttan sunttan hageeta; Timinaa7a, Aliwa, Yeteeta,

English Sentences: And Jacob dwelt in the land wherein his father was a stranger, in the land of Canaan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oholiibaama, Eela, Piinoona,

English Sentences: These are the generations of Jacob. Joseph, being seventeen years old, was feeding the flock with his brethren; and the lad was with the sons of Bilhah, and with the sons of Zilpah, his father's wives: and Joseph brought unto his father their evil report.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qanaaza, Temaana, Mibxxaara,

English Sentences: Now Israel loved Joseph more than all his children, because he was the son of his old age: and he made him a coat of many colours.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maagidi7eelanne Iraama. Hageeti bantta haariyo biittan, bantta de7iyoosan de7iyoosan Eedooma halaqata. Hagee Eesawi, Eedoomatu aawaa.

English Sentences: And when his brethren saw that their father loved him more than all his brethren, they hated him, and could not speak peaceably unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi ba aawai de7ido Kanaane biittan uttiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph dreamed a dream, and he told it his brethren: and they hated him yet the more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba naati hanidobai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Yooseefi tammanne laappun laitta na7a gidido wode, ba aawaa kaadumatatuppe, Baalippenne Zilppippe yelettida ba ishanttuura wudiyaa heemmees. He wode i ba aawaayyo eti oottido iitabaa yootees.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Hear, I pray you, this dream which I have dreamed:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli Yooseefa cimidi yelido gishshau, ba hara attuma naatu ubbaappe aattidi siiqees. I ayyo alleeqettida maayuwaa giigissiis.

English Sentences: For, behold, we were binding sheaves in the field, and, lo, my sheaf arose, and also stood upright; and, behold, your sheaves stood round about, and made obeisance to my sheaf.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ishantti bantta aawai a etappe aattidi siiqiyoogaa be7ido wode, eti a ixxidi, keha qaala ayyo haasayanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: And his brethren said to him, Shalt thou indeed reign over us? or shalt thou indeed have dominion over us? And they hated him yet the more for his dreams, and for his words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi aimo aimottidi, ba ishanttuyyo yootiis; yootin eti a yaa darissidi ixxidosona.

English Sentences: And he dreamed yet another dream, and told it his brethren, and said, Behold, I have dreamed a dream more; and, behold, the sun and the moon and the eleven stars made obeisance to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta, "Taani aimottido aimuwaa siyite.

English Sentences: And he told it to his father, and to his brethren: and his father rebuked him, and said unto him, What is this dream that thou hast dreamed? Shall I and thy mother and thy brethren indeed come to bow down ourselves to thee to the earth?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni gaden mirqqiyaa qachchishin, ta mirqqee issi kuttan denddidi sitti giidi eqqi bayin, intte mirqqeti yuuyi aadhdhidi ta mirqqiyaassi ziggidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And his brethren envied him; but his father observed the saying.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin a ishantti a, "Neeni nu bollan kawotana hanaiyye? Woikko nuna tumu haarana hanaiyye?" yaagidosona. Eti a aimuwaa gishshaunne a oduwaa gishshau, yaa darissidi ixxidosona.

English Sentences: And his brethren went to feed their father's flock in Shechem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yooseefi hara aimuwaa aimottidi, ba ishanttuyyo yootiis; "Siyite; taani hara aimuwaakka aimottaas. He aimuwan awai, aginainne tammanne isiini xoolintteti taayyo ziggoosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Israel said unto Joseph, Do not thy brethren feed the flock in Shechem? come, and I will send thee unto them. And he said to him, Here am I.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba aawaayyoonne ba ishanttuyyo he aimuwaa yootido wode, a aawai a, "Hagee neeni aimottidoogee aiba aimoo? Tumu taani, ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti yiidi, ne sinttan sa7an gufannidi neeyyo zigganeeyye?" yaagidi seeriis.

English Sentences: And he said to him, Go, I pray thee, see whether it be well with thy brethren, and well with the flocks; and bring me word again. So he sent him out of the vale of Hebron, and he came to Shechem.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ishantti a qanaatidosona; shin a aawai ha yohuwaa ba wozanan wottiis.

English Sentences: And a certain man found him, and, behold, he was wandering in the field: and the man asked him, saying, What seekest thou?
