English Sentences: And Joseph said unto his brethren, Come near to me, I pray you. And they came near. And he said, I am Joseph your brother, whom ye sold into Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Yooseefi he asaa ubbaa sinttan genccana danddayibeenna; "Asa ubbaa ta sinttappe kessite" yaagidi waassiis. Hegaa gishshau Yooseefi bana ba ishanttuyyo erissido wode, aara ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: Now therefore be not grieved, nor angry with yourselves, that ye sold me hither: for God did send me before you to preserve life.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba qaalaa xoqqissidi, Gibxxeti a siyana gakkanaassi keehi yeekkiis. Kawuwaa so asai he woriyaa siyiis.

English Sentences: For these two years hath the famine been in the land: and yet there are five years, in the which there shall neither be earing nor harvest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba ishantta, "Taani Yooseefattennee! Ta aawai hanno gakkanaassi paxa de7iiyye?" yaagidi oichchiis. SHin a ishantti keehi dagammido gishshau, ayyo zaarana danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: And God sent me before you to preserve you a posterity in the earth, and to save your lives by a great deliverance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanin Yooseefi ba ishantta, "Taakko haa shiiqite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti akko shiiqidosona; shiiqin i eta, "Taani intte ishaa Yooseefa, intte Gibxxe biittau baizzidoogaa.

English Sentences: So now it was not you that sent me hither, but God: and he hath made me a father to Pharaoh, and lord of all his house, and a ruler throughout all the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi intte tana hagau baizzido gishshau, zil77ettoppitenne yiillotoppite; aissi giikko, Xoossai tana intteppe sinttau kiittidoogee asaa shemppuwaa ashshanaassa.

English Sentences: Haste ye, and go up to my father, and say unto him, Thus saith thy son Joseph, God hath made me lord of all Egypt: come down unto me, tarry not:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha biittaa koshai geloosappe naa77antto laitta; qassi yiya ichchashu laittatun asi goyenna woikko cakkenna.

English Sentences: And thou shalt dwell in the land of Goshen, and thou shalt be near unto me, thou, and thy children, and thy children's children, and thy flocks, and thy herds, and all that thou hast:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani sa7an intteyyo zeretta ashshana malanne intte de7uwaa gita ashettaa ashshana mala, Xoossai tana intteppe sinttau kiittiis.

English Sentences: And there will I nourish thee; for yet there are five years of famine; lest thou, and thy household, and all that thou hast, come to poverty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi tana ha sohuwaa kiittidaagee Xoossaa gidiyoogaappe attin, inttena gidekketa. I tana Gibxxe kawuwaassi aawa, a aqota ubbaassi godanne Gibxxe biittaa haariyaagaa oottiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, your eyes see, and the eyes of my brother Benjamin, that it is my mouth that speaketh unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i eesuwan guyye ta aawaakko biidi a, Ne na7ai Yooseefi hagaadan yaagees; "Xoossai tana Gibxxe biitta ubbaa bollan goda kessiis; neeni taakko duge haaya; gam77oppa.

English Sentences: And ye shall tell my father of all my glory in Egypt, and of all that ye have seen; and ye shall haste and bring down my father hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Geseema biittan uttaasa; qassi neeni, ne naati, ne naatu naati, ne dorssaa wudee, ne miizzaa wudeenne neeyyo de7iyaabai ubbai ta matan de7eeta.

English Sentences: And he fell upon his brother Benjamin's neck, and wept; and Benjamin wept upon his neck.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biron ichchashu kosha laittati attidosona; nena, ne so asaanne ne mehiyaa koshai oiqqenna mala, taani nena mizana" yaagiis yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover he kissed all his brethren, and wept upon them: and after that his brethren talked with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Yooseefi eta, "Inttekka ta ishaa Biniyaamikka, ha inttenaara haasayiyaagee tumu tana Yooseefa gidiyoogaa intte aifiyan be7eeta.

English Sentences: And the fame thereof was heard in Pharaoh's house, saying, Joseph's brethren are come: and it pleased Pharaoh well, and his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo Gibxxe biittan de7iya bonchchuwaa ubbaanne intte be7idobaa ubbaa ta aawaayyo yootite; ta aawaanne eesuwan haa duge ekki yiite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Pharaoh said unto Joseph, Say unto thy brethren, This do ye; lade your beasts, and go, get you unto the land of Canaan;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi ba ishaa Biniyaama qooriyaa qoommidi yeekkiis; Biniyaamikka ba ishaa qoommidi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And take your father and your households, and come unto me: and I will give you the good of the land of Egypt, and ye shall eat the fat of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba ishantta ubbaa yeridi, eta bollankka yeekkiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, a ishantti aara haasayidosona.

English Sentences: Now thou art commanded, this do ye; take you wagons out of the land of Egypt for your little ones, and for your wives, and bring your father, and come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefa ishantti yiidoogaa woree kawuwaa keettaa gakkido wode, kawoinne a oosanchchati ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: Also regard not your stuff; for the good of all the land of Egypt is yours.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Yooseefa, "Neeni ne ishantta yaatite ga; Intte mehiyaa caanidi, Kanaane biitti simmite;

English Sentences: And the children of Israel did so: and Joseph gave them wagons, according to the commandment of Pharaoh, and gave them provision for the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: simmidi intte aawaanne intte so asaa ekkidi, guyye taakko haa ehiite. Taani intteyyo Gibxxe biittan ubbasaappe lo77iyaasaa immin, intte ha biittaa modhdhuwaa kaashana yaaga.

English Sentences: To all of them he gave each man changes of raiment; but to Benjamin he gave three hundred pieces of silver, and five changes of raiment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka neeni ne ishantta, Paraa gaariyaa intte naatuyyoonne intte maccaasatuyyo Gibxxeppe ekkidi biite; biidi intte aawaanne ekkidi yiite.

English Sentences: And to his father he sent after this manner; ten asses laden with the good things of Egypt, and ten she asses laden with corn and bread and meat for his father by the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe biittan de7iya ubbaappe aadhdhi lo77iyaabai inttessa gidiyo gishshau, intte aquwau qoppoppite yaagada yoota" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So he sent his brethren away, and they departed: and he said unto them, See that ye fall not out by the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Israa7eela attuma naati giidoogaadan oottidosona. Yooseefi kawoi azazidoogaadan para gaaretanne ogiyaassi shinqqiyaa etau immiis.

English Sentences: And they went up out of Egypt, and came into the land of Canaan unto Jacob their father,
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyo ubbaukka huuphiyan huuphiyan ooratta maayuwaa immiis; shin Biniyaamayyo heezzu xeetu xaqara biraanne ichchashu kumetta maayuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: And told him, saying, Joseph is yet alive, and he is governor over all the land of Egypt. And Jacob's heart fainted, for he believed them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba aawaayyo yeddidobai hagaa; Gibxxen de7iya ubbabaappe lo77iyaabaa tammu hariyan caanidi, qassi ogiyaassi kattaa, oittaanne hara shinqqiyaa tammu macca haretun caanidi yeddiis.

English Sentences: And they told him all the words of Joseph, which he had said unto them: and when he saw the wagons which Joseph had sent to carry him, the spirit of Jacob their father revived:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba ishantta moissiis. Eti biishin i eta, "Ogiyan biiddi ooyettoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Israel said, It is enough; Joseph my son is yet alive: I will go and see him before I die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Gibxxeppe kiyidi biidosona; Kanaane biittaa biidi, bantta aawaa Yaaqoobakko gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And Israel took his journey with all that he had, and came to Beersheba, and offered sacrifices unto the God of his father Isaac.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ayyo hagaadan yaagidi yootidosona; "Yooseefi paxa de7ees! I hegaappenne Gibxxe biitta ubbaa haariyaagaa" yaagidosona; yaagin Yaaqooba dagamai wozanaa bashshido gishshau, eta ammanibeenna.

English Sentences: And God spake unto Israel in the visions of the night, and said, Jacob, Jacob. And he said, Here am I.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti Yooseefi banttayyo yootidobaa ubbaa ayyo yootiininne a ekki ehaana mala Yooseefi kiittido para gaareta i be7in, eta aawaa Yaaqooba shemppoi simmiis.

English Sentences: And he said, I am God, the God of thy father: fear not to go down into Egypt; for I will there make of thee a great nation:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli, "Hegee taayyo gidees; ta na7aa Yooseefi hanno gakkanaassi paxa de7ees! Taani haiqqanaappe kase baada, a be7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: I will go down with thee into Egypt; and I will also surely bring thee up again: and Joseph shall put his hand upon thine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa ekki denddidi, Berssaabeha gakkiis; gakkidi i ba aawaa Yisaaqa Xoossaayyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob rose up from Beersheba: and the sons of Israel carried Jacob their father, and their little ones, and their wives, in the wagons which Pharaoh had sent to carry him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yarshshin Xoossai qammi aimuwan a, "Yaaqoobaa, Yaaqoobaa" yaagiis. Yaagin i, "Yee" giidi koyiis.

English Sentences: And they took their cattle, and their goods, which they had gotten in the land of Canaan, and came into Egypt, Jacob, and all his seed with him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Koyin a, "Taani Xoossaa, ne aawaa Xoossaa; neeni duge Gibxxe baanau yayyoppa; aissi giikko, taani nena yan gita kawotetta kessana.

English Sentences: His sons, and his sons' sons with him, his daughters, and his sons' daughters, and all his seed brought he with him into Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nenaara issippe Gibxxe baana; qassi taani ne zerettaa yaappe kessana. Yooseefi ba kushiyan ne aifiyaa shiishshana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And these are the names of the children of Israel, which came into Egypt, Jacob and his sons: Reuben, Jacob's firstborn.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobi Berssaabehappe denddiis; Israa7eela attuma naati bantta aawaa Yaaqooba, bantta naatanne bantta maccaasata Gibxxe kawoi etau kiittido paraa gaariyan wottidi efiidosona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Phallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Kanaane biittan haarido aquwaanne mehe ubbaa efiidosona. Yaaqoobinne a zeretta ubbai aara Gibxxe biidosona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba attuma naatanne ba naatu attuma naata, ba macca naatanne ba naatu macca naata, hegeenne ba zerettaa ubbaa banaara Gibxxe efiis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelaara Gibxxe biitti biida Israa7eela naatu sunttai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Yaaqooba baira na7ai Roobeela;

English Sentences: And the sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah, and Pharez, and Zarah: but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. And the sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela attuma naati Hanooka, Paalu, Hexiroonanne Karmma.

English Sentences: And the sons of Issachar; Tola, and Phuvah, and Job, and Shimron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona attuma naati Yimu7eela, Yaamiina, Ohaada, Yaakiina, Xohaaranne Kanaane mishiree na7aa SHaa7uula.

English Sentences: And the sons of Zebulun; Sered, and Elon, and Jahleel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewi attuma naati Gershshoona, Qahaatanne Maraara.

English Sentences: These be the sons of Leah, which she bare unto Jacob in Padanaram, with his daughter Dinah: all the souls of his sons and his daughters were thirty and three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa attuma naati Eera, Oonaana, SHeela, Paareesanne Zaraaha; shin Eerinne Oonaani Kanaane biittan haiqqidosona. Paareesa attuma naati Hexiroonanne Hamuula.

English Sentences: And the sons of Gad; Ziphion, and Haggi, Shuni, and Ezbon, Eri, and Arodi, and Areli.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoora attuma naati Tolaa7a, Puuwa, Yaashuubanne SHimiroona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaabiloona attuma naati Sereeda, Eloonanne Yaahila7eela.

English Sentences: These are the sons of Zilpah, whom Laban gave to Leah his daughter, and these she bare unto Jacob, even sixteen souls.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti Liya Masphphexoomiyan Yaaqoobau yelido attuma naata; i macca na7iyaa Diino. Hageeti a naatinne naatu naati muleera hasttamanne heezza.

English Sentences: The sons of Rachel Jacob's wife; Joseph, and Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaada attuma naati Xafoona, Hagga, SHuuna, Exiboona, Eri, Aroodanne Ar77eela.

English Sentences: And unto Joseph in the land of Egypt were born Manasseh and Ephraim, which Asenath the daughter of Potipherah priest of On bare unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera attuma naati Yimina, Yishiwa, Yishiwaahanne Barii7a; eta michchiyaa Seraaho. Barii7a attuma naati Hebeeranne Malkki7eela.

English Sentences: And the sons of Benjamin were Belah, and Becher, and Ashbel, Gera, and Naaman, Ehi, and Rosh, Muppim, and Huppim, and Ard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani ba na7ee Liyiyyo immido Zilppa Yaaqoobau yelido naati hageeta; eti muleera tammanne usuppuna.

English Sentences: These are the sons of Rachel, which were born to Jacob: all the souls were fourteen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba keettaayee Raaheeli attuma naati Yooseefanne Biniyaama.

English Sentences: And the sons of Dan; Hushim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oona katamaa qeesiyaa PHoxiifeera na7iyaa Asinaata Yooseefayyo Gibxxen Minaasanne Efireema yelaasu.

English Sentences: And the sons of Naphtali; Jahzeel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shillem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama naati Belaa7a, Bekeera, Ashibeela, Geera, Naa7imaana, Eeha, Roosha, Muppiima, Huppiimanne Arada.

English Sentences: These are the sons of Bilhah, which Laban gave unto Rachel his daughter, and she bare these unto Jacob: all the souls were seven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobau yelettida Raaheeli attuma naati hageeta; eti muleera tammanne oidda.

English Sentences: All the souls that came with Jacob into Egypt, which came out of his loins, besides Jacob's sons' wives, all the souls were threescore and six;
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana attuma na7ai Hushiima.

English Sentences: And the sons of Joseph, which were born him in Egypt, were two souls: all the souls of the house of Jacob, which came into Egypt, were threescore and ten.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nifttaaleema attuma naati Yaahixi7eela, Guna, Yexeeranne SHiileema.

English Sentences: And he sent Judah before him unto Joseph, to direct his face unto Goshen; and they came into the land of Goshen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laabaani ba na7ee Raaheeliyyo immido Baala Yaaqoobau yelido naati hageeta; eti muleera laappuna.

English Sentences: And Joseph made ready his chariot, and went up to meet Israel his father, to Goshen, and presented himself unto him; and he fell on his neck, and wept on his neck a good while.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobaara Gibxxe biida, a gulbbataappe yelettidaageeti, a naatu keettaayeta gujjennan, muleera usuppun tammanne usuppuna.

English Sentences: And Israel said unto Joseph, Now let me die, since I have seen thy face, because thou art yet alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxen Yooseefayyo yelettida naa77u naata gujjin, Gibxxe biida Yaaqooba so asai muleera laappun tamma.

English Sentences: And Joseph said unto his brethren, and unto his father's house, I will go up, and shew Pharaoh, and say unto him, My brethren, and my father's house, which were in the land of Canaan, are come unto me;
Wolaitta Sentences: Geseema biittan mokkana mala, Yaaqoobi Yihudaa baappe sinttau Yooseefakko kiittiis; eti Geseema gakkido wode,

English Sentences: And the men are shepherds, for their trade hath been to feed cattle; and they have brought their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba para gaariyaa giigissidi, ba aawaa Israa7eelaara gaittanau Geseema biis. Yooseefi ba aawaa demmidosaarakka a qooriyan xaaxetti qoommidi, daro wodiyaa yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, What is your occupation?
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli Yooseefa, "Neeni paxa de7ishin, taani ne aifiyaa be7ido gishshau, ha77i taani haiqqikkonne aikkobaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: That ye shall say, Thy servants' trade hath been about cattle from our youth even until now, both we, and also our fathers: that ye may dwell in the land of Goshen; for every shepherd is an abomination unto the Egyptians.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yooseefi ba ishanttanne ba aawaa so asata, "Taani Gibxxe kawuwaakko baana; baada ayyo, Kanaane biittan de7iya ta ishanttinne ta aawaa so asai taakko yiidosona.

English Sentences: Then Joseph came and told Pharaoh, and said, My father and my brethren, and their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have, are come out of the land of Canaan; and, behold, they are in the land of Goshen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti dorssa henttanchcha; eti mehe heemmoosona; eti banttanaara bantta dorssata, bantta miizzatanne banttayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa ekkidi yiidosona yaagana.

English Sentences: And he took some of his brethren, even five men, and presented them unto Pharaoh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi inttena xeesissidi, Intte oosoi aibee? yaagidi oichchikko,

English Sentences: And Pharaoh said unto his brethren, What is your occupation? And they said unto Pharaoh, Thy servants are shepherds, both we, and also our fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: intte ayyo, Nuuni ne ashkkarati naatettaasappe doommidi, nu aawatudankka mehiyaa heemmeettees yaagite. Yaagikko i inttena Geseema biittan wottana; aissi giikko, dorssa henttanchcha ubbi Gibxxe asan karettidabaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They said moreover unto Pharaoh, For to sojourn in the land are we come; for thy servants have no pasture for their flocks; for the famine is sore in the land of Canaan: now therefore, we pray thee, let thy servants dwell in the land of Goshen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi gelidi Gibxxe kawuwaayyo hagaadan yaagidi yootiis; "Ta aawainne ta ishantti, bantta dorssaa wudiyaara, bantta miizzaa wudiyaaranne banttayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaara Kanaane biittaappe yiidi, ha77i Geseema biittan de7oosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Pharaoh spake unto Joseph, saying, Thy father and thy brethren are come unto thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba ishanttuppe ichchashata dooridi kawuwaa sintti aattiis.

English Sentences: The land of Egypt is before thee; in the best of the land make thy father and brethren to dwell; in the land of Goshen let them dwell: and if thou knowest any men of activity among them, then make them rulers over my cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi he ishantta, "Intte oosoi aibee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin eti kawuwaayyo, "Nuuni ne ashkkarati nu aawatuugaadankka dorssa wude heemmoos" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: And Joseph brought in Jacob his father, and set him before Pharaoh: and Jacob blessed Pharaoh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eti ayyo, "Kanaane biittan koshai suullido gishshaunne ne ashkkaratu mehiyau miyoobi aibinne bainna gishshau, nuuni hagan amarida wodiyaa daanau yiida; hayyanaa nuna ne ashkkarata Geseeman wottarkkii!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Pharaoh said unto Jacob, How old art thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi Yooseefa, "Ne aawainne ne ishantti neekko yiidosona.

English Sentences: And Jacob said unto Pharaoh, The days of the years of my pilgrimage are an hundred and thirty years: few and evil have the days of the years of my life been, and have not attained unto the days of the years of the life of my fathers in the days of their pilgrimage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi Gibxxe biittai ne kushiyan de7ees; ha biittan ubbasaappe aadhdhidi lo77iyaasan ne aawaanne ne ishantta wotta; eti Geseema biittan de7ona. Neeni erin, eta giddoppe dumma eratettai de7iyoogeeti de7ikko, hegeeta ta mehiyaa bolli suntta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob blessed Pharaoh, and went out from before Pharaoh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yooseefi ba aawaa Yaaqooba gelissidi, kawuwaa sintti aattiis. Yaaqoobi Gibxxe kawuwaa anjjidoogaappe guyyiyan,

English Sentences: And Joseph placed his father and his brethren, and gave them a possession in the land of Egypt, in the best of the land, in the land of Rameses, as Pharaoh had commanded.
Wolaitta Sentences: kawoi Yaaqooba, "Neeyyo woisu laittee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph nourished his father, and his brethren, and all his father's household, with bread, according to their families.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yaaqoobi kawuwaa, "Taani yuuyaidda de7ido laittai xeetanne hasttama; ta laittai beni ta aawati yuuyiiddi de7ido laittatuppe guuttanne metoi daridoogaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there was no bread in all the land; for the famine was very sore, so that the land of Egypt and all the land of Canaan fainted by reason of the famine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobi kawuwaa anjjidi, a sinttappe kare kiyiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph gathered up all the money that was found in the land of Egypt, and in the land of Canaan, for the corn which they bought: and Joseph brought the money into Pharaoh's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba aawaanne ba ishantta Gibxxe biittan wottiis; kawoi azazidoogaadan Gibxxe biittan Raamisa giyo katamaa matan de7iya, ubbasaappe aadhdhidi lo77iya gadiyaa etau immiis.

English Sentences: And when money failed in the land of Egypt, and in the land of Canaan, all the Egyptians came unto Joseph, and said, Give us bread: for why should we die in thy presence? for the money faileth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi qassi ba aawaayyo, ba ishanttuyyoonne ba aawaa so asa ubbau eta naatu qoodaadan kattaa immiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph said, Give your cattle; and I will give you for your cattle, if money fail.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne koshai suullido gishshau, he biitta ubban katti baawa. He koshan Gibxxenne Kanaane biittai naa77aikka qohettidosona.

English Sentences: And they brought their cattle unto Joseph: and Joseph gave them bread in exchange for horses, and for the flocks, and for the cattle of the herds, and for the asses: and he fed them with bread for all their cattle for that year.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi Gibxxe kattaa baizzidi, Gibxxenne Kanaane biittatun de7iya miishshaa ubbaa shiishshiis; shiishshidi Gibxxe kawuwaa keettaa gelissiis.

English Sentences: When that year was ended, they came unto him the second year, and said unto him, We will not hide it from my lord, how that our money is spent; my lord also hath our herds of cattle; there is not ought left in the sight of my lord, but our bodies, and our lands:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxenne Kanaane miishshai wurido wode, Gibxxe asai ubbai Yooseefakko yiidi a, "Nuuyyo kattaa imma; nu miishshai wurido gishshau, nuuni ne sinttan aissi haiqqiyoonii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore shall we die before thine eyes, both we and our land? buy us and our land for bread, and we and our land will be servants unto Pharaoh: and give us seed, that we may live, and not die, that the land be not desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yooseefi eta, "Yaanikko intte mehiyaa ekki yiite; intte miishshai wuriichchidabaa gidikko, taani kattaa intte mehiyaara laammana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph bought all the land of Egypt for Pharaoh; for the Egyptians sold every man his field, because the famine prevailed over them: so the land became Pharaoh's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau eti bantta mehiyaa Yooseefayyo ehiidosona. Ehin Yooseefi eta paraa, dorssaa, deeshshaa, miizzaanne hariyaa kattaara laammiis; i he laittaa eta mehiyaa ubbaara kattaa laammiiddi eta mizi shaachchiis.

English Sentences: And as for the people, he removed them to cities from one end of the borders of Egypt even to the other end thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: He laittai wurin, eti naa77antta laittan akko yiidi a, "Nuuni nu godaappe qosiyoobi baawa; nu miishsha ubbai wuriichchiis; nu mehiyaakka neessi sheedhdhiichchida; nu bollaappenne nu gadiyaappe attin, nu godaayyo attidabi harabi baawa.

English Sentences: Only the land of the priests bought he not; for the priests had a portion assigned them of Pharaoh, and did eat their portion which Pharaoh gave them: wherefore they sold not their lands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ne sinttan aissi haiqqiyoonii? Nu gadeekka aissi xayii? Nunakka nu gadiyaakka kattan shamma; nuuni kawuwaayyo ailletana; nu gadeekka abaa gido; nuuni paxa attana mala, haiqqenna malanne nu gadeekka oxxenna mala, zerettaa nuuyyo imma" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then Joseph said unto the people, Behold, I have bought you this day and your land for Pharaoh: lo, here is seed for you, and ye shall sow the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi Gibxxe biitta ubbaa kawuwaayyo shammiis. Gibxxeti ubbai koshai suullido gishshau, bantta gadiyaa baizzidosona; baizzin gadee kawuwaabaa gidiis.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass in the increase, that ye shall give the fifth part unto Pharaoh, and four parts shall be your own, for seed of the field, and for your food, and for them of your households, and for food for your little ones.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi asa ubbaa Gibxxeyyo ha gaxaappe doommidi hini gaxaa gakkanaassi kawuwaayyo aille kessiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Thou hast saved our lives: let us find grace in the sight of my lord, and we will be Pharaoh's servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne i qeesetu gadiyaa shammibeenna; aissi giikko, kawoi qeesetuyyo kattaa immees. Hegaa gishshau bantta gadiyaa baizzibookkona.

English Sentences: And Joseph made it a law over the land of Egypt unto this day, that Pharaoh should have the fifth part; except the land of the priests only, which became not Pharaoh's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi asaa, "Simmi hachchi taani inttenanne intte gadiyaa kawuwaayyo shammaas. Zerettaa efiidi, gaden zerite.

English Sentences: And Israel dwelt in the land of Egypt, in the country of Goshen; and they had possessions therein, and grew, and multiplied exceedingly.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kattaa cakki gelissiyo wode, aifidabaappe ichchashu kushiyaappe issi kushiyaa kawuwaayyo immite. Ichchashu kushiyaappe attida oiddu kushee intte gadiyaa zerettanne intteyyo, intte so asaayyoonne intte naatuyyo quma gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob lived in the land of Egypt seventeen years: so the whole age of Jacob was an hundred forty and seven years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti, "Neeni nuna ashshadasa! Nu godaa sinttan nuuni sabettorkkoniishsha; nuuni kawuwaayyo ailletana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the time drew nigh that Israel must die: and he called his son Joseph, and said unto him, If now I have found grace in thy sight, put, I pray thee, thy hand under my thigh, and deal kindly and truly with me; bury me not, I pray thee, in Egypt:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yooseefi Gibxxen biittappe aifidabaappe ichchashu kushiyaappe issuwaa kawuwaayyo immiyoogaa higge kessiis. He higgeenne hachchi gakkanaassi eqqidi de7ees. Kawuwaabaa gidibeenna gadee qeesetu gadiyaa xalaala.

English Sentences: But I will lie with my fathers, and thou shalt carry me out of Egypt, and bury me in their buryingplace. And he said, I will do as thou hast said.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelati Gibxxe biittan Geseema giyoosan uttidosona; eti yan aqo demmidosona; eti yelettidosonanne daro corattidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Swear unto me. And he sware unto him. And Israel bowed himself upon the bed's head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Gibxxe biittan tammanne laappun laitta de7iis. Yaaqoobi de7ido laittai xeetanne oitamanne laappuna.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after these things, that one told Joseph, Behold, thy father is sick: and he took with him his two sons, Manasseh and Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelayyo haiqqiyo wodee matattin, ba na7aa Yooseefa xeesissidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani ne sinttan sabettidabaa gidikko, ne kushiyaa ta gulbbatan wottada, neeni taayyo kehanaunne ammanettanau ane geppa. Tana Gibxxen moogoppa;

English Sentences: And one told Jacob, and said, Behold, thy son Joseph cometh unto thee: and Israel strengthened himself, and sat upon the bed.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin taani ta maizzan gaittiyo wode, tana Gibxxeppe efaada, eti moogettidosan mooga" yaagiis. Yaagin Yooseefi, "Taani nena neeni giidoogaadan oottana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob said unto Joseph, God Almighty appeared unto me at Luz in the land of Canaan, and blessed me,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi a, "Ane taayyo caaqqa" yaagiis. Yaagin Yooseefi ayyo caaqqiis; hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eeli ba hiixan gufannidi, Xoossaassi goinniis.

English Sentences: And said unto me, Behold, I will make thee fruitful, and multiply thee, and I will make of thee a multitude of people; and will give this land to thy seed after thee for an everlasting possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan asai Yooseefassi, "Ne aawai sakettees" yaagidi yootiis. Yootin i ba naa77u attuma naata Minaasanne Efireema ekkidi biis.

English Sentences: And now thy two sons, Ephraim and Manasseh, which were born unto thee in the land of Egypt before I came unto thee into Egypt, are mine; as Reuben and Simeon, they shall be mine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bin asai Yaaqooba, "Be7a; ne na7ai Yooseefi neekko yiis" yaagiis; yaagin Israa7eeli minettidi ba hiixan uttiis.

English Sentences: And thy issue, which thou begettest after them, shall be thine, and shall be called after the name of their brethren in their inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Yooseefa, "Ubbaa Danddayiya Xoossai Kanaane biittan Looza giyoosan taayyo qonccidi, yan tana anjjiis.

English Sentences: And as for me, when I came from Padan, Rachel died by me in the land of Canaan in the way, when yet there was but a little way to come unto Ephrath: and I buried her there in the way of Ephrath; the same is Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana, Taani nena yeletissananne corayana; taani nena daro dere oottana. Ha biittaa taani neeppe guyyiyan, ne zerettaayyo merinaa laata oottada immana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Israel beheld Joseph's sons, and said, Who are these?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simmi ha77i, ne naa77u attuma naati, taani neekko hagaa yaanaappe kase Gibxxen neeyyo yelettidaageeti tabaa; Efireeminne Minaasee taayyo Roobeelanne Simoona mala.

English Sentences: And Joseph said unto his father, They are my sons, whom God hath given me in this place. And he said, Bring them, I pray thee, unto me, and I will bless them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe guyyiyan neeyyo yelettidaageeti nebaa; eti laattana biittai Efireemanne Minaasa sunttan gido.

English Sentences: Now the eyes of Israel were dim for age, so that he could not see. And he brought them near unto him; and he kissed them, and embraced them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Masphphexoomiyaappe simmishin, Efiraata gakkanau guuttaa ashshidaashin, Raaheela Kanaane biittan haiqqaasu. Haiqqin, taani o Beetaliheeme giyo Efiraataa efiya ogiyaa doonan moogaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Israel said unto Joseph, I had not thought to see thy face: and, lo, God hath shewed me also thy seed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli Yooseefa attuma naata naa77ata be7ido wode, "Hageeti oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph brought them out from between his knees, and he bowed himself with his face to the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yooseefi ba aawaa, "Hageeti Xoossai taayyo hagan immido ta naata" yaagiis. Yaagin Israa7eeli, "Taani eta anjjana mala, eta taakko haa shiishsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph took them both, Ephraim in his right hand toward Israel's left hand, and Manasseh in his left hand toward Israel's right hand, and brought them near unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli cimin a aifee daafurido gishshau, xeellanau danddayenna. Hegaa gishshau Yooseefi ba attuma naata akko shiishshin, a aawai eta idimmidi yeriis.

English Sentences: And Israel stretched out his right hand, and laid it upon Ephraim's head, who was the younger, and his left hand upon Manasseh's head, guiding his hands wittingly; for Manasseh was the firstborn.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eeli Yooseefa, "Taani ne som77uwaa be7ana gaada qoppabeikke; shin Xoossai hekko ne naatakka tana bessiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he blessed Joseph, and said, God, before whom my fathers Abraham and Isaac did walk, the God which fed me all my life long unto this day,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi eta a gulbbataappe denttidi, ba som77uwaa sa7aa gattidi ziggiis.

English Sentences: The Angel which redeemed me from all evil, bless the lads; and let my name be named on them, and the name of my fathers Abraham and Isaac; and let them grow into a multitude in the midst of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba naa77u attuma naata, Efireema ba ushachcha baggan Israa7eelau haddirssa baggaara, Minaasa ba haddirssa baggan Israa7eelau ushachcha baggaara ekkidi, akko shiishshiis.

English Sentences: And when Joseph saw that his father laid his right hand upon the head of Ephraim, it displeased him: and he held up his father's hand, to remove it from Ephraim's head unto Manasseh's head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireemi kaalo gidikkokka, Israa7eeli ba ushachcha kushiyaa yeddidi a huuphiyan wottiis; qassi Minaasee baira gidikkokka, Israa7eeli ba kushiyaa qaxiballidi, ba haddirssa kushiyaa Minaase huuphiyan wottiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph said unto his father, Not so, my father: for this is the firstborn; put thy right hand upon his head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobi Yooseefa hagaadan yaagidi anjjiis; "Ta aawati Abrahaaminne Yisaaqi a sinttan hemettido Xoossai, ta de7o ubban hachchi gakkanaassi tana heemmida Xoossai,

English Sentences: And his father refused, and said, I know it, my son, I know it: he also shall become a people, and he also shall be great: but truly his younger brother shall be greater than he, and his seed shall become a multitude of nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: iitabaa ubbaappe tana ashshida kiitanchchai, ha naata anjjo. Ta sunttainne ta aawatu Abrahaamanne Yisaaqa sunttai etan xeesetto. Eti sa7aa bollan corattona" yaagidi anjjiis.

English Sentences: And he blessed them that day, saying, In thee shall Israel bless, saying, God make thee as Ephraim and as Manasseh: and he set Ephraim before Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba aawai ba ushachcha kushiyaa Efireema huuphiyan wottidoogaa be7ido wode dosibeenna. Hegaa gishshau, Efireema huuphiyaappe denttidi, Minaase huuphiyan wottanau ba aawaa kushiyaa oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Israel said unto Joseph, Behold, I die: but God shall be with you, and bring you again unto the land of your fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiqqidi Yooseefi ba aawaa, "Ta aawau, hegaa gidenna; bairai hagaattennee; ne ushachcha kushiyaa hagaa bolli wotta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover I have given to thee one portion above thy brethren, which I took out of the hand of the Amorite with my sword and with my bow.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin a aawai ixxidi a, "Taani erais; ta na7au, taani erais; ikka gita dere gidana. Gidikkonne a kaalo ishai appe aadhdhi gitatana; a zerettaikka daro gita kawotetta gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jacob called unto his sons, and said, Gather yourselves together, that I may tell you that which shall befall you in the last days.
Wolaitta Sentences: I he gallassi eta anjjidi, "Israa7eelati anjjiyo wode, Xoossai inttena Efireemadaaninne Minaasedan ootto yaagidi intte sunttan anjjana" yaagiis. Yaatidi Efireema Minaaseppe sinttayiis.

English Sentences: Gather yourselves together, and hear, ye sons of Jacob; and hearken unto Israel your father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Israa7eeli Yooseefa, "Taani haiqqana hanais; shin Xoossai inttenaara gidana; qassi i intte aawatu biitti inttena guyye zaarana.

English Sentences: Reuben, thou art my firstborn, my might, and the beginning of my strength, the excellency of dignity, and the excellency of power:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi nena ne ishanttuura gakkiya biittaappe issi saamaa darissada neeyyo immais; hegeenne taani Amooretuppe ta bisuwaaninne ta wonddafiyan ekkido biittaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Unstable as water, thou shalt not excel; because thou wentest up to thy father's bed; then defiledst thou it: he went up to my couch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobi ba attuma naata xeesissidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Sinttappe intteyyo hananabaa taani intteyyo yootana mala shiiqite.

English Sentences: Simeon and Levi are brethren; instruments of cruelty are in their habitations.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo Yaaqooba naatoo, issippe shiiqidi siyite; intte aawai Israa7eeli intteyyo yootiyoobaa ezggite.

English Sentences: O my soul, come not thou into their secret; unto their assembly, mine honour, be not thou united: for in their anger they slew a man, and in their selfwill they digged down a wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Roobeelaa, ta baira na7au, neeni ta wolqqaa; ta minotettaayyo koiruwaa. Neeni bonchchuwankka wolqqankka ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Cursed be their anger, for it was fierce; and their wrath, for it was cruel: I will divide them in Jacob, and scatter them in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni di7o mala; eqqosan de7akka; neeni ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagaa gidakka. Aissi giikko, neeni ne aawaa hiixaa kiyadasa; ne awaa arssaa tunissadasa.

English Sentences: Judah, thou art he whom thy brethren shall praise: thy hand shall be in the neck of thine enemies; thy father's children shall bow down before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Simooninne Leewi ishantta; eta bisoi makkalatettau ola miishsha.

English Sentences: Judah is a lion's whelp: from the prey, my son, thou art gone up: he stooped down, he couched as a lion, and as an old lion; who shall rouse him up?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta zoretan gelikke; taani eta shiiquwankka uttikke. Aissi giikko, eti bantta hanqquwan asa woridosonanne banttana ekka ekka gin, boorata gilddayidosona.

English Sentences: The sceptre shall not depart from Judah, nor a lawgiver from between his feet, until Shiloh come; and unto him shall the gathering of the people be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta suulo hanqqoi eta meqettaa iitatettainne qanggettidaagaa gido! Taani eta Yaaqooba asaa giddon laalana; Israa7eela biittan piskki oottana.

English Sentences: Binding his foal unto the vine, and his ass's colt unto the choice vine; he washed his garments in wine, and his clothes in the blood of grapes:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yihudau, ne ishantti nena galatana. Ne kushee ne morkketu piillanttiyaa oiqqana. Ne aawaa naati neeyyo hokkidi ziggana.

English Sentences: His eyes shall be red with wine, and his teeth white with milk.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudau, neeni wodala gaammo. Ta na7au, neeni shankkaappe woridi simmidi, cogochchidi zin77ida gaammo mala. Neeni asi bosherettanau koyenna macca gaammee mala.

English Sentences: Zebulun shall dwell at the haven of the sea; and he shall be for an haven of ships; and his border shall be unto Zidon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haariyaagee yaana gakkanaashin, kawotaa xam77ai Yihudaappe, deriyaa haariyaageetu gatimai a toho giddoppe shaahettenna. Qassi dere asai ayyo azazettana.

English Sentences: Issachar is a strong ass couching down between two burdens:
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba hariyaa woiniyaa anuwan, ba hare maraa muruta woiniyaa turan qachchana. I ba afalaa woiniyaa eessan, ba maayuwaa suutta milatiya woiniyaa eessan meeccana.

English Sentences: And he saw that rest was good, and the land that it was pleasant; and bowed his shoulder to bear, and became a servant unto tribute.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aifee woine eessaappe aadhdhi dulkkana; a achchaikka maattaappe aadhdhi booxxana.

English Sentences: Dan shall judge his people, as one of the tribes of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Zaabiloonee abbaa doonan de7ana; i abbaa doonan markkabeti eqqiyo soho gidana; a zawai Sidoona gakkana.

English Sentences: Dan shall be a serpent by the way, an adder in the path, that biteth the horse heels, so that his rider shall fall backward.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yisaakoori mino hare; caaniyo naa77u joinetuppe gidduwan zin77i bayees.

English Sentences: I have waited for thy salvation, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba shemppiyoosai lo77o gidiyoogaanne ba biittai ufaissiyaagaa gidiyoogaa be7iyo wode, caanaa tookkanau ba hashiyaa ziqqi oottidi, ailletettaa ooso oottana.

English Sentences: Gad, a troop shall overcome him: but he shall overcome at the last.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Daani Israa7eela zaretuppe issuwaa gidiya ba asaa bolli daannatana.

English Sentences: Out of Asher his bread shall be fat, and he shall yield royal dainties.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daani oge doonan de7iya shooshsha; paraa toggidaagee guyye kunddana mala paraa ginddiyaa dukkiya, ogiyan de7iya haso.

English Sentences: Naphtali is a hind let loose: he giveth goodly words.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, taani neeni ashshanau naagais.

English Sentences: Joseph is a fruitful bough, even a fruitful bough by a well; whose branches run over the wall:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gaadi bonqqiyaageetun deshettana; shin ikka eta paanaa kaallidi eta bonqqana.

English Sentences: The archers have sorely grieved him, and shot at him, and hated him:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aseera oittai ordde; kawotuyyo i lo77o qumaa immana.

English Sentences: But his bow abode in strength, and the arms of his hands were made strong by the hands of the mighty God of Jacob; (from thence is the shepherd, the stone of Israel:)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nifttaaleemi qashettennan yeda de7iya, lo77o marata yeliya genessa.

English Sentences: Even by the God of thy father, who shall help thee; and by the Almighty, who shall bless thee with blessings of heaven above, blessings of the deep that lieth under, blessings of the breasts, and of the womb:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yooseefi aifiyaara herxxexxida woine tura. I pulttuwaa matan herxxexxa aifiyaara de7iya, daashshaikka godaappe bollaara zaa7iyo woine tura.

English Sentences: The blessings of thy father have prevailed above the blessings of my progenitors unto the utmost bound of the everlasting hills: they shall be on the head of Joseph, and on the crown of the head of him that was separate from his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonddafiyaa dukkiyaageeti a bolli woraajjidosona; woraajjidi bantta zubbiyan dukkidosonanne muddidosona.

English Sentences: Benjamin shall ravin as a wolf: in the morning he shall devour the prey, and at night he shall divide the spoil.
Wolaitta Sentences: A wonddafee minni uttiis; a qeseekka minnidi gam77iis. Hegeenne Yaaqooba Wolqqaamaa kushiyaa gaasuwaana, ne henttanchchaa, Israa7eela Zaallaa gaasuwaana,

English Sentences: All these are the twelve tribes of Israel: and this is it that their father spake unto them, and blessed them; every one according to his blessing he blessed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: nena maaddiya ne aawatu Xoossaa gaasuwaananne, nena bolla saluwaa anjjuwan, garssa ciimmaa anjjuwan, xanttaa anjjuwaaninne yeliya uluwaa anjjuwan anjjiya, Ubbaa Danddayiya Xoossaa gaasuwaana.

English Sentences: And he charged them, and said unto them, I am to be gathered unto my people: bury me with my fathers in the cave that is in the field of Ephron the Hittite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aawaa anjjoi beni deretu anjjuwaappekka merinaasappe de7iya keratu anjjuwaappekka aadhdhees. Hagee ubbai Yooseefa huuphiyan, ba ishanttu giddon halaqa gidiyaagaa liiphiyan shemppo.

English Sentences: In the cave that is in the field of Machpelah, which is before Mamre, in the land of Canaan, which Abraham bought with the field of Ephron the Hittite for a possession of a buryingplace.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biniyaami bonqqiya wanggireello. Ba shankkatidobaa maallado mees; ba omooddidobaa omarssi shaakkees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: There they buried Abraham and Sarah his wife; there they buried Isaac and Rebekah his wife; and there I buried Leah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti tammanne naa77u Israa7eela zareta; qassi eta aawai eta huuphiyan huuphiyan etau bessiya anjjuwaa anjjiiddi etayyo giidobai hagaa.

English Sentences: The purchase of the field and of the cave that is therein was from the children of Heth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, i eta hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Taani ta maizza asatun gaittana hanais; tana Hiitiyaa Efiroona gaden de7iya gonggoluwan, ta aawatuura moogite.

English Sentences: And when Jacob had made an end of commanding his sons, he gathered up his feet into the bed, and yielded up the ghost, and was gathered unto his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne Kanaane biittan, Mamire matan de7iya, Maakipheela giyo gonggoluwaa; hegee Abrahaami moogossi Hiitiyaa Efiroonappe a gadiyaara shammido gonggoluwaa.

English Sentences: And Joseph fell upon his father's face, and wept upon him, and kissed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaaminne a keettaayyiyaa Saara yan moogettidosona; Yisaaqinne a keettaayyiyaa Ribiqa yan moogettidosona; taani qassi Liyo yan moogaas.

English Sentences: And Joseph commanded his servants the physicians to embalm his father: and the physicians embalmed Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gadeenne an de7iya gonggoloi Hiitetuppe shamettidaagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And forty days were fulfilled for him; for so are fulfilled the days of those which are embalmed: and the Egyptians mourned for him threescore and ten days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi ba naatuyyo azazuwaa wurssido wode, ba tohuwaa pude ba hiixau shiishshi ekkidi, haiqqi aggiis; haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis.

English Sentences: And when the days of his mourning were past, Joseph spake unto the house of Pharaoh, saying, If now I have found grace in your eyes, speak, I pray you, in the ears of Pharaoh, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba aawaa ahaa bolli kunddidi, yeekkiisinne a yeriis.

English Sentences: My father made me swear, saying, Lo, I die: in my grave which I have digged for me in the land of Canaan, there shalt thou bury me. Now therefore let me go up, I pray thee, and bury my father, and I will come again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yooseefi xaliyaa shiishshiya ba oosanchchata ba aawaa Israa7eela ahaa sawiya shittuwaa tiyidi melissana mala azaziis; azazin eti tiyidi melissidosona.

English Sentences: And Pharaoh said, Go up, and bury thy father, according as he made thee swear.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHittuwaa tiyiyoogee oitamu gallassa kumettaa wurssiis; aissi giikko, hegee tiyoi wonikka oitamu gallassaa ekkees. Gibxxe asati ayyo laappun tammu gallassaa yeekkidosona.

English Sentences: And Joseph went up to bury his father: and with him went up all the servants of Pharaoh, the elders of his house, and all the elders of the land of Egypt,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeeho gallassati aadhdhido wode, Yooseefi Gibxxe kawuwaa keettaa asata, "Taani intte sinttan nashettidobaa gidikko, intte tau kawuwaayyo hagaadan yaagidi odite;

English Sentences: And all the house of Joseph, and his brethren, and his father's house: only their little ones, and their flocks, and their herds, they left in the land of Goshen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta aawai tana issi caaqo caaqissiis; i tana, "Taani haiqqana hanais; taani ta huuphessi Kanaane biittan bookkido gonggolo duufuwan tana mooga" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau ha77i taani pude baada ta aawaa moogana mala yeddarkkii! Hegaappe guyyiyan taani simmana yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there went up with him both chariots and horsemen: and it was a very great company.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi, "I nena caaqissidoogaadan pude baada ne aawaa mooga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they came to the threshingfloor of Atad, which is beyond Jordan, and there they mourned with a great and very sore lamentation: and he made a mourning for his father seven days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yooseefi ba aawaa mooganau pude biis. Kawuwaa oosanchchati ubbai, a kawo keettan de7iya gita asai ubbainne Gibxxe biittan de7iya gita asai ubbai Yooseefa kaallidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And when the inhabitants of the land, the Canaanites, saw the mourning in the floor of Atad, they said, This is a grievous mourning to the Egyptians: wherefore the name of it was called Abelmizraim, which is beyond Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yooseefa so asai ubbai, a ishanttinne a aawaa so asai biidosona; eta naati, eta miizzainne eta dorssaa wude xalaalai Geseeman attiis.

English Sentences: And his sons did unto him according as he commanded them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Para gaaretikka paraasatikka aara pude biidosona; a kaallidi biida asai keehi daro.

English Sentences: For his sons carried him into the land of Canaan, and buried him in the cave of the field of Machpelah, which Abraham bought with the field for a possession of a buryingplace of Ephron the Hittite, before Mamre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa matan de7iya Axaadi giyo audiyaa gakkiiddi, bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, ayyo zilaalidosonanne yeekkidosona; yan Yooseefi ba aawaa yeehuwan laappun gallassaa uttiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph returned into Egypt, he, and his brethren, and all that went up with him to bury his father, after he had buried his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittan de7iya Kanaane asati Axaadi giyo audiyan he yeehuwaa be7ido wode, "Gibxxeti aiba yibbaata yeeho yeekkiyoonaa!" yaagidosona. Hegaa gishshau Yorddaanoosa matan de7iya he sohoi, Gibxxetu Yeehuwaa geetettiis.

English Sentences: And when Joseph's brethren saw that their father was dead, they said, Joseph will peradventure hate us, and will certainly requite us all the evil which we did unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba naati bantta aawai eta azazidoogaadan oottidosona;

English Sentences: And they sent a messenger unto Joseph, saying, Thy father did command before he died, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: eti a ahaa Kanaane biitti efiidi, Mamire matan de7iya Maakipheela giyo gonggoluwan, Abrahaami Hiitiyaa Efiroonappe mooguwau shammido gadiyan a moogidosona.

English Sentences: So shall ye say unto Joseph, Forgive, I pray thee now, the trespass of thy brethren, and their sin; for they did unto thee evil: and now, we pray thee, forgive the trespass of the servants of the God of thy father. And Joseph wept when they spake unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba aawaa moogidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba ishanttuuranne a aawaa mooganau aara biida hara asatu ubbatuura Gibxxe simmiis.

English Sentences: And his brethren also went and fell down before his face; and they said, Behold, we be thy servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta aawai haiqqiichchidoogaa be7idi, Yooseefa ishantti bantta giddon, "Ooni erii Yooseefi nuna ba uluwan morkkikkonne nuuni ayyo oottido iitabaa ubbaassi halo kessana koyikko, nuuni waananee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Joseph said unto them, Fear not: for am I in the place of God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau Yooseefakko hagaa mala kiitaa kiittidosona; "Ne aawai haiqqanaappe kase;

English Sentences: But as for you, ye thought evil against me; but God meant it unto good, to bring to pass, as it is this day, to save much people alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Yooseefa, "Neeni ne ishanttu nagaraanne eti nena naaqqido iita naaquwaa hayyanaa atto yaaga" yaagiis giidi odite yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau ha77i hayyanaa, nu nagaraa, ne aawaa Xoossaa ashkkaratu nagaraa atto yaaga" yaagidosona. Kiitai baakko gakkido wode, Yooseefi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: Now therefore fear ye not: I will nourish you, and your little ones. And he comforted them, and spake kindly unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan a ishantti bantta huuphen akko yiidi, a sinttan gufannidi, "Nuuni ne ailleta" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Joseph dwelt in Egypt, he, and his father's house: and Joseph lived an hundred and ten years.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yooseefi eta, "Yayyoppite; tana intteyyo Xoossaa giidetiiyye?

English Sentences: And Joseph saw Ephraim's children of the third generation: the children also of Machir the son of Manasseh were brought up upon Joseph's knees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte taayyo iitanau oottideta; shin hachchiigaadan daro asai haiqqennan attana mala, Xoossai lo77otettau hagaa oottiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph said unto his brethren, I die: and God will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land which he sware to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau simmi intte yayyoppite; taani inttenanne intte naata mizana" yaagidi, i eta minttettidi keha qaalaa haasayiis.

English Sentences: And Joseph took an oath of the children of Israel, saying, God will surely visit you, and ye shall carry up my bones from hence.
